analyzed: so sor bsngags pa bzhin de'i rgyus de las sam gzhan la rnyed pa dang bkur sti dang rim gro'am bya ba gzhan zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: because of the praise of the individual, the cause of that is the acquisition of gain and honor from that person or another.🔽With a mind of joy and faith and delight,

original: rangs pa dang mos pa dang dga' bar byed pas so zhes bya ba ni zhum pa dang lhag par mi mos pas mi rigs par byed pa nyid kyi gnyen pos so //
analyzed: rangs pa dang mos pa dang dga' bar byed pas so zhes bya ba ni zhum pa dang lhag par mi mos pas mi rigs par byed pa nyid kyi gnyen pos so //
translated: because of the antidote to the unreasonableness of discouragement and lack of superior interest.

original: don gyi dbang gis ma rdzogs na gzhag par bya'o zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: don gyi dbang gis ma rdzogs na gzhag par bya'o zhes bya ba ni /
translated: If it is not completed due to the power of the meaning, it should be set aside,

original: ma nus pa la sogs pa ste de'i dbang gis so //
analyzed: ma nus pa la sogs pa ste de'i dbang gis so //
translated: because of inability and so on, due to the power of that.

original: 'di la mi rigs pa med par shes par bya'o //
analyzed: 'di la mi rigs pa med par shes par bya'o //
translated: It should be understood that there is no unreasonableness in this.

original: de bas na 'di dang mdo phyi ma dang yang dag par bstan pa'o //
analyzed: de bas na 'di dang mdo phyi ma dang yang dag par bstan pa'o //
translated: Therefore, this is the teaching of the sutra and the later sutra.

original: dbyangs kyis chos smra bar bya'o //
analyzed: dbyangs kyis chos smra bar bya'o //
translated: One should teach the Dharma with a melodious voice.

original: langs nas rnam par dbye bar bya'o //
analyzed: langs nas rnam par dbye bar bya'o //
translated: Having arisen, one should analyze.🔽And one should express the summary meaning.

original: don bsdus te brjod pa yang ngo zhes bya ba ni bya'o zhes bya bar sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: don bsdus te brjod pa yang ngo zhes bya ba ni bya'o zhes bya bar sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: One should do this is to be supplied.

original: chos la zhes bya ba ni mdo sde la sogs pa shugs kyis rtogs par bya'o //
analyzed: chos la zhes bya ba ni mdo sde la sogs pa shugs kyis rtogs par bya'o //
translated: With regard to the Dharma means with regard to the sutras and so on, which are understood by implication.

original: gal gzung ba dang gzhung gzugs par yang ngo zhes bya ba la gang zhig ce na /
analyzed: gal gzung ba dang gzhung gzugs par yang ngo zhes bya ba la gang zhig ce na /
translated: And with regard to the scriptural collection and the treatise. What is that?

original: mdo sde la sogs pa'i chos kyi'o //
analyzed: mdo sde la sogs pa'i chos kyi'o //
translated: It is the Dharma of the sutras and so on.

original: yi ge dang don de ni rigs pa ma yin te /
analyzed: yi ge dang don de ni rigs pa ma yin te /
translated: That is not reasonable, because the letters and their meaning are not the Dharma.

original: de ni 'di ltar brjod par bya ste /🔽de yang gzhi 'dis cho ga rtogs par bya'o zhes bya ba rnam par 'byed pa las so //🔽gal gzung ba dang @89a * //
analyzed: de ni 'di ltar brjod par bya ste / de yang gzhi 'dis cho ga rtogs par bya'o zhes bya ba rnam par 'byed pa las so // gal gzung ba dang @89a * //
translated: Therefore, this should be stated:🔽And that should be understood through this basis, the ritual.

original: gzhung gzugs pa de ltar yi dam byed pa'o //
analyzed: gzhung gzugs pa de ltar yi dam byed pa'o //
translated: And with regard to the scriptural collection and the treatise, one should make a commitment.

original: dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyis smyug ma'i thur ma skud pa la brgyus pa spobs nyi ma bgrang bar bya'o zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyis smyug ma'i thur ma skud pa la brgyus pa spobs nyi ma bgrang bar bya'o zhes bya ba la /
translated: The elder of the saṃgha should count the days with a bamboo stick strung on a thread.

original: 'dir gzhung ni /
analyzed: 'dir gzhung ni /
translated: Here, the text is:

original: gleng gzhi dag las 'di dang por byas pa'i drang bar bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar du gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: gleng gzhi dag las 'di dang por byas pa'i drang bar bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar du gsungs pa yin no //
translated: This should be corrected to be the first in the nidāna.

original: dge skos kyis de la brtags te dge 'dun la brjod par bya'o zhes bya ba ni dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyi las so //
analyzed: dge skos kyis de la brtags te dge 'dun la brjod par bya'o zhes bya ba ni dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyi las so //
translated: The karma master should examine that and announce it to the saṃgha. This is the duty of the elder of the saṃgha.

original: bye brag tu ma byas pas ni zhu bar bya ba ma yin te /
analyzed: bye brag tu ma byas pas ni zhu bar bya ba ma yin te /
translated: Since it is not specified, it is not to be requested.

original: 'on kyang bye brag tu byas pa'i 'o zhes bya ba smos so //
analyzed: 'on kyang bye brag tu byas pa'i 'o zhes bya ba smos so //
translated: However, it is said to be of the specified one.

original: gang gis bye brag tu byas pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: gang gis bye brag tu byas pa yin zhe na /
translated: By whom is it specified?

original: de'i phyir ngo'i dbye bas so zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: de'i phyir ngo'i dbye bas so zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: Therefore, it is said by the division of the lunar month.

original: zla ba yar gyi ngo dang mar gyi ngo 'di dbye ba des so //
analyzed: zla ba yar gyi ngo dang mar gyi ngo 'di dbye ba des so //
translated: By that division of the waxing and waning lunar months.

original: gtsug lag khang gi bdag po dang lha'i tshigs su bcad pa 'don par dge slong rnams la bskul ba'i tshig bya'o zhes bya ba gang gi tshe na zhe na /
analyzed: gtsug lag khang gi bdag po dang lha'i tshigs su bcad pa 'don par dge slong rnams la bskul ba'i tshig bya'o zhes bya ba gang gi tshe na zhe na /
translated: The monks are urged to recite the verses of the temple-lord and the verses of the deity. When is this done?

original: de'i phyir zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: de'i phyir zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: Therefore, he says,

original: nyi ma brjod pa'i zhes bya ba skabs kyis rtogs par bya'o //
analyzed: nyi ma brjod pa'i zhes bya ba skabs kyis rtogs par bya'o //
translated: on the day of the full moon, it should be understood from the context.

original: sdug bsngal rigs pa'i ngo bo tshig gis mngon par 'du byas pa zhes bya ba gang zhig 'dir rigs pa'i ngo bo'i tshig mngon par 'dod pa de bstan par bya ste /
analyzed: sdug bsngal rigs pa'i ngo bo tshig gis mngon par 'du byas pa zhes bya ba gang zhig 'dir rigs pa'i ngo bo'i tshig mngon par 'dod pa de bstan par bya ste /
translated: The nature of the suffering that is the nature of the words that are created is what is desired here as the nature of the words. That should be explained.

original: de'i phyir deng ni yar gyi ngo'i tshes gcig lags te /
analyzed: de'i phyir deng ni yar gyi ngo'i tshes gcig lags te /
translated: Therefore, today is the first day of the waxing moon.

original: gtsug lag khang gi bdag po dang / gtsug lag khang gi lha rnams kyi slad du tshigs su bcad pa re re bklag tu gsol zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: gtsug lag khang gi bdag po dang / gtsug lag khang gi lha rnams kyi slad du tshigs su bcad pa re re bklag tu gsol zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: For the sake of the temple-lord and the deities of the temple, please recite a verse each.

original: bklag tu gsol zhes bya ba'i sgras ni 'di skad ces bya ba'i don can no //
analyzed: bklag tu gsol zhes bya ba'i sgras ni 'di skad ces bya ba'i don can no //
translated: The word please has the meaning of this is what should be done.

original: gtsug lag khang gi bdag pos spyan 'dren pa'i tshig kyang brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: gtsug lag khang gi bdag pos spyan 'dren pa'i tshig kyang brjod par bya'o //
translated: And the words of invitation from the temple owner should be spoken.

original: ji skad du zhe na ;
analyzed: ji skad du zhe na ;
translated: What are they?

original: de'i phyir yon bdag ming 'di zhes bgyis pas sang dge 'dun bshos la spyan 'dren na /
analyzed: de'i phyir yon bdag ming 'di zhes bgyis pas sang dge 'dun bshos la spyan 'dren na /
translated: Therefore, the patron named so-and-so invites the Saṅgha for a meal tomorrow.

original: btsun pa rnams kyis de la dge legs kyi yid dag gis so so nas thugs brtse bar mdzad du gsol zhes bya bas so //
analyzed: btsun pa rnams kyis de la dge legs kyi yid dag gis so so nas thugs brtse bar mdzad du gsol zhes bya bas so //
translated: Venerable ones, please each take pity on him with a virtuous mind.

original: nyin zhag gcig gis mi chog par bya'o zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: nyin zhag gcig gis mi chog par bya'o zhes bya ba la /
translated: It should not be done in one day.

original: gang gi tshe na yin zhe na /
analyzed: gang gi tshe na yin zhe na /
translated: When is it?

original: de'i phyir dus tshigs rnams kyi zla ba phyed lus pa nyid la'o zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: de'i phyir dus tshigs rnams kyi zla ba phyed lus pa nyid la'o zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: Therefore, it is said that it is the half-month remaining of the seasons.

original: gso sbyong gsum pa la 'dis ni tshes bcu bzhi pa nyid byas par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: gso sbyong gsum pa la 'dis ni tshes bcu bzhi pa nyid byas par rig par bya'o //
translated: By this, it should be known that the fourteenth day is used.

original: zla ba shol dor ba ni rgyal po'i rjes su 'brang bas so //
analyzed: zla ba shol dor ba ni rgyal po'i rjes su 'brang bas so //
translated: The intercalary month is followed by the king.

original: rgyu skar ni skar mkhan gyi rjes su 'brang @89b bas shes par bya'o //
analyzed: rgyu skar ni skar mkhan gyi rjes su 'brang @89b bas shes par bya'o //
translated: The lunar mansion should be known by following the astrologers.

original: 'di la dgos pa ni tha snyad la mkhas par bya ba'o zhes bya ba la tshes grangs brjod par bya ba la sogs pa 'di la dgos pa ni 'jig rten pa'i tha snyad la mkhas par bya ba dang / tshes 'das pa sems la gzhag par bya ba dang /
analyzed: 'di la dgos pa ni tha snyad la mkhas par bya ba'o zhes bya ba la tshes grangs brjod par bya ba la sogs pa 'di la dgos pa ni 'jig rten pa'i tha snyad la mkhas par bya ba dang / tshes 'das pa sems la gzhag par bya ba dang /
translated: The purpose of this expression of the date and so on is to become skilled in worldly conventions, to keep the past date in mind,

original: gso sbyong gi nyi ma yongs su shes par bya ba yin no //
analyzed: gso sbyong gi nyi ma yongs su shes par bya ba yin no //
translated: and to understand the date of the poṣadha.

original: ma brtags shing gso sbyong la ma bsdad par 'di ni spong ba zhig go snyam nas mtshams gcad par mi bya'o zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: ma brtags shing gso sbyong la ma bsdad par 'di ni spong ba zhig go snyam nas mtshams gcad par mi bya'o zhes bya ba ni /
translated: One should not delimit the boundary thinking, “This is the boundary,” without examining and remaining in the poṣadha.

original: brtag cing mtshams bcad dam 'on te ma bcad ces de ltar brtag cing gso sbyong gi nyi ma la ma bab kyi bar du bsdad de bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: brtag cing mtshams bcad dam 'on te ma bcad ces de ltar brtag cing gso sbyong gi nyi ma la ma bab kyi bar du bsdad de bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: This means that one should examine whether the boundary has been delimited or not, and remain until the date of the poṣadha.

original: bcad pa nyid du shes pa ni mi chags pa'i yan lag ma yin no zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: bcad pa nyid du shes pa ni mi chags pa'i yan lag ma yin no zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Knowing that it has been delimited is not a condition for non-attachment.

original: bag yangs su ma byas par gcad pa gzhan ni mi 'chags pa kho na'o zhes gang bstan pa de la shes pa de yan lag ma yin te /
analyzed: bag yangs su ma byas par gcad pa gzhan ni mi 'chags pa kho na'o zhes gang bstan pa de la shes pa de yan lag ma yin te /
translated: The other types of suspension are not lifted by the same means.🔽The knowledge of that is not a branch.🔽If the boundary has already been established, the so-called “lifting of the boundary” is not known.

original: 'di ltar mtshams bcad zin pa yod na bag yangs su grags pa zhes bya ba mi shes pa nyid la yang de rig par bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ltar mtshams bcad zin pa yod na bag yangs su grags pa zhes bya ba mi shes pa nyid la yang de rig par bya'o //
translated: It should be understood that the boundary is lifted by the absence of that knowledge.

original: de med pa nyid kyis kyang bag yangs su 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: de med pa nyid kyis kyang bag yangs su 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The boundary is lifted by the absence of that knowledge.

original: las gang zhig bag yangs su nyid kyis rtsa ba'i gzhi las smos pa /
analyzed: las gang zhig bag yangs su nyid kyis rtsa ba'i gzhi las smos pa /
translated: The action of lifting the boundary is mentioned in the root text.

original: de la ltos pa kyang gi sgra 'di yin no //
analyzed: de la ltos pa kyang gi sgra 'di yin no //
translated: The word “also” refers to that.

original: de'i sgras ni mtshams dgrol ba la ltos pa'am 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi don gyis nye bar gnas pa rnams kyang nye bar bzung ba'o //
analyzed: de'i sgras ni mtshams dgrol ba la ltos pa'am 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi don gyis nye bar gnas pa rnams kyang nye bar bzung ba'o //
translated: The word “also” indicates that the boundary is lifted not only by the absence of that knowledge, but also by the presence of the meaning.

original: gang dag gi mtshams de'i nang na gcig kyang ma lus pa zhes bya ba ni mtshams de med pa'o //
analyzed: gang dag gi mtshams de'i nang na gcig kyang ma lus pa zhes bya ba ni mtshams de med pa'o //
translated: Those for whom not even one remains within that boundary means that the boundary does not exist.

original: de'i dngos po ni de nyid med pa'o //
analyzed: de'i dngos po ni de nyid med pa'o //
translated: The state of that is the absence of that.

original: de bas kyang mtshams kyi bag yangs su bya ba'o //
analyzed: de bas kyang mtshams kyi bag yangs su bya ba'o //
translated: Therefore, it is also a relaxation in the border area.

original: las rnam par lngas de med pa nyid kyis kyang bag yangs su sgrub pa byed pa gcig pur ma zad kyi /
analyzed: las rnam par lngas de med pa nyid kyis kyang bag yangs su sgrub pa byed pa gcig pur ma zad kyi /
translated: By five actions, it is also a relaxation due to the absence of that, not only by the single performance of the rite.

original: dge 'dun thams cad dong ba thams cad mtshan pa dang zhing ma yin pa nyid ltung ba thob pa dang rnam par 'khrugs par gyur pa dang shi bas so //
analyzed: dge 'dun thams cad dong ba thams cad mtshan pa dang zhing ma yin pa nyid ltung ba thob pa dang rnam par 'khrugs par gyur pa dang shi bas so //
translated: The entire saṃgha has departed, all the signs are absent, there is the attainment of downfalls, there is a state of disturbance, and there is death.

original: gnas su gzhag ste sems kyis dkyil 'khor pa gang gis byin gyis brlab pa de bas na /
analyzed: gnas su gzhag ste sems kyis dkyil 'khor pa gang gis byin gyis brlab pa de bas na /
translated: Having been placed in a location, by the mind, by whom is there consecration of the maṇḍala? Therefore,

original: gnas khang der de med pa nyid kyis kyang 'di la de med pa der rang nyid kyis ni ma yin no //
analyzed: gnas khang der de med pa nyid kyis kyang 'di la de med pa der rang nyid kyis ni ma yin no //
translated: in that location, by the absence of that, it is a relaxation here, not by oneself.

original: rung pa'i khang pa yang ngo zhes bya ba ni de med pa nyid kyis kyang bag yangs su 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: rung pa'i khang pa yang ngo zhes bya ba ni de med pa nyid kyis kyang bag yangs su 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ste /
translated: It is also a suitable house, it is said. By the absence of that, there is also a relaxation.

original: mdo snga ma las nye bar gzhag pa la kyang gi sgras ni 'dir bsdus pa la rig @90a * //
analyzed: mdo snga ma las nye bar gzhag pa la kyang gi sgras ni 'dir bsdus pa la rig @90a * //
translated: In the previous sūtra, by the word also in the placement, here it is understood in the inclusion.

original: par bya'o // las dang de med pa nyid 'dis kyang zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: par bya'o // las dang de med pa nyid 'dis kyang zhes bya ba'o //
translated: This is the meaning.

original: mtshams su mtshams kyis bskor du mi rung ngo zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: mtshams su mtshams kyis bskor du mi rung ngo zhes bya ba ni /
translated: It is not suitable to surround the boundary with a boundary.

original: ma grags pa'i tshig 'di las byas su zin kyang ma byas pa nyid du rigs par bya'o //
analyzed: ma grags pa'i tshig 'di las byas su zin kyang ma byas pa nyid du rigs par bya'o //
translated: Even though this is a word that is not well known, it should be understood that even if the boundary is made, it is not suitable.

original: dkyil 'khor ba dang dge slong ma'i dbyar khod dag dang khron pa dag pa ni rung ngo zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: dkyil 'khor ba dang dge slong ma'i dbyar khod dag dang khron pa dag pa ni rung ngo zhes bya ba la /
translated: The boundary of the mandala, the boundary of the nuns' rainy season retreat, and the boundary of the well are suitable.

original: 'di dag ni yul gyi bdun pa'o //
analyzed: 'di dag ni yul gyi bdun pa'o //
translated: These are the seven boundaries of the country.

original: yul 'di la mtshams gang zhig de la gang zhig bskor du rung ba zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: yul 'di la mtshams gang zhig de la gang zhig bskor du rung ba zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is: in this country, which boundary is suitable to surround which?

original: shing ljon pa gcig la mtshan bzhi man chad kyis mu shugs du ma rnam par gnas so zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: shing ljon pa gcig la mtshan bzhi man chad kyis mu shugs du ma rnam par gnas so zhes bya ba la /
translated: Up to four signs on one tree, many boundaries are established.

original: mtshams bzhi man chad kyi zhes bya ba ni gsal ba nyid du khas blangs nas 'di smos so //
analyzed: mtshams bzhi man chad kyi zhes bya ba ni gsal ba nyid du khas blangs nas 'di smos so //
translated: Up to four boundaries is stated for the sake of clarity.

original: rnam pa bzhi shing ljon pa'i rnam par dbye ba shin tu yang gsal ba zhes bya ba ni shin tu yang mang po'i mtshams rnams la rnam par gnas pa nyid yod pa'o //
analyzed: rnam pa bzhi shing ljon pa'i rnam par dbye ba shin tu yang gsal ba zhes bya ba ni shin tu yang mang po'i mtshams rnams la rnam par gnas pa nyid yod pa'o //
translated: The four aspects are very clear in the form of a tree.

original: 'di la tha snyad du rung ba mtshan ma nyid yin no zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: 'di la tha snyad du rung ba mtshan ma nyid yin no zhes bya ba la /
translated: The sign is just conventional.

original: 'di la zhes bya ba ni mtshams la'o //
analyzed: 'di la zhes bya ba ni mtshams la'o //
translated: Here means in the boundary.

original: rdzu 'phrul dang sgyur ma byas pa dag kyang de ltar gyur pa nyid ma yin no zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul dang sgyur ma byas pa dag kyang de ltar gyur pa nyid ma yin no zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Even the magical creations of miracles are not like that.

original: tha snyid ma yin pa nyid du byas pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: tha snyid ma yin pa nyid du byas pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that they are not conventional.

original: zla ba dang / nyi ma dang / skar ma'i 'od dan dba' klong gi rlabs dag kyang mi brtan pa nyi yin no zhes bya ba la ;
analyzed: zla ba dang / nyi ma dang / skar ma'i 'od dan dba' klong gi rlabs dag kyang mi brtan pa nyi yin no zhes bya ba la ;
translated: The light of the moon, sun, and stars, and the waves of the ocean are not stable.

original: brtan pa zhes bya ba 'di nyid kyis 'di rnams ma yin par dgag pa nyid ces bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: brtan pa zhes bya ba 'di nyid kyis 'di rnams ma yin par dgag pa nyid ces bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning of this very stability is that they are not like that.

original: mtshams dang ma 'byar ba la de'i mtshan ma nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: mtshams dang ma 'byar ba la de'i mtshan ma nyid ma yin no //
translated: The sign is not in the boundary or in the unconnected.

original: de lta bas na 'dir 'od ber rnams mngon pa brten pa zla ba la sogs pa la yang ma yin te /
analyzed: de lta bas na 'dir 'od ber rnams mngon pa brten pa zla ba la sogs pa la yang ma yin te /
translated: Therefore, here the light is not based on the moon, etc.,

original: 'dir dogs pa'i skabs med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'dir dogs pa'i skabs med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because there is no opportunity for doubt here.

original: 'dir de'i khyad par gyi ngo bos zla ba la sogs pa nye bar bzung ba'o //
analyzed: 'dir de'i khyad par gyi ngo bos zla ba la sogs pa nye bar bzung ba'o //
translated: Here, the moon, etc., are taken as the basis for the distinction of that.

original: de bzhin du dba' klong gi rlabs 'gram du 'byung ba zhes bya ba rtogs par bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du dba' klong gi rlabs 'gram du 'byung ba zhes bya ba rtogs par bya'o //
translated: In the same way, one should understand the statement, “The waves of the ocean occur on the shore.”

original: mtshams su chu ni mtshams gzhan dang 'dra'o zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: mtshams su chu ni mtshams gzhan dang 'dra'o zhes bya ba ni /
translated: “The water in the interval is like the other intervals” means🔽that if the water in the interval is interrupted, the intervals are different.

original: 'di la mtshams kyi nang du chus chod na mtshams tha dad pa nyid de zhes bya ba 'di la de'i mtshams kyi nang du ltung ba gcig pur ma zad de /
analyzed: 'di la mtshams kyi nang du chus chod na mtshams tha dad pa nyid de zhes bya ba 'di la de'i mtshams kyi nang du ltung ba gcig pur ma zad de /
translated: The meaning is that it is not only the falling in the interval of that which is different,

original: 'on kyang mtshams nyid tha dad pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: 'on kyang mtshams nyid tha dad pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: but also the intervals themselves are different.

original: 'di ni gnas byin gyis brlabs pa ste /
analyzed: 'di ni gnas byin gyis brlabs pa ste /
translated: This is the consecration of a place.

original: gang zhig mtshams la mngon par brten pa yin gyi /
analyzed: gang zhig mtshams la mngon par brten pa yin gyi /
translated: It is based on the interval,🔽but not on the interval itself.

original: chu la ni 'di rnams kyi gnas nyid @90b du byin gyis brlab par bya ba'i gnas nyid yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: chu la ni 'di rnams kyi gnas nyid @90b du byin gyis brlab par bya ba'i gnas nyid yod pa ma yin te /
translated: But in the case of water, there is no place that is blessed as a place for these to stand.

original: ji ltar bsten pa la 'ang yod pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar bsten pa la 'ang yod pa yin zhe na /
translated: How can there be a place for them to stand in the case of those who are not standing?

original: de'i phyi gnas par gyur pa ma yin pa nyid kyis so //
analyzed: de'i phyi gnas par gyur pa ma yin pa nyid kyis so //
translated: Because they are not standing in the water.

original: mtshams la de dang ldan pa nyid la ji srid du chus mi 'byer ba de srid du mtshams kyi yul ma yin no //
analyzed: mtshams la de dang ldan pa nyid la ji srid du chus mi 'byer ba de srid du mtshams kyi yul ma yin no //
translated: As long as the water does not separate, the place is not the place of the boundary.

original: chu med par gyur na mtshams de las skyes pa zhes bya bar rig par bya'o //🔽bar du chod na gcig pa nyid ma yin no zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: chu med par gyur na mtshams de las skyes pa zhes bya bar rig par bya'o // bar du chod na gcig pa nyid ma yin no zhes bya ba ni /
translated: But when the water disappears, the place is known as the place of the boundary.🔽If there is an obstruction, there is no single place.

original: gang du phyogs gcig gis kyang 'brel pa med par der mtshams gcig pa nyid las skyes par mi 'gyur zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: gang du phyogs gcig gis kyang 'brel pa med par der mtshams gcig pa nyid las skyes par mi 'gyur zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that if there is no connection even by one part, there is no single place of the boundary.

original: mtshams gcig la gnas pa ma yin pa de ltar rnam bar bcad pa'i char gnas pa du ma'i tshogs rnam par bcad nas cig car mtshams bcad pa las blang ba de lta bas na 'di lde ltar byed pa'o //
analyzed: mtshams gcig la gnas pa ma yin pa de ltar rnam bar bcad pa'i char gnas pa du ma'i tshogs rnam par bcad nas cig car mtshams bcad pa las blang ba de lta bas na 'di lde ltar byed pa'o //
translated: It is not a place that remains for a while. Thus, having eliminated the collection of many places that are eliminated as parts, it is taken from the simultaneous elimination of boundaries. Therefore, it is done in this way.

original: gal te zam pa brtan po yin na de yul nyid yin no zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: gal te zam pa brtan po yin na de yul nyid yin no zhes bya ba la /
translated: If the bridge is firm, that is the place.

original: 'dir gzhung ni btsun pa chab kyi mtshams las 'dar rung ngam ;
analyzed: 'dir gzhung ni btsun pa chab kyi mtshams las 'dar rung ngam ;
translated: Here, the text is: Venerable, is it permissible to cross the river?

original: nye ba 'khor mi rung ngo //
analyzed: nye ba 'khor mi rung ngo //
translated: Upāli said, It is not permissible.

original: gal te zam pa brtan po yod na ni rung ngo zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: gal te zam pa brtan po yod na ni rung ngo zhes gsungs so //
translated: If there is a firm bridge, it is permissible.

original: de bzhin na yang phyir ba yin ni rjes su 'jug go zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: de bzhin na yang phyir ba yin ni rjes su 'jug go zhes bya ba la /
translated: Even so, if there is a return, it is allowed.

original: de zhes bya ba ni zam pa'o //
analyzed: de zhes bya ba ni zam pa'o //
translated: Here, that refers to the bridge.

original: ji lta bu zhig pa dang phyis bya zhe na /
analyzed: ji lta bu zhig pa dang phyis bya zhe na /
translated: What kind of return is it? What should be done later?

original: de'i phyir sbyor ba ma btang ba nyid do zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: de'i phyir sbyor ba ma btang ba nyid do zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: Therefore, it is said, as long as the practice is not given up.

original: yang phyir bya ba gang la spyor ba ma btang ba zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: yang phyir bya ba gang la spyor ba ma btang ba zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning of as long as the practice is not given up is the practice of what should be done later.

original: dus ji srid du sbyor ba ma btang ba nyid kyang phyi bya nas rjes su 'jug ce na /
analyzed: dus ji srid du sbyor ba ma btang ba nyid kyang phyi bya nas rjes su 'jug ce na /
translated: And for how long does the application of the vow remain?

original: de'i phyi zhag bdun phan chad ni mi 'jug go zhes bya bas mos te //
analyzed: de'i phyi zhag bdun phan chad ni mi 'jug go zhes bya bas mos te //
translated: It is said that it remains for seven days, and it is not applied beyond that.

original: mi 'jug go zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: mi 'jug go zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: It is not applied beyond that.

original: nam mkha' ni bar du chad pa gyur pa yin pas de la yod pa nyid kyi tha snyad kyang med na 'brel pa lta ga la yod ces bya ba la /
analyzed: nam mkha' ni bar du chad pa gyur pa yin pas de la yod pa nyid kyi tha snyad kyang med na 'brel pa lta ga la yod ces bya ba la /
translated: Space is interrupted, and if there is no convention of existence in it, how much less could there be a connection?

original: de la zhes bya ba ni nam mkha' la'o //
analyzed: de la zhes bya ba ni nam mkha' la'o //
translated: In it refers to space.

original: sa dang de dang 'brel pa'i rang gi cha yang rung ste /
analyzed: sa dang de dang 'brel pa'i rang gi cha yang rung ste /
translated: The earth and its connected parts are not connected by one boundary.

original: 'di la gnyis ka'i cha la yang mtshams gcig gis 'brel pa ma yin no //
analyzed: 'di la gnyis ka'i cha la yang mtshams gcig gis 'brel pa ma yin no //
translated: In this, both parts are not connected by one boundary.

original: 'dir gnas khang gi nang na 'dug pa'i gnam mkha' yang mtshams la 'jug pa ma yin te /
analyzed: 'dir gnas khang gi nang na 'dug pa'i gnam mkha' yang mtshams la 'jug pa ma yin te /
translated: Here, the space in the house is not connected by the boundary,

original: mtshams gcig pa nyid kyang ma yin te de 'dir de ltar bas na de byed pa'o //
analyzed: mtshams gcig pa nyid kyang ma yin te de 'dir de ltar bas na de byed pa'o //
translated: and it is not one boundary. Since it is so here, it is that way in the world.

original: 'dir gzhung ni btsun pa nam mkha' la mchis pa dag dang / dogs la mchis pa dag lhan cig las bgyir rung ngam /
analyzed: 'dir gzhung ni btsun pa nam mkha' la mchis pa dag dang / dogs la mchis pa dag lhan cig las bgyir rung ngam /
translated: Here, the text is: “Is it proper for monks who are in the sky and those who are on the ground to do the poṣadha ceremony together?”

original: nye ba 'khor mi rung ngo zhes @91a * //
analyzed: nye ba 'khor mi rung ngo zhes @91a * //
translated: “Upāli, it is not proper.”

original: gsungs pa gang yin pa dang / gang yangs dang de dang 'brel ba rnams kyis mi rung ba nyid de la ni bsdus pa'o //
analyzed: gsungs pa gang yin pa dang / gang yangs dang de dang 'brel ba rnams kyis mi rung ba nyid de la ni bsdus pa'o //
translated: “What is not proper is included in that.”

original: dbus nas dpag tshad phyed dang gsum gyi mtha' las lhag par mtshams bcad pa mi 'chags so zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: dbus nas dpag tshad phyed dang gsum gyi mtha' las lhag par mtshams bcad pa mi 'chags so zhes bya ba ni /
translated: “A boundary that is more than one and a half leagues from the center is not established.”

original: dpag tshad phyed dang gsum gyi mtha' tshun chad du zhes bya ba gang zhig smos pa gang zhig ma grags pa yang de las 'da' bar byed pa la ltung ba med pa tsam zhes bya ba de la 'di bstan pa'o //
analyzed: dpag tshad phyed dang gsum gyi mtha' tshun chad du zhes bya ba gang zhig smos pa gang zhig ma grags pa yang de las 'da' bar byed pa la ltung ba med pa tsam zhes bya ba de la 'di bstan pa'o //
translated: “Up to one and a half leagues” is stated. If one goes beyond what is not well known, there is no offense. This is taught in that.

original: btsun pa mtshams chen po'i tshad ji tsam lags /
analyzed: btsun pa mtshams chen po'i tshad ji tsam lags /
translated: “Venerable, what is the measure of a great boundary?”

original: nye ba 'khor dpag tshad phyed dang gsum mo //
analyzed: nye ba 'khor dpag tshad phyed dang gsum mo //
translated: “Upāli, one and a half leagues.”

original: btsun pa dpag tshad phyed dang gsum phan chad mtshams su rung ngam /
analyzed: btsun pa dpag tshad phyed dang gsum phan chad mtshams su rung ngam /
translated: Is it proper to establish the boundary up to half a krośa or three and a half krośas?

original: nye ba 'khor mi rung ngo zhes gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: nye ba 'khor mi rung ngo zhes gsungs pa yin no //
translated: Upagupta said, “It is not proper.”

original: der gang zhig tshad 'di brjod pa ni zhu ba las gsungs pa de 'dis bsdus pa yin no //
analyzed: der gang zhig tshad 'di brjod pa ni zhu ba las gsungs pa de 'dis bsdus pa yin no //
translated: The measure stated in the Questions of Upāli is included in this.

original: 'og dang steng du sra ba dang 'brel pa la gzhi dang 'dra ba nyid do zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: 'og dang steng du sra ba dang 'brel pa la gzhi dang 'dra ba nyid do zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The ground is similar to that which is connected to the hard earth above and below.🔽The ground is similar to that which is connected to the hard earth above and below, such as earth, stone, walls, trees, wood, and so on, up to three and a half krośas.

original: dpag tshad phyed dang gsum gyi mtha' yan chad dang man chad sa dang rdo dang rtsig pa dang shing ljon pa dang / shing la sogs pa'i sra ba dang 'brel pa'i rdzas gang yin pa la ni de'i rang bzhin can gyi 'brel pa la gzhi dang ldan pa bzhin du mtshams la yod pa'o //
analyzed: dpag tshad phyed dang gsum gyi mtha' yan chad dang man chad sa dang rdo dang rtsig pa dang shing ljon pa dang / shing la sogs pa'i sra ba dang 'brel pa'i rdzas gang yin pa la ni de'i rang bzhin can gyi 'brel pa la gzhi dang ldan pa bzhin du mtshams la yod pa'o //
translated: The boundary has that nature.

original: mtshams chen po'i dbang du byas nas tshig de'o //
analyzed: mtshams chen po'i dbang du byas nas tshig de'o //
translated: The words are from the perspective of the great boundary.

original: gzhan du ji ltar bris pa bzhin du zhes rtogs par bya'o //
analyzed: gzhan du ji ltar bris pa bzhin du zhes rtogs par bya'o //
translated: Otherwise, it should be understood as written.

original: de ltar yang dkyil 'khor la ni tshad gzhan dang 'brel pa gang yin pa de la der zhugs pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de ltar yang dkyil 'khor la ni tshad gzhan dang 'brel pa gang yin pa de la der zhugs pa ma yin no //
translated: Thus, in the case of a mandala, that which is related to another measure is not entered into it.

original: de yongs su spongs pas yang mtshams las skyes par rig par mi bya'o //
analyzed: de yongs su spongs pas yang mtshams las skyes par rig par mi bya'o //
translated: By abandoning that, one should not know that it is produced from the boundary.

original: sa gzhi mtshams ma bcad pa nyid du mi 'bral ba'i gnang ba mi 'chags so zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: sa gzhi mtshams ma bcad pa nyid du mi 'bral ba'i gnang ba mi 'chags so zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The ground is not the place for the permission of non-separation without a boundary being set.

original: bcos ma'i gnas su mi 'bral ba'i gnang ba'i yul yin pa de bas de de la 'di bstan pa'o //
analyzed: bcos ma'i gnas su mi 'bral ba'i gnang ba'i yul yin pa de bas de de la 'di bstan pa'o //
translated: Since it is the place for the permission of non-separation in a constructed place, that is taught there.

original: zhu ba las 'di dang por byas te des ni de mi zhig go zhes bya ba'i mthar thug pa'o //
analyzed: zhu ba las 'di dang por byas te des ni de mi zhig go zhes bya ba'i mthar thug pa'o //
translated: This is done first in the request, and by that, it is not destroyed, up to the end.

original: bcad pa zhig na zhig go zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: bcad pa zhig na zhig go zhes bya ba la /
translated: If the boundary is destroyed, it is destroyed.

original: zhig pa ni mtshams bcad pa las grol ba'o //
analyzed: zhig pa ni mtshams bcad pa las grol ba'o //
translated: Destruction is being released from the set boundary.

original: de zhig na mi 'bral ba'i gnang ba zhig go //
analyzed: de zhig na mi 'bral ba'i gnang ba zhig go //
translated: If that is destroyed, the permission of non-separation is destroyed.

original: des ni de mi zhig ga zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: des ni de mi zhig ga zhes bya ba ni /
translated: By that, it is not destroyed.

original: mi 'bral ba'i gnang ba zhig pa des ni mtshams bcad pa de mi zhig pa'o //
analyzed: mi 'bral ba'i gnang ba zhig pa des ni mtshams bcad pa de mi zhig pa'o //
translated: By the destruction of the permission of non-separation, that boundary is not destroyed.

original: mchod rten dang / gtsug lag khang dang / gtsang khang phyur bu @91b dang 'khor sa dang / gso sbyong gi gnas dag tu phyag dar bya ba nyid do zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: mchod rten dang / gtsug lag khang dang / gtsang khang phyur bu @91b dang 'khor sa dang / gso sbyong gi gnas dag tu phyag dar bya ba nyid do zhes bya ba ni /
translated: It is sweeping the stūpas, temples, and the inner sanctum of the temple, the circumambulation walkway, and the site of the poṣadha ceremony.

original: 'dir phyag dar bya ba ni gnas khang ngam khyams sam rdzing bu'i tshad tsam zhig phyags na phyag dar byas pa nyid du shes par bya zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: 'dir phyag dar bya ba ni gnas khang ngam khyams sam rdzing bu'i tshad tsam zhig phyags na phyag dar byas pa nyid du shes par bya zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Here, sweeping is understood to be sweeping an area the size of a room, courtyard, or pond.

original: 'di ni ma mo las nyes byas te /
analyzed: 'di ni ma mo las nyes byas te /
translated: This is a minor offense from the Mātṛkā.

original: nad pas zhes bya ba dang por bya ste /
analyzed: nad pas zhes bya ba dang por bya ste /
translated: The first is “by a sick person,”

original: gnas zhes bya ba'i mthar thug pa dang / phul ba nyid ces bya ba la sogs pa'i mdo 'di ni zhus pa las so //🔽dge 'dun la 'dun pa la sogs pa phul ba ni phul ba nyid yin no zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: gnas zhes bya ba'i mthar thug pa dang / phul ba nyid ces bya ba la sogs pa'i mdo 'di ni zhus pa las so // dge 'dun la 'dun pa la sogs pa phul ba ni phul ba nyid yin no zhes bya ba ni /
translated: and the last is “in a dwelling,” and the sūtra on “offering” and so on is from the questions.🔽“Offering” means offering to the Saṅgha and so on.

original: gang zag la 'dun pa la sogs pa'i tshig lhug pa las phul ba gsungs pa yin te /
analyzed: gang zag la 'dun pa la sogs pa'i tshig lhug pa las phul ba gsungs pa yin te /
translated: The term “offering” is used for offering to an individual.

original: de bas na dge 'dun la phul ba nyid la ma phul ba nyid du la la zhig dogs par 'gyur pa de bas na /
analyzed: de bas na dge 'dun la phul ba nyid la ma phul ba nyid du la la zhig dogs par 'gyur pa de bas na /
translated: Therefore, some may doubt that what is offered to the Saṅgha is not actually offered.

original: de bzlog pa'i don du 'di gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: de bzlog pa'i don du 'di gsungs pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, this is stated for the purpose of countering that.

original: de las gang yang rung bas de brjod par bya ba nyid yin no zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: de las gang yang rung bas de brjod par bya ba nyid yin no zhes bya ba la /
translated: It should be announced by anyone of them.

original: de las zhes bya ba ni dge 'dun las so //🔽gang du 'di la phul ba de yod par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de las zhes bya ba ni dge 'dun las so // gang du 'di la phul ba de yod par 'gyur ro //
translated: “From that” means from the Saṅgha.🔽“That” refers to the Saṅgha.

original: de brjod par bya ba nyid yin no zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: de brjod par bya ba nyid yin no zhes bya ba la /
translated: “It should be announced” means it should be announced by the one who offers.

original: de zhes bya ba ni dge 'dun la 'dun pa la sogs pa phul ba de'o //
analyzed: de zhes bya ba ni dge 'dun la 'dun pa la sogs pa phul ba de'o //
translated: “That” refers to the offering of robes, etc. to the Saṅgha.

original: 'o na brjod pa 'di don med pa kho na yin te /
analyzed: 'o na brjod pa 'di don med pa kho na yin te /
translated: But then this announcement is meaningless,

original: 'dir smra ba po 'byung ba ni mi rigs pa kho na ste /
analyzed: 'dir smra ba po 'byung ba ni mi rigs pa kho na ste /
translated: because it is not reasonable for the speaker to arise here.

original: gang gi phyir go ba bskyed pa'i don du 'di ni mngon sum nyid du phul ba pos go ba bskyed do zhe na /
analyzed: gang gi phyir go ba bskyed pa'i don du 'di ni mngon sum nyid du phul ba pos go ba bskyed do zhe na /
translated: For the purpose of generating understanding, the one who offers should generate understanding by direct perception.

original: de ni bden mod kyi 'on kyang cho ga la 'jug pa la phul ba ma byas pa nyid do //
analyzed: de ni bden mod kyi 'on kyang cho ga la 'jug pa la phul ba ma byas pa nyid do //
translated: That is true, but still, the one who offers has not actually entered the ritual.

original: de lta bas na 'dir de thob pa'o //
analyzed: de lta bas na 'dir de thob pa'o //
translated: Therefore, it is obtained here.

original: mtshams kyi phyi rol na gnas pas de 'bul ba dang 'bul du gzhug par mi bya'o zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: mtshams kyi phyi rol na gnas pas de 'bul ba dang 'bul du gzhug par mi bya'o zhes bya ba la /
translated: One should not offer it or cause it to be offered by one who is outside the boundary.

original: de zhes bya ba ni 'dun pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: de zhes bya ba ni 'dun pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: Here, it refers to the desire, etc.

original: mi chags pa mi bya'o zhes bya ba de'i 'di spros pa yin no //
analyzed: mi chags pa mi bya'o zhes bya ba de'i 'di spros pa yin no //
translated: One should not be indifferent is an elaboration on that.

original: mtshams gzhan na gnas pa ni gang la yang yan lag nyid ma yin no zhes gsungs pa des 'dir mi 'chags pa byas pa nyid yin no //
analyzed: mtshams gzhan na gnas pa ni gang la yang yan lag nyid ma yin no zhes gsungs pa des 'dir mi 'chags pa byas pa nyid yin no //
translated: Since it is said that one who is outside another boundary is not a limb for any, here it is not confessed.

original: brgyud pas mi bya 'o zhes bya ba ni 'bul ba dang 'bul du gzhug par bya zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: brgyud pas mi bya 'o zhes bya ba ni 'bul ba dang 'bul du gzhug par bya zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: One should not do it indirectly means that one should not offer it or cause it to be offered.

original: len par byed pas gzhan la phul ba des kyang gzhan zhig la 'bul ba ni brgyud pa yin no //
analyzed: len par byed pas gzhan la phul ba des kyang gzhan zhig la 'bul ba ni brgyud pa yin no //
translated: Indirectly means that one who is offered by another to a recipient offers it to another.

original: na ba dang dbang med pa dang srog dang tshangs par spyod pa'i bar chad kyis 'jigs pa las gzhan pas 'bul ba la nyes byas so zhes bya ba ni 'dun pa la @92a * //
analyzed: na ba dang dbang med pa dang srog dang tshangs par spyod pa'i bar chad kyis 'jigs pa las gzhan pas 'bul ba la nyes byas so zhes bya ba ni 'dun pa la @92a * //
translated: Except for one who is sick, powerless, or afraid of an obstacle to life or pure conduct, there is an offense of wrong conduct for offering to another.Here, desire refers to the desire to confess.

original: sogs pa 'di rnams gzhan la 'bul ba la ni nyes byas su 'gyur te /
analyzed: sogs pa 'di rnams gzhan la 'bul ba la ni nyes byas su 'gyur te /
translated: The offense of wrong conduct arises for one who offers these to others.

original: 'bul ba mi 'chags pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: 'bul ba mi 'chags pa ni ma yin no //
translated: But it is not that one should not offer them.

original: de tsam gyi dbang gis dge ba'i phyogs kyi bar chad 'byung bar 'gyur ba de yang 'dir tshangs par spyod pa'i bar chad yin par rig par bya ste zhes bya ba'i sgras bsdus par rnam par gnas pa yin no //
analyzed: de tsam gyi dbang gis dge ba'i phyogs kyi bar chad 'byung bar 'gyur ba de yang 'dir tshangs par spyod pa'i bar chad yin par rig par bya ste zhes bya ba'i sgras bsdus par rnam par gnas pa yin no //
translated: And that obstacle to the virtuous side which arises through that much should be known here as an obstacle to pure conduct.

original: de ltar yang bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos kyi dge 'dun ni don nyung ba bya ba nyung ba yin pas zhes bya ba ni ma 'ongs pa la rgyu bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: de ltar yang bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos kyi dge 'dun ni don nyung ba bya ba nyung ba yin pas zhes bya ba ni ma 'ongs pa la rgyu bstan pa yin no //
translated: The Blessed One’s śrāvaka saṃgha has little business and few affairs. This shows the cause for the future.

original: de bas na de tsam nyid kyis kyang 'dir phul ba nyid bstan par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: de bas na de tsam nyid kyis kyang 'dir phul ba nyid bstan par rig par bya'o //
translated: Therefore, even by that much, it should be understood that offering is taught here.

original: ma brjod na ni ma gus pa las so zhes bya ba ni 'dun pa la sogs pa blangs pa ma brjod na ni ma gus pa'i ltung byed kyi rjes su mthun pa las nyes byas su 'gyur ba'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: ma brjod na ni ma gus pa las so zhes bya ba ni 'dun pa la sogs pa blangs pa ma brjod na ni ma gus pa'i ltung byed kyi rjes su mthun pa las nyes byas su 'gyur ba'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that if one does not announce the acceptance of desire, etc., it is a fault of disrespect, a minor offense.

original: des 'jigs pas mtshams kyi phyi rol nas khyer te 'ongs pa la ni nyes pa med do zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: des 'jigs pas mtshams kyi phyi rol nas khyer te 'ongs pa la ni nyes pa med do zhes bya ba la /
translated: There is no offense if one brings it from outside the boundary out of fear of that.

original: des zhes bya ba ni srog dang tshangs par spyod pa'i bar chad kyis 'jigs pas dgra dang phrad pa la sogs pas yid la byed pa 'joms pa gang yin pa de yang 'dir tshangs par spyod pa'i bar chad du rnam par gnas pa yin no //
analyzed: des zhes bya ba ni srog dang tshangs par spyod pa'i bar chad kyis 'jigs pas dgra dang phrad pa la sogs pas yid la byed pa 'joms pa gang yin pa de yang 'dir tshangs par spyod pa'i bar chad du rnam par gnas pa yin no //
translated: That means that if one is afraid of an obstacle to life or pure conduct, and if one's attention is destroyed by encountering enemies, etc., that is also considered here to be an obstacle to pure conduct.

original: dge skos kyis gso sbyong gi tshe tshul shing brim pas dge slong rnams bgrang bar bya'o //
analyzed: dge skos kyis gso sbyong gi tshe tshul shing brim pas dge slong rnams bgrang bar bya'o //
translated: When the duties of the community are being performed, the monks should be counted by the monk in charge of the duties.

original: legs par thon pas gdon te tshig phyed kyang ma 'khrul ba nyid na'o zhes bya ba ni gso sbyong la'o //
analyzed: legs par thon pas gdon te tshig phyed kyang ma 'khrul ba nyid na'o zhes bya ba ni gso sbyong la'o //
translated: If it is well-done, it is removed. Even if it is half-said, it is removed if it is not mistaken. This refers to the purification ceremony.

original: so sor thar pa bton pas ni gso sbyong las bton pa nyid do //
analyzed: so sor thar pa bton pas ni gso sbyong las bton pa nyid do //
translated: By reciting the Pratimoksa, it is taken from the Poṣadhasthāpanavastu.

original: de bas na so sor thar pa las zhes bya ba 'dir skyes pa nyid do //
analyzed: de bas na so sor thar pa las zhes bya ba 'dir skyes pa nyid do //
translated: Therefore, it is said here that it is taken from the Pratimoksa.

original: byed pa po gang la bstan pa 'di las yin nam zhe na /
analyzed: byed pa po gang la bstan pa 'di las yin nam zhe na /
translated: To whom is this teaching addressed?

original: de'i phyir dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyis so //
analyzed: de'i phyir dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyis so //
translated: Therefore, it is said, “by the sthavira of the saṃgha.”🔽If he is unable, then by the second,

original: mi nus pa nyid yin na gnyis pa'i 'o zhes bya ba ni gnas brtan gyis bton pa'o //🔽des kyang gsum pa'i 'o zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: mi nus pa nyid yin na gnyis pa'i 'o zhes bya ba ni gnas brtan gyis bton pa'o // des kyang gsum pa'i 'o zhes bya ba ni /
translated: meaning by the sthavira.🔽If he also is unable, then by the third,

original: gnyis pa des kyang mi nus pa nyid yin na gsum pas bstan par bya'o //🔽des kyang na res kyis so zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: gnyis pa des kyang mi nus pa nyid yin na gsum pas bstan par bya'o // des kyang na res kyis so zhes bya ba ni /
translated: meaning by the second.🔽If he also is unable, then by turns,

original: gsum pa des kyang mi nus pa nyid yin na res kyis gdon par bya'o //
analyzed: gsum pa des kyang mi nus pa nyid yin na res kyis gdon par bya'o //
translated: meaning by the third.🔽If he also is unable, then it should be recited by turns.🔽Here, the sthavira of the saṃgha obtains the state of the teacher.

original: 'dir dge 'dun gyis gnas brtan la ston pa'i gnas pa thob pa nyid ji ltar yang 'dir mtha' gnyis dang bral ba de ltar rnam par gnas pa de'i 'og tu zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: 'dir dge 'dun gyis gnas brtan la ston pa'i gnas pa thob pa nyid ji ltar yang 'dir mtha' gnyis dang bral ba de ltar rnam par gnas pa de'i 'og tu zhes bya ba la /
translated: Just as he is free from the two extremes, so he is established. After that,

original: gsum po de las 'og tu tshig gdon par mi nus na'o //
analyzed: gsum po de las 'og tu tshig gdon par mi nus na'o //
translated: It is not possible to recite the words below those three.

original: mi nus @92b na gzhan la bcol bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: mi nus @92b na gzhan la bcol bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni /
translated: If it is not possible, it should be entrusted to another.

original: res bab pa'i tshe 'don mi nus na gdon pa gzhan la bcol bar bya'o //🔽ma btub na dge 'dun gyis so zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: res bab pa'i tshe 'don mi nus na gdon pa gzhan la bcol bar bya'o // ma btub na dge 'dun gyis so zhes bya ba ni /
translated: If it is not possible to recite at the appointed time, it should be entrusted to another reciter.🔽If it is not possible, it should be entrusted to the Saṅgha.

original: ma btub na dge 'dun gyis bcol bar bya'o //
analyzed: ma btub na dge 'dun gyis bcol bar bya'o //
translated: If it is not possible, it should be entrusted to the Saṅgha.

original: rtag tu yang ngo zhes bya ba ni dge 'dun gyis bcol bar bya'o zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: rtag tu yang ngo zhes bya ba ni dge 'dun gyis bcol bar bya'o zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: Always means it should be entrusted to the Saṅgha.

original: rdugs na lhag ma gzhan gyis so zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: rdugs na lhag ma gzhan gyis so zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: If it is difficult, it should be entrusted to another.

original: gdon pa zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: gdon pa zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: It should be entrusted.🔽If it is a partial recitation, it should be done with as many as are necessary.🔽If it is a partial recitation, it should be done with as many as are necessary to complete the recitation.

original: dum bu 'dzin pa nyid yin na ji snyed kyis 'grub pa dag gis so zhes bya ba ni ji snyed kyis gdon pa 'grub par 'gyur ba ste de snyed kyis ni rjes su bsgrubs par bya'o zhes bya bar dang bcas pa nyid yin na gnas mdzes par 'dod
analyzed: dum bu 'dzin pa nyid yin na ji snyed kyis 'grub pa dag gis so zhes bya ba ni ji snyed kyis gdon pa 'grub par 'gyur ba ste de snyed kyis ni rjes su bsgrubs par bya'o zhes bya bar dang bcas pa nyid yin na gnas mdzes par 'dod
translated: If it is a complete recitation, it should be done with as many as are desired for a beautiful dwelling.

original: pas grong dang mi nye bar gso sbyong byar mi rung ngo zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: pas grong dang mi nye bar gso sbyong byar mi rung ngo zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The statement, It is not proper to perform the poṣadha in a village that is not near a town,

original: sil bu dag las 'di dang por byas te /
analyzed: sil bu dag las 'di dang por byas te /
translated: is the first of the miscellaneous rules.

original: khyim bdag dang rgyal po dag la sogs pa'i mthar thug pa'o //
analyzed: khyim bdag dang rgyal po dag la sogs pa'i mthar thug pa'o //
translated: The last is the rule for householders and kings.

original: gzhan ni zhu ba las te /
analyzed: gzhan ni zhu ba las te /
translated: The other is from the request.

original: 'di ni las kyi sbyor ba gzhan la yang dpe tsam du zad do //
analyzed: 'di ni las kyi sbyor ba gzhan la yang dpe tsam du zad do //
translated: This is merely an example for another application of the rule.

original: 'gron pa mi sdod na 'gro ba bzhin du bya'o zhes bya ba ni mchong ba bzhin du de yid la 'dres par gyur na /
analyzed: 'gron pa mi sdod na 'gro ba bzhin du bya'o zhes bya ba ni mchong ba bzhin du de yid la 'dres par gyur na /
translated: The statement, If the guests do not stay, one should go like a leaper, means that if one is not satisfied with the mind,

original: gang zhig 'gro ba'i bya ba rnams kyis las byed pa'o //
analyzed: gang zhig 'gro ba'i bya ba rnams kyis las byed pa'o //
translated: one should perform the rite of going like a leaper.

original: de lta bas na mi srid pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba nyid la de rjes su gnang ba'o //🔽sgra mi 'dod na mdor bsdus pas so zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: de lta bas na mi srid pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba nyid la de rjes su gnang ba'o // sgra mi 'dod na mdor bsdus pas so zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Therefore, it is permitted to do that in the case of impossibility, but not otherwise.🔽The statement, If one does not desire the recitation, one should perform the poṣadha in brief,

original: gang dag 'dir sbyar ba de dag sgra mi 'dod na mdor bsdus pas gso sbyong bya ba'o //
analyzed: gang dag 'dir sbyar ba de dag sgra mi 'dod na mdor bsdus pas gso sbyong bya ba'o //
translated: means that if one does not desire the recitation, one should perform the poṣadha in brief.

original: de tsam yang na byin gyis brlab po zhes bya ba ni mdor bsdus pas bya ba la sgra ji tsam 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i sgra de tsam yang 'gron pa dag gis mi 'dod na so so nas byin gyis brlab par bya ste /
analyzed: de tsam yang na byin gyis brlab po zhes bya ba ni mdor bsdus pas bya ba la sgra ji tsam 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i sgra de tsam yang 'gron pa dag gis mi 'dod na so so nas byin gyis brlab par bya ste /
translated: If even that much is not possible, then one should perform the consecration by oneself. This means that if the monks do not wish to recite even that much of the text, then each one should perform the consecration by oneself.

original: 'khor dang bcas pa la sgra las grol ba med pas so so nas zhes bya bar bsgrub par bya'o //
analyzed: 'khor dang bcas pa la sgra las grol ba med pas so so nas zhes bya bar bsgrub par bya'o //
translated: Since there is no liberation from the sound for those with retinue, it should be established that each one means individually.

original: dad pa can dang gtso bo dag dga' bar 'gyur blta na cho ga rjes su bsgrub pa la kha na ma tho ba med do //
analyzed: dad pa can dang gtso bo dag dga' bar 'gyur blta na cho ga rjes su bsgrub pa la kha na ma tho ba med do //
translated: If it is done in this way, it is not a transgression to perform the purification ceremony in the presence of the faithful and the leaders, in order to please them.

original: drung du gso sbyong byas pa la yang ngo zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: drung du gso sbyong byas pa la yang ngo zhes bya ba ni /
translated: It is also so if the purification ceremony is performed in the presence of a sick person.

original: gnas mal gyi gzhi ra gtogs pa las 'dir gnyis po de dag grangs so //
analyzed: gnas mal gyi gzhi ra gtogs pa las 'dir gnyis po de dag grangs so //
translated: Here, these two are counted as belonging to the category of bedding.

original: phongs pa'i tshe khyim pa'i drung du bshags par bya'o zhes bya ba ni chom rkun pa dag la de skad gsungs pa yin mod kyi /
analyzed: phongs pa'i tshe khyim pa'i drung du bshags par bya'o zhes bya ba ni chom rkun pa dag la de skad gsungs pa yin mod kyi /
translated: If one is in a difficult situation, one should confess in the presence of a layperson. This was stated by the Blessed One to the thieves.

original: khyim pa gzhan dag la yang rung ba nyid yin pa'i phyir 'di rnam par gzhag go //
analyzed: khyim pa gzhan dag la yang rung ba nyid yin pa'i phyir 'di rnam par gzhag go //
translated: This is established because it is proper for other householders as well.

original: de lta bas na kyal ka can la sogs pa dang rtse rgod la sogs pa la @93a * //
analyzed: de lta bas na kyal ka can la sogs pa dang rtse rgod la sogs pa la @93a * //
translated: Therefore, for those who are frivolous, etc., and for those who are playful, etc.,

original: rgud pa de thob pa dang drung du'o //
analyzed: rgud pa de thob pa dang drung du'o //
translated: that misfortune is obtained and is nearby.

original: de lta bas na de dang nye bar 'brel lo //
analyzed: de lta bas na de dang nye bar 'brel lo //
translated: Therefore, it is related to that.

original: rab tu byung zhing bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa'i drung du yang de dag ni shin tu nyes pa med pas de las shes par bya'o //
analyzed: rab tu byung zhing bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa'i drung du yang de dag ni shin tu nyes pa med pas de las shes par bya'o //
translated: Even in the presence of one who has gone forth but has not yet completed the novitiate, those are completely faultless, so it should be understood from that.

original: de la cho ga rjes su bsgrags pa la yang ngo zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: de la cho ga rjes su bsgrags pa la yang ngo zhes bya ba la /
translated: There, even in the proclamation of the rite,

original: de la zhes bya ba ni khyim pa la'o //
analyzed: de la zhes bya ba ni khyim pa la'o //
translated: there, in the case of a householder.

original: cho ga zhes bya ba ni rab tu byung ba'i bslab pa rnams la yang ngo //
analyzed: cho ga zhes bya ba ni rab tu byung ba'i bslab pa rnams la yang ngo //
translated: The rite is also in the case of the precepts of one who has gone forth.

original: rgyal po la go bar bya ba la yang ngo zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: rgyal po la go bar bya ba la yang ngo zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Even in the case of informing the king,

original: cho ga dag rjes su thob par bya ba la kha na ma tho ba med de /
analyzed: cho ga dag rjes su thob par bya ba la kha na ma tho ba med de /
translated: there is no fault in obtaining the rite.

original: 'dir rgyal po ni dpe tsam du zad de gang du khyim gyi bdag po la chos dang ldan pa'i don 'grub par de la rig par bya'o //
analyzed: 'dir rgyal po ni dpe tsam du zad de gang du khyim gyi bdag po la chos dang ldan pa'i don 'grub par de la rig par bya'o //
translated: Here, the king is merely an example; it should be understood that the one who accomplishes the purpose of the Dharma for the head of the household is the one who is to be known.

original: sdom pa mchog dang 'brel bar bya ba dman pa la blangs shing gzung ba nye bar mi bya'o //
analyzed: sdom pa mchog dang 'brel bar bya ba dman pa la blangs shing gzung ba nye bar mi bya'o //
translated: One should not take up and uphold the inferior form of the vow that is connected with the supreme vow.

original: cho ga thos par mi bya'o zhes bya ba de dang ldan par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: cho ga thos par mi bya'o zhes bya ba de dang ldan par rig par bya'o //
translated: One should not listen to the ritual. It should be understood that it is connected with that.

original: gzhan ma rdzogs pa la mi 'chags pa med do zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: gzhan ma rdzogs pa la mi 'chags pa med do zhes bya ba la /
translated: There is no confession for one who has not completed the other.

original: gzhan zhes bya ba ni 'don pa gnyis pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: gzhan zhes bya ba ni 'don pa gnyis pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: The other refers to the second recitation, and so on.

original: sde tshan thams cad 'don par brtsams pa ma rdzogs pa'o //
analyzed: sde tshan thams cad 'don par brtsams pa ma rdzogs pa'o //
translated: The recitation of all the sections has not been completed.

original: reg na'o zhes gang zhig gsungs pa ni ma rdzogs pa de la mi chags pa med do //
analyzed: reg na'o zhes gang zhig gsungs pa ni ma rdzogs pa de la mi chags pa med do //
translated: If one touches, it is said that there is no attachment to that which is incomplete.

original: 'on kyang nyes byas tsam zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: 'on kyang nyes byas tsam zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: However, it means merely a minor offense.

original: chos ma yin pa mi bya'o zhes gang zhig gsungs pa de 'dir gso sbyong gi chos zhes bya bar brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: chos ma yin pa mi bya'o zhes gang zhig gsungs pa de 'dir gso sbyong gi chos zhes bya bar brjod par bya ste /
translated: What is said, One should not do what is contrary to the Dharma, should be expressed here as the Dharma of the Poṣadha.

original: gdon par bya ba dang de'i tshad dang dus dang 'don par byed pa rnams de kho na bzhin nye bar ma bzung ba ni 'dir chos ma yin no zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: gdon par bya ba dang de'i tshad dang dus dang 'don par byed pa rnams de kho na bzhin nye bar ma bzung ba ni 'dir chos ma yin no zhes bya ba la /
translated: It is not Dharma here if one does not take up the text to be recited, its measure, time, and the reciter, just as they are.

original: de kho na bzhin zhes bya ba ni bstan par byas nas dang po la sogs pa nyid de kho na bzhin nye bar ma bzung ba ni so sor thar pa las gzhan yang bstan par byas te /
analyzed: de kho na bzhin zhes bya ba ni bstan par byas nas dang po la sogs pa nyid de kho na bzhin nye bar ma bzung ba ni so sor thar pa las gzhan yang bstan par byas te /
translated: Just as they are means that after having been taught, the first, etc., are not taken up just as they are. In the Pratimoksa, it is taught: And further, having been taught,

original: bstan pa nyid rjes su ma bzung ba ni gleng gzhi mi 'don cing gzhan ma brjod pa rnams ni thos pa bsgrags pas sgrub par mi byed pa rnams bstan par bya ste /
analyzed: bstan pa nyid rjes su ma bzung ba ni gleng gzhi mi 'don cing gzhan ma brjod pa rnams ni thos pa bsgrags pas sgrub par mi byed pa rnams bstan par bya ste /
translated: Not taking up the teaching means that one does not recite the nidana, and does not speak of others. Those who do not practice by proclaiming what they have heard are taught.

original: 'di tsam nyid rjes su ma bzung ba'o //🔽gsol ba ma byas pa la ni rtse gcig tu rig par bya ste /
analyzed: 'di tsam nyid rjes su ma bzung ba'o // gsol ba ma byas pa la ni rtse gcig tu rig par bya ste /
translated: Not taking up just this much means that one does not take up the teaching.🔽One should know that not making a request means not making a request.

original: gros ma byas pa dag la de byed pa ni gang zhig mi shes pa zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: gros ma byas pa dag la de byed pa ni gang zhig mi shes pa zhes bya ba ste /
translated: Not consulting means that one who does that is ignorant.

original: gso sbyong gi dus las dus gzhan du byed pa ni dus nye bar ma bzung ba'o //
analyzed: gso sbyong gi dus las dus gzhan du byed pa ni dus nye bar ma bzung ba'o //
translated: The phrase not the proper time means that the observance of the purification fast is not being performed at the proper time.

original: gang zag gang dag gi dbang du gso sbyong byed pa'i dbang du bsnyen par rdzogs pa dang bcas pa dang lta ba dang tshul khrims dag gis rigs mthun pa de rnams las gzhan pas byed pa'o //
analyzed: gang zag gang dag gi dbang du gso sbyong byed pa'i dbang du bsnyen par rdzogs pa dang bcas pa dang lta ba dang tshul khrims dag gis rigs mthun pa de rnams las gzhan pas byed pa'o //
translated: The phrase by those who are not the proper persons means that the purification fast is being performed by persons who are not the same in terms of caste, morality, and view as those who have taken the full complement of vows.

original: yang na 'don par mi byed pa dang mi 'dzin pa'o //
analyzed: yang na 'don par mi byed pa dang mi 'dzin pa'o //
translated: The phrase not recited means that the recitation of the scriptures is not being performed.🔽The phrase not held means that the observance of the purification fast is not being held.

original: gnas @93b de nas 'ga' yang ma song ba nyid yin na nges pa yin no zhes sngar gang bstan pa de la de'i ngo bo bstan pa'i phyir //
analyzed: gnas @93b de nas 'ga' yang ma song ba nyid yin na nges pa yin no zhes sngar gang bstan pa de la de'i ngo bo bstan pa'i phyir //
translated: The phrase not gone means that no one has left the monastery.

original: thos pa'i nye 'khor las 'das pa nyid ni song ba nyid yin no zhes bya ba las so //
analyzed: thos pa'i nye 'khor las 'das pa nyid ni song ba nyid yin no zhes bya ba las so //
translated: The phrase not passed beyond the range of hearing means that no one has gone beyond the range of hearing.

original: gso sbyong gi gzhi dang 'brel pa rnam par 'byed pa la sogs pa'i skabs so //
analyzed: gso sbyong gi gzhi dang 'brel pa rnam par 'byed pa la sogs pa'i skabs so //
translated: This concludes the section on the bases of the purification fast.

original: gso sbyong gi gzhi rdzogs so /
analyzed: gso sbyong gi gzhi rdzogs so /
translated: The bases of the purification fast are now finished.

original: // / dbyar gnas par khas blang bar bya'o zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: // / dbyar gnas par khas blang bar bya'o zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: The phrase the rainy season retreat means the observance of the rainy season retreat.

original: dus ji srid du zhe na /
analyzed: dus ji srid du zhe na /
translated: The phrase for a period of time means for a period of three months.

original: de'i phyir zla ba gsum du'o zhes bya ba smos so //
analyzed: de'i phyir zla ba gsum du'o zhes bya ba smos so //
translated: Therefore, he says, “for three months.”

original: nyi ma gang la de rnams de srid du khas blang par bya zhe na /
analyzed: nyi ma gang la de rnams de srid du khas blang par bya zhe na /
translated: On what day should they undertake this for that length of time?

original: de'i phyir tshes bcu drug la'o zhes bya ba smos so /
analyzed: de'i phyir tshes bcu drug la'o zhes bya ba smos so /
translated: Therefore, he says, “on the sixteenth day.”

original: zla ba gang gi zhe na de'i phyir /
analyzed: zla ba gang gi zhe na de'i phyir /
translated: In what month? Therefore, he says,

original: dbyar zla 'bring po nya'i phyed de nyin par gyi'o zhes bya ba smos te /🔽dbyar zla 'bring po nya'i phyed de nyin par zhes bya ba ni dbyar 'bring po tshes bcu drug gi tshes su gyur pa la zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: dbyar zla 'bring po nya'i phyed de nyin par gyi'o zhes bya ba smos te / dbyar zla 'bring po nya'i phyed de nyin par zhes bya ba ni dbyar 'bring po tshes bcu drug gi tshes su gyur pa la zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: “in the middle month of the rainy season, on the half-month of the full moon, during the day.”🔽The middle month of the rainy season, on the half-month of the full moon, during the day means on the sixteenth day of the middle month of the rainy season.

original: dbyar nye par sgrub par dbyar zla 'bring por sgrub pa zhes bya ba'i tshig gang zhig yang dag par byed pa'o //
analyzed: dbyar nye par sgrub par dbyar zla 'bring por sgrub pa zhes bya ba'i tshig gang zhig yang dag par byed pa'o //
translated: The phrase “in the middle month of the rainy season” is used to indicate the rainy season.🔽The rainy season is so called because it is the time when one enters the rainy season retreat.

original: dbyar zhes bya ba ni der nye bar sgrub pa'o zhes bya ba de'i don to //
analyzed: dbyar zhes bya ba ni der nye bar sgrub pa'o zhes bya ba de'i don to //
translated: The rainy season is so called because one enters the rainy season retreat at that time.

original: gang zag nye bar 'gro ba ma yin pa rgyu mtshan nyid kyis so sor nye bar gnas pas dbyar zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gang zag nye bar 'gro ba ma yin pa rgyu mtshan nyid kyis so sor nye bar gnas pas dbyar zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The rainy season is so called because the individual who enters the rainy season retreat remains in one place for that period of time.

original: dbyar zla tha chungs nya'i'o zhes bya ba ni de ma thag pa zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: dbyar zla tha chungs nya'i'o zhes bya ba ni de ma thag pa zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: The last month of summer is the month of Āṣāḍha.

original: de'i mthar dbyar zla tha chungs nya'i phyi de nyin par zhes bya ba ni ;
analyzed: de'i mthar dbyar zla tha chungs nya'i phyi de nyin par zhes bya ba ni ;
translated: The next day after the last day of Āṣāḍha is the first day of the rainy season.

original: nya'i de ma thag pa ni tshes bcu drug ste /
analyzed: nya'i de ma thag pa ni tshes bcu drug ste /
translated: The day after the last day of Āṣāḍha is the sixteenth day.

original: ston zla ra ba'i tshes la zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: ston zla ra ba'i tshes la zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is: on the first day of the autumn.🔽If it is ten days or a half month, then the monastery should be cleaned.

original: zhag bcu'am zla ba phyed kyis 'byung bar 'gyur ba nyid na gtsug lag khang byi dor bya'o zhes bya ba ni gnas par khas blangs pa zhes bya ba'i skabs kyis rtogs pa'o //
analyzed: zhag bcu'am zla ba phyed kyis 'byung bar 'gyur ba nyid na gtsug lag khang byi dor bya'o zhes bya ba ni gnas par khas blangs pa zhes bya ba'i skabs kyis rtogs pa'o //
translated: This is understood by the context of the vow to stay.🔽In some places, it is said to be seven or eight days.

original: kha cig las ni bdun nam brgyad na'o zhes bya ba ni lugs kha cig las zhes bya bar dgongs so //
analyzed: kha cig las ni bdun nam brgyad na'o zhes bya ba ni lugs kha cig las zhes bya bar dgongs so //
translated: This means in some traditions.

original: nyi ma snga ma la gnas mal bsdog go zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: nyi ma snga ma la gnas mal bsdog go zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The bedding should be gathered on the previous day.

original: khas blangs pa de'i nyi ma snga ma ste tshes bcu drug pa'i snga ma la tshes bco lnga la zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: khas blangs pa de'i nyi ma snga ma ste tshes bcu drug pa'i snga ma la tshes bco lnga la zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The previous day of that vow is the fifteenth day, the day before the sixteenth day. The meaning is: on the fifteenth day.

original: khri'u dang chol zangs yan chad do zhes bya ba ni tha na khri'u dang chol zangs kyi bar yan chad kyang de'i nyin mo bsdog par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //

translated: The phrase up to the benches and the copper water-pots means that even the benches and the copper water-pots should be set out on that day.

original: de stobs pa bsko bar bya'o zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: de stobs pa bsko bar bya'o zhes bya ba la /
translated: The phrase he should be appointed means that he should be appointed as the distributor of bedding and seats.

original: de'i sgras ni gnas mal stobs pa yang bsdus pa'o //
analyzed: de'i sgras ni gnas mal stobs pa yang bsdus pa'o //
translated: The word he includes the distributor of bedding and seats.

original: mi nus na du ma'o zhes bya ba ni gcig gis gnas mal stobs par mi nus pa na /
analyzed: mi nus na du ma'o zhes bya ba ni gcig gis gnas mal stobs par mi nus pa na /
translated: If he is unable, then many should be appointed means that if one person is unable to distribute the bedding and seats,

original: gnas mal stobs pa du ma bsko @94a * //
analyzed: gnas mal stobs pa du ma bsko @94a * //
translated: many people should be appointed to distribute the bedding and seats.

original: bar bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: bar bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //

original: bskos pa'i 'og tu des ci zhig bya zhe na /
analyzed: bskos pa'i 'og tu des ci zhig bya zhe na /
translated: After he is appointed, what should he do?

original: de'i phyir / des dri dag gis bslus pa'i tshul shing gzeb kyi sprog mar ras dkar po bting bas dkris pa dag rgan rims su bzhag nas /
analyzed: de'i phyir / des dri dag gis bslus pa'i tshul shing gzeb kyi sprog mar ras dkar po bting bas dkris pa dag rgan rims su bzhag nas /
translated: For that reason it says, Having placed the bamboo slats in a basket, he should cover them with a white cloth and place them in the order of seniority.

original: tshe dang ldan pa dag gnas 'di na khrims su bcas pa 'di dang 'di yod de /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa dag gnas 'di na khrims su bcas pa 'di dang 'di yod de /
translated: The phrase Venerable Ones, in this place there are these and those rules means that he should announce the rules to the monks.

original: khyed cag las gang khrims su bya ba 'di dang 'dis gnas par spro ba des ni tshul shing long shig khyed cag las sus kyang dbyar dge 'dun gyi nang du 'khrug long bskyed par mi bya'o //
analyzed: khyed cag las gang khrims su bya ba 'di dang 'dis gnas par spro ba des ni tshul shing long shig khyed cag las sus kyang dbyar dge 'dun gyi nang du 'khrug long bskyed par mi bya'o //
translated: None of you should cause a dispute in the Saṅgha during the rains retreat.

original: khyed cag las gang gis 'ga' zhig las cung zad shes pa des nga smros shig ;
analyzed: khyed cag las gang gis 'ga' zhig las cung zad shes pa des nga smros shig ;
translated: If any of you know anything about anyone, you should tell me.

original: khyed cag las gang dbyar gyi nang du dge 'dun las 'khrug long skyed par 'gyur ba de la dge 'dun gyis phyis nye bar brtag par dgongs so zhes dge slong rnams la go bar bya'o zhes smos te /
analyzed: khyed cag las gang dbyar gyi nang du dge 'dun las 'khrug long skyed par 'gyur ba de la dge 'dun gyis phyis nye bar brtag par dgongs so zhes dge slong rnams la go bar bya'o zhes smos te /
translated: You should inform the monks that the Saṅgha will later investigate anyone who causes a dispute in the Saṅgha during the rains retreat.

original: des zhes bya ba ni gnas mal stobs pas so //
analyzed: des zhes bya ba ni gnas mal stobs pas so //
translated: By that means by the one who distributes the bedding.

original: smros shig ces bya bas ni dgod pa pos go bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni phigs par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: smros shig ces bya bas ni dgod pa pos go bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni phigs par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: You should tell me means the one who recites should inform. Should inform means should make known.

original: gzhan gyis blang ba dang khas blang ba'i phyir dge 'dun la gsol ba bya'o zhes bya ba ni //
analyzed: gzhan gyis blang ba dang khas blang ba'i phyir dge 'dun la gsol ba bya'o zhes bya ba ni //
translated: Because of accepting from others and accepting for oneself, one should request the Saṅgha means

original: gnas mal stobs pa'i dge slong de las gzhan pa'i dge slong gis so //🔽dge slong gzhan gcig gis tshul shing blangs pa dang / dbyar gnas khas blangs pa'i phyir go bar bya zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gnas mal stobs pa'i dge slong de las gzhan pa'i dge slong gis so // dge slong gzhan gcig gis tshul shing blangs pa dang / dbyar gnas khas blangs pa'i phyir go bar bya zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The monk who distributes the sleeping places should be another monk than the one who distributes the voting tickets.🔽When one monk has taken the voting ticket, he should announce that he has accepted the invitation to the rainy season.

original: gsol ba gcig dang 'brel ba nyid la don gnyis brjod pa'o //
analyzed: gsol ba gcig dang 'brel ba nyid la don gnyis brjod pa'o //
translated: In one announcement, two things are expressed: the taking of the ticket and the acceptance of the invitation to the rainy season.

original: tshul shing brim mo //
analyzed: tshul shing brim mo //
translated: The voting tickets are distributed.

original: dang po ston pa'i blang ngo zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: dang po ston pa'i blang ngo zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The first one is taken by the teacher.

original: tshul shing brim pa pos tshul shing brim par bya ba'o //
analyzed: tshul shing brim pa pos tshul shing brim par bya ba'o //
translated: The one who distributes the voting tickets should distribute the voting tickets.

original: gzhan dag gis ni stan las phyed 'phags pas so zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: gzhan dag gis ni stan las phyed 'phags pas so zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The others should take them while standing up.

original: ston pa'i tshul shing len pa las gzhan pas so //
analyzed: ston pa'i tshul shing len pa las gzhan pas so //
translated: Those other than the teacher should take them.

original: dge tshul rnams kyi ni slob dpon dang mkhan po dag gis so //
analyzed: dge tshul rnams kyi ni slob dpon dang mkhan po dag gis so //
translated: The novices should take them from their preceptors and instructors.

original: mjug tu gnyug mar gnas pa rnams kyi de yang ngo zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: mjug tu gnyug mar gnas pa rnams kyi de yang ngo zhes bya ba ni /
translated: In the end, the resident monks should take them.

original: 'phrog ma la sogs pa dag gis tshul shing brim pa'o //
analyzed: 'phrog ma la sogs pa dag gis tshul shing brim pa'o //
translated: The resident monks, such as those from the village of Ambapali, should take the voting tickets.

original: de yang zhes bya ba ni tshul shing la gtogs pa'o //
analyzed: de yang zhes bya ba ni tshul shing la gtogs pa'o //
translated: The also indicates that the ballots are included.

original: gang gi tshe de rnams la 'di yin zhe na /
analyzed: gang gi tshe de rnams la 'di yin zhe na /
translated: If one asks, When are they to be distributed?

original: de'i phyir mthar dal bus gzhag par bya'o zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: de'i phyir mthar dal bus gzhag par bya'o zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: Therefore, it says, At the end, they should be distributed slowly.

original: tshul shing rnams gzhag go zhes gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: tshul shing rnams gzhag go zhes gsungs pa yin no //
translated: The ballots are to be distributed.

original: de la gnas khang bstabs pa zhes smos pas 'dir 'di yang smos par 'gyur ba de lta bas na mdo 'di byas pa yin no //
analyzed: de la gnas khang bstabs pa zhes smos pas 'dir 'di yang smos par 'gyur ba de lta bas na mdo 'di byas pa yin no //
translated: Since it says the dwelling place is to be distributed, it should be mentioned here. Therefore, this sūtra is fabricated.

original: bgrangs nas gnas 'dir dge slong @94b 'di snyed kyis tshul shing blangs so zhes go bar bya'o zhes bya ba la zhes bya ba'i sgras ni 'di ltar dge 'dun la go bar bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: bgrangs nas gnas 'dir dge slong @94b 'di snyed kyis tshul shing blangs so zhes go bar bya'o zhes bya ba la zhes bya ba'i sgras ni 'di ltar dge 'dun la go bar bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Having counted them, it should be announced, In this dwelling place, so many monks have taken ballots. The word thus means in this way the Saṅgha should be informed.

original: gnas kyi gzhi bstab par bya'o //
analyzed: gnas kyi gzhi bstab par bya'o //
translated: The basis of the dwelling place is to be distributed.

original: de dag gi sgo lcags dang lde mig blangs pas mdun du 'dug du ste //
analyzed: de dag gi sgo lcags dang lde mig blangs pas mdun du 'dug du ste //
translated: Having taken the keys and locks, they should be placed in front.

original: gnas brtan gtsug lag khang che mi ni rnyed pa dang bcas pa gos kyi rin dang bcas pa lags kyis bzhes shig ces yon tan ji lta ba bzhin du mos pa bskyed cing len du gzhug go zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: gnas brtan gtsug lag khang che mi ni rnyed pa dang bcas pa gos kyi rin dang bcas pa lags kyis bzhes shig ces yon tan ji lta ba bzhin du mos pa bskyed cing len du gzhug go zhes bya ba la /
translated: The elder Mahāviharī, together with his acquisition and the price of his robe, is to be accepted.

original: blangs pas zhes bya ba ni de'i tshe gnas kyi gzhi gang la bstab par bya ba de la'o //
analyzed: blangs pas zhes bya ba ni de'i tshe gnas kyi gzhi gang la bstab par bya ba de la'o //
translated: By accepting, it is said, at that time, on whatever basis of residence he is to be offered.

original: sgo lcags dang lde mig ces bya ba ni /
analyzed: sgo lcags dang lde mig ces bya ba ni /
translated: The bolt and key are said to be

original: de gnyis gang gis blangs pa zhes bya ba'i bsdu ba'o //
analyzed: de gnyis gang gis blangs pa zhes bya ba'i bsdu ba'o //
translated: by whomsoever they are accepted.

original: yon tan ji lta ba bzhin du zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: yon tan ji lta ba bzhin du zhes bya ba ni /
translated: By whatever qualities, it is said,
