analyzed: btsun pa re zhig dge slong grur dbyar gnas par khas len na dbyar gnas par khas blangs zhes bgyi'am /
translated: Venerable, if a monk accepts the rains residence in a boat, is it called “acceptance of the rains residence”?

original: gal te sa la brten cing gnas pa yin na dbyar gnas par khas blangs zhes bya'o //
analyzed: gal te sa la brten cing gnas pa yin na dbyar gnas par khas blangs zhes bya'o //
translated: If he is based on and lives on land, it is called “acceptance of the rains residence.”

original: btsun pa phur pa'am zhugs shing dang 'brel pa lags na dbyar gnas par khas blangs zhes bgyi'am /
analyzed: btsun pa phur pa'am zhugs shing dang 'brel pa lags na dbyar gnas par khas blangs zhes bgyi'am /
translated: Venerable, if he is connected to a stake or a tree, is it called “acceptance of the rains residence”?

original: nye ba 'khor gnas par khas blangs zhes bya'o zhes gsungs pa yin te /
analyzed: nye ba 'khor gnas par khas blangs zhes bya'o zhes gsungs pa yin te /
translated: Upāli, it is called “acceptance of the rains residence.”

original: de gnyis ka bsdus nas de smos pa yin no //
analyzed: de gnyis ka bsdus nas de smos pa yin no //
translated: Both of those are included and mentioned.

original: de'i lta ba la mngon par zhen nas chos ma yin pa'i phyogs su song nas skya rengs shar na 'jig go zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: de'i lta ba la mngon par zhen nas chos ma yin pa'i phyogs su song nas skya rengs shar na 'jig go zhes bya ba la /
translated: He will be destroyed when dawn breaks, because he has gone to the side of what is not Dharma, clinging to that view.

original: 'jig go zhes bya ba khas blangs pa de'o //
analyzed: 'jig go zhes bya ba khas blangs pa de'o //
translated: “He will be destroyed” is the acceptance of that.

original: de lta ba la zhes bya ba ni chos ma yin pa'i phyogs de'i lta ba la'o //
analyzed: de lta ba la zhes bya ba ni chos ma yin pa'i phyogs de'i lta ba la'o //
translated: “In that view” means in the view of that side of what is not Dharma.

original: gang gi tshe na 'di nyams pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: gang gi tshe na 'di nyams pa yin zhe na /
translated: When is he ruined?

original: de'i phyir skya rengs shar na'o zhes bya ba smos te chos ma yin pa'i phyogs kyi lta ba la mngon par brten nas chos ma yin pa'i phyogs su mngon par mchis na /
analyzed: de'i phyir skya rengs shar na'o zhes bya ba smos te chos ma yin pa'i phyogs kyi lta ba la mngon par brten nas chos ma yin pa'i phyogs su mngon par mchis na /
translated: Therefore, it is said, “at sunrise,” because if one relies on the view of the side of non-Dharma and goes over to the side of non-Dharma,

original: skya rengs shar ba'i dus su khas len pa 'jig pa'o //
analyzed: skya rengs shar ba'i dus su khas len pa 'jig pa'o //
translated: then at sunrise, the vow is broken.

original: 'dir gzhung ni /
analyzed: 'dir gzhung ni /
translated: Here is the text:

original: dge slong bzhi dag las btsun pa re zhig dbyar gyi nang du dge 'dun bye bar gyur la /
analyzed: dge slong bzhi dag las btsun pa re zhig dbyar gyi nang du dge 'dun bye bar gyur la /
translated: “Monks, if the Saṅgha splits in the middle of the rainy season,

original: de na gal te dge slong bsams bzhin du chos kyi phyogs nas chos ma yin pa'i phyogs su mchi na dbyar ral zhes bgyi'am /
analyzed: de na gal te dge slong bsams bzhin du chos kyi phyogs nas chos ma yin pa'i phyogs su mchi na dbyar ral zhes bgyi'am /
translated: if a monk intentionally goes from the side of Dharma to the side of non-Dharma, is that a violation of the rainy season retreat?”

original: nye ba 'khor gal te de'i lta ba 'dod cing der yang song na skya @102a * //
analyzed: nye ba 'khor gal te de'i lta ba 'dod cing der yang song na skya @102a * //
translated: “Upāli, if he desires that view and goes there,

original: rengs shar na dbyar ral bar brjod par bya'o zhes gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: rengs shar na dbyar ral bar brjod par bya'o zhes gsungs pa yin no //
translated: at sunrise, it should be said that the rainy season retreat is violated.”

original: the tshom za ba nyid la ni mi 'jig go zhes bya ba ni bdag gnas par khas blangs sam 'on te ma blangs snyam du the tshom za ba nyid la ni dbyar gnas par khas blangs pa mi 'jig pa'o //
analyzed: the tshom za ba nyid la ni mi 'jig go zhes bya ba ni bdag gnas par khas blangs sam 'on te ma blangs snyam du the tshom za ba nyid la ni dbyar gnas par khas blangs pa mi 'jig pa'o //
translated: It is not destroyed by doubt itself, means that the vow of staying in the rainy season is not destroyed by doubt itself, thinking, “I have accepted the vow of staying or have I not?”

original: mtha'i zhag drug la byin gyis brlab pa mi 'chags so zhes bya ba ni gnas par khas blangs nas zla ba gsum gyi mtha'i zhag drug lus pa'i tshe /🔽phyi rol du 'gro ba'i phyir byin gyis brlab pa mi 'chags pa ste /
analyzed: mtha'i zhag drug la byin gyis brlab pa mi 'chags so zhes bya ba ni gnas par khas blangs nas zla ba gsum gyi mtha'i zhag drug lus pa'i tshe / phyi rol du 'gro ba'i phyir byin gyis brlab pa mi 'chags pa ste /
translated: It is not renewed on the last six days, means that when three months have passed, the last six days of the rainy season remain,

original: dus ha cang yun thung ngu las 'da' ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dus ha cang yun thung ngu las 'da' ba'i phyir ro //
translated: and one goes outside, the vow is not renewed because the time has passed too quickly.

original: ha cang thung ngu nyid la ma rdzogs pa rigs pa yin te //
analyzed: ha cang thung ngu nyid la ma rdzogs pa rigs pa yin te //
translated: It is proper that it is not completed in too short a time.

original: gang gi phyir skyes pa ngan pa nyid de zhes bya ba ni zhu ba las 'byung bas dgongs pa mthong ba de lta bas na mdo 'di yin no //
analyzed: gang gi phyir skyes pa ngan pa nyid de zhes bya ba ni zhu ba las 'byung bas dgongs pa mthong ba de lta bas na mdo 'di yin no //
translated: Because it is a bad rebirth, means that this is the intention of the sūtra, because it is seen in the request.

original: bya ba med par shes nas phyir ldog pa dang gnas pa dag la ni 'jig go zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: bya ba med par shes nas phyir ldog pa dang gnas pa dag la ni 'jig go zhes bya ba ni /
translated: One who knows that there is no activity and turns back or stays is said to break the retreat.

original: 'bras bu med pa nyid gang gis shes pa de ni 'bras bu shes pa nyid shes pa'o //
analyzed: 'bras bu med pa nyid gang gis shes pa de ni 'bras bu shes pa nyid shes pa'o //
translated: One who knows that there is no result is said to know the knowledge of the result.

original: byin gyis brlabs te 'gro bzhin pa la bsgrub pa mi dgos pa'i rnyed cing phyir mi ldog par 'gro ba la dbyar gnas par khas blangs pa de 'jig go //
analyzed: byin gyis brlabs te 'gro bzhin pa la bsgrub pa mi dgos pa'i rnyed cing phyir mi ldog par 'gro ba la dbyar gnas par khas blangs pa de 'jig go //
translated: One who has consecrated the retreat and is going out does not need to accomplish the retreat. One who has obtained the consecration and is going out without turning back breaks the vow of staying in the rainy season retreat.

original: byin gyis brlabs nas 'gro ba la de smos te /
analyzed: byin gyis brlabs nas 'gro ba la de smos te /
translated: The consecration is mentioned in the case of one who has consecrated the retreat and is going out.

original: 'dir gzhung ni gal te shul gyi dbus kho nar don de bag yangs su gyur na de mchi bar bgyi'am /
analyzed: 'dir gzhung ni gal te shul gyi dbus kho nar don de bag yangs su gyur na de mchi bar bgyi'am /
translated: The text says, “If the matter can be easily accomplished right in the middle of the road, should one go there or not?”

original: nye ba 'khor mi bya ste /
analyzed: nye ba 'khor mi bya ste /
translated: Upali, one should not go.

original: gal te 'gro na dbyar ral ba'i nyes byas su 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: gal te 'gro na dbyar ral ba'i nyes byas su 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa yin no //
translated: If one goes, one commits the offense of breaking the rainy season retreat.”

original: 'dra ba nyid kyis 'dra ba yang shes pa'o //
analyzed: 'dra ba nyid kyis 'dra ba yang shes pa'o //
translated: One should know that it is similar because it is similar.

original: 'di la mthar thug pa'i mtha' ni zhag bdun nyid do zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: 'di la mthar thug pa'i mtha' ni zhag bdun nyid do zhes bya ba la /
translated: Here, the final limit is seven days.

original: 'di la zhes bya ba ni byin gyis brlab pa la'o //
analyzed: 'di la zhes bya ba ni byin gyis brlab pa la'o //
translated: Here means in the consecration.

original: zhag gcig la sogs pa rnams la yang byin gyis brlab tu rung ba nyid du de bstan pa'o //
analyzed: zhag gcig la sogs pa rnams la yang byin gyis brlab tu rung ba nyid du de bstan pa'o //
translated: It shows that it is suitable to consecrate for one day, etc.

original: gnang ba ma thob ba'i mtha' ni de yin no zhes bya ba ni mtha' zhag bdun yin no //
analyzed: gnang ba ma thob ba'i mtha' ni de yin no zhes bya ba ni mtha' zhag bdun yin no //
translated: The limit of the permission is that, means that the limit is seven days.

original: gzhan gyi ni zhag bzhi bcu'o zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: gzhan gyi ni zhag bzhi bcu'o zhes bya ba la /
translated: For others, it is forty days.

original: gzhan gyi zes bya ni byin gyis brlab pa gnang ba tho ba dag gi mtha' ni zhag bzhi bcu'i mthar thug pa'o //
analyzed: gzhan gyi zes bya ni byin gyis brlab pa gnang ba tho ba dag gi mtha' ni zhag bzhi bcu'i mthar thug pa'o //
translated: For others means for those who have obtained the permission of consecration, the limit is up to forty days.

original: gnang ba thob bas dge slong gi bdun du sngags kyis byin gyis brlabs te 'gro bar bya'o //
analyzed: gnang ba thob bas dge slong gi bdun du sngags kyis byin gyis brlabs te 'gro bar bya'o //
translated: Having obtained permission, one should go for seven days of a monk by consecrating with the mantra.

original: gnang ba sbyin pa ni byin gyis brlab pa gnang ba sbyin pa'o //
analyzed: gnang ba sbyin pa ni byin gyis brlab pa gnang ba sbyin pa'o //
translated: Giving permission is giving the permission of consecration.

original: byin gyis brlabs pa ma yin pa bsgrub ba ma yin zhes bya ba 'dis byas pa rig @102b par bya'o //
analyzed: byin gyis brlabs pa ma yin pa bsgrub ba ma yin zhes bya ba 'dis byas pa rig @102b par bya'o //
translated: By this not without consecration should be understood.

original: khyed la kho bo cag gis byin gyis brlab pa 'di rung bar byin gyis brlab pa zhes bya ba 'dir gnang ba sbyin pa'i dus la mngon par brten nas de rtse gcig pa nyid du rnam par gnas pa yin no //
analyzed: khyed la kho bo cag gis byin gyis brlab pa 'di rung bar byin gyis brlab pa zhes bya ba 'dir gnang ba sbyin pa'i dus la mngon par brten nas de rtse gcig pa nyid du rnam par gnas pa yin no //
translated: “The time of the grant” is the time of the grant of the consecration. “He should stand in one place” means that he should stand in one place.

original: de lta bas na dus ma tshang ba la byin gyis brlab ba 'chags pa ma yin zhes bya bar rig par bya'o //
analyzed: de lta bas na dus ma tshang ba la byin gyis brlab ba 'chags pa ma yin zhes bya bar rig par bya'o //
translated: Therefore, it should be understood that “the consecration is not granted for an incomplete time.”

original: de sbyin no zhes bya ba ni byin gyis brlab pa'i gnang ba de'o //
analyzed: de sbyin no zhes bya ba ni byin gyis brlab pa'i gnang ba de'o //
translated: “He is granted” means that he is granted the consecration.

original: de las lhag par phyi rol du gnas par mi bya ba nyid do zhes bya ba la //
analyzed: de las lhag par phyi rol du gnas par mi bya ba nyid do zhes bya ba la //
translated: “He should not stay outside beyond that” means that he should not stay outside beyond that.

original: de las zhes bya ba ni zhag bzhi bcu po de las so //
analyzed: de las zhes bya ba ni zhag bzhi bcu po de las so //
translated: “That” refers to the forty days.

original: lhag par cung zad byin gyis brlabs kyang rung ba yang 'gro ba la cig car byin gyis brlabs kyang rung ste /
analyzed: lhag par cung zad byin gyis brlabs kyang rung ba yang 'gro ba la cig car byin gyis brlabs kyang rung ste /
translated: Even if he is consecrated for a little longer, or even if he is consecrated all at once,

original: de las lhag par mtshams kyi phyi rol du 'dug par mi bya'o //
analyzed: de las lhag par mtshams kyi phyi rol du 'dug par mi bya'o //
translated: he should not stay outside beyond that.

original: 'dir gzhung ni nye ba 'khor mtshams der ches mang du 'da' bar bya'o zhes gsungs pa de mdo yin no //
analyzed: 'dir gzhung ni nye ba 'khor mtshams der ches mang du 'da' bar bya'o zhes gsungs pa de mdo yin no //
translated: Here, the text is the sutra that states, “You should pass the time in close proximity.”

original: de ni sde pa lnga po dag gi yang yin no zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: de ni sde pa lnga po dag gi yang yin no zhes bya ba ni /
translated: It is also for the five sects.

original: byin gyis brlabs pa de zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: byin gyis brlabs pa de zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: This means that it is for the consecration.

original: de ni mtshams kyi nang du 'chags so zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: de ni mtshams kyi nang du 'chags so zhes bya ba la /
translated: It is confessed within the boundary.

original: de ni zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: de ni zhes bya ba ni /
translated: It is.

original: gang zhig phyi rol du 'gro ba byin gyis brlab pa de ni sde pa lnga po dag la bya'o zhes smos so //
analyzed: gang zhig phyi rol du 'gro ba byin gyis brlab pa de ni sde pa lnga po dag la bya'o zhes smos so //
translated: This means that the consecration that is performed outside is for the five sects.

original: dge slong gi mdun du zhes bya ba ni dge slong gi mdun du byin gyis brlabs na 'chags so zhes bya bar sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: dge slong gi mdun du zhes bya ba ni dge slong gi mdun du byin gyis brlabs na 'chags so zhes bya bar sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: In the presence of a fully ordained monk. This should be connected to “if the consecration is performed, it is confessed.”

original: 'dir dge slong gi mdun du zhes smos pa ni gang zhig dge slong ma rnams kyi gzhan du gsungs pa de bas na 'dir rtags brjod par 'dod pa ma yin pa zhes bya ba rtogs par bya'o //
analyzed: 'dir dge slong gi mdun du zhes smos pa ni gang zhig dge slong ma rnams kyi gzhan du gsungs pa de bas na 'dir rtags brjod par 'dod pa ma yin pa zhes bya ba rtogs par bya'o //
translated: Here, the phrase “in the presence of a fully ordained monk” is stated because it is said elsewhere that “it is for the fully ordained nuns.” Therefore, it should be understood that the sign is not mentioned here because it is not desired.

original: bya ba thams cad la dge slong ma la sogs pa rnams la bsnyen par rdzogs pa'i drung du de gtso bo nyid kyi phyir bya ba nyid du rnam par gnas pa yin no //
analyzed: bya ba thams cad la dge slong ma la sogs pa rnams la bsnyen par rdzogs pa'i drung du de gtso bo nyid kyi phyir bya ba nyid du rnam par gnas pa yin no //
translated: In all activities, nuns and so on are established as the principal ones in the presence of those fully ordained.

original: de lta bas na 'dir de byed pa gang yin pa de ni mi rigs par shes par mi bya'o //
analyzed: de lta bas na 'dir de byed pa gang yin pa de ni mi rigs par shes par mi bya'o //
translated: Therefore, here one should not understand that to be improper.

original: mu stegs can gyi lta ba dang dbral ba'i phyir dang nye du bya ba dang / bdag nyid kyi lung dang rtogs pa la nem nur za ba bsal ba'i phyir 'gro ba la de bya ba ma bsdus pa nyid du dogs par mi bya'o zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: mu stegs can gyi lta ba dang dbral ba'i phyir dang nye du bya ba dang / bdag nyid kyi lung dang rtogs pa la nem nur za ba bsal ba'i phyir 'gro ba la de bya ba ma bsdus pa nyid du dogs par mi bya'o zhes bya ba la /
translated: In order to separate from the views of non-Buddhists and to remove doubt about the scriptures and realizations of oneself and one's relatives, one should not doubt that the activity is not included in going.

original: de bya ba ma bsdus pa nyid du dogs par mi bya'o zhes bya ba ni sngar chos dang ldan pa'i don du zhes smos pa'i mdo nges so //
analyzed: de bya ba ma bsdus pa nyid du dogs par mi bya'o zhes bya ba ni sngar chos dang ldan pa'i don du zhes smos pa'i mdo nges so //
translated: Here, one should not doubt that the activity is not included refers to the sutra mentioned earlier as for the sake of the Dharma.

original: de bya ba zhes bya ba ni byin gyis brlab ba de bya ba la'o //
analyzed: de bya ba zhes bya ba ni byin gyis brlab ba de bya ba la'o //
translated: That activity refers to the activity of consecration.

original: gnas par khas blang ba nyid la gnas pa spang bar mi bya ba nyid do zhes bya ba khas blangs pa nyid la gnas pa'i dge slong spang bar mi bya ba @103a * //
analyzed: gnas par khas blang ba nyid la gnas pa spang bar mi bya ba nyid do zhes bya ba khas blangs pa nyid la gnas pa'i dge slong spang bar mi bya ba @103a * //
translated: The monk who abides in the acceptance of the rains retreat should not abandon it.

original: nyid do // rnam par gzhag pa 'di so sor brten par gyur pas na de shes pa'o //
analyzed: nyid do // rnam par gzhag pa 'di so sor brten par gyur pas na de shes pa'o //
translated: This is the rule.🔽Here the text says:

original: 'dir gzhung ni dge slong gnas par khas blangs pa spang bar bgyi ba de dang lhan cig gnas par bgyi'am /
analyzed: 'dir gzhung ni dge slong gnas par khas blangs pa spang bar bgyi ba de dang lhan cig gnas par bgyi'am /
translated: “Should the monk who has accepted the rains retreat abandon it and stay with them?

original: bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Buddha said:

original: de dang lhan cig gnas par bya'o //
analyzed: de dang lhan cig gnas par bya'o //
translated: “He should stay with them.

original: dgag dbye byas nas ni gnas par mi bya'o zhes gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: dgag dbye byas nas ni gnas par mi bya'o zhes gsungs pa yin no //
translated: But after the end of the rains retreat, he should not stay with them.”🔽This is the example.

original: gnas pa de ni dpe yin no zhes bya ba sngar mdo las /
analyzed: gnas pa de ni dpe yin no zhes bya ba sngar mdo las /
translated: The previous sutra says:🔽“If one promises, one should not separate from the rains retreat.”

original: dam bcas na dbyar gnas pa dang gnas su mi 'brel bar mi bya'o zhes smos pa de ni dpe tsam du zad de /
analyzed: dam bcas na dbyar gnas pa dang gnas su mi 'brel bar mi bya'o zhes smos pa de ni dpe tsam du zad de /
translated: This is merely an example.

original: chos las mi 'da' ba'i don la gnas pa'o //
analyzed: chos las mi 'da' ba'i don la gnas pa'o //
translated: One should abide in the meaning of not transgressing the Dharma.

original: gzhan dag la yang dam bcas pa sgrub par mi byed na nyes byas su 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: gzhan dag la yang dam bcas pa sgrub par mi byed na nyes byas su 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: If one does not fulfill one’s promise to others, one commits an offense of wrong conduct.

original: 'di skad bstan te /
analyzed: 'di skad bstan te /
translated: This is the meaning.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis dam bcas pa sgrub par mi bgyid pa las nyes byas su gsungs na /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis dam bcas pa sgrub par mi bgyid pa las nyes byas su gsungs na /
translated: The Blessed One has said that not fulfilling one’s promise is an offense of wrong conduct.

original: btsun pa dam bca' ba du mchis /
analyzed: btsun pa dam bca' ba du mchis /
translated: “Venerable One, how many kinds of promises are there?”

original: nye ba 'khor lnga ste /
analyzed: nye ba 'khor lnga ste /
translated: Upāli, there are five.

original: lnga gang zhe na /
analyzed: lnga gang zhe na /
translated: What are the five?

original: dbyar dam bca' ba dang / lhung bzed dam bca' ba dang / chos gos dam bca' ba dang / bsod snyoms dam bca' ba dang / nad pa'i sman dam bca' ba ste /
analyzed: dbyar dam bca' ba dang / lhung bzed dam bca' ba dang / chos gos dam bca' ba dang / bsod snyoms dam bca' ba dang / nad pa'i sman dam bca' ba ste /
translated: The promise of the rainy season, the promise of the alms bowl, the promise of the Dharma robe, the promise of alms food, and the promise of medicine for the sick.

original: de ltar 'di bsdu bar byas pa yin no //
analyzed: de ltar 'di bsdu bar byas pa yin no //
translated: This is how it is summarized.

original: 'dir dbyar gyi tshig ni dpe tsam du zad de /
analyzed: 'dir dbyar gyi tshig ni dpe tsam du zad de /
translated: Here, the word “rainy season” is just an example.

original: rnam pa de dag dang dam bcas pa las 'dir gzhan yang kha 'og tu lus 'khrus par mi byed na /
analyzed: rnam pa de dag dang dam bcas pa las 'dir gzhan yang kha 'og tu lus 'khrus par mi byed na /
translated: If one does not fulfill one’s promise in these ways,

original: yang nyes byas su 'gyur ro zhes sbyar ro //
analyzed: yang nyes byas su 'gyur ro zhes sbyar ro //
translated: one commits an offense of wrong conduct.

original: gleng gzhi la sogs par gtogs pa'i dbyar gyi gzhi'o //
analyzed: gleng gzhi la sogs par gtogs pa'i dbyar gyi gzhi'o //
translated: This is the chapter on the rainy season, belonging to the section on the introduction, etc.

original: dbyar gyi gzhi rdzogs so /
analyzed: dbyar gyi gzhi rdzogs so /
translated: The rainy season retreat is completed.

original: // / mi smra ba'i yid dam bca' bar mi bya'o //
analyzed: // / mi smra ba'i yid dam bca' bar mi bya'o //
translated: One should not take a vow of silence.

original: 'dis dag pa dang grol ba thob bo snyam na nyes pa sbom po zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: 'dis dag pa dang grol ba thob bo snyam na nyes pa sbom po zhes bya ba la /
translated: If one thinks, “By this I will attain purification and liberation,” it is called a serious offense.

original: 'dis zhes bya ba ni mi smra ba 'dis so //
analyzed: 'dis zhes bya ba ni mi smra ba 'dis so //
translated: “By this” means by this vow of silence.

original: dge 'dun 'byed pa la brtul ba'i phyogs la 'di rig par bya'o //
analyzed: dge 'dun 'byed pa la brtul ba'i phyogs la 'di rig par bya'o //
translated: This should be understood in the context of the schism in the Saṅgha.

original: 'dir gzhung ni /
analyzed: 'dir gzhung ni /
translated: The text says:

original: mi gti mug can 'di ni mu stegs kyi rgyal mtshan te /
analyzed: mi gti mug can 'di ni mu stegs kyi rgyal mtshan te /
translated: “This deluded man is a banner of the tīrthikas.

original: 'di lta ste mi smra'o //🔽de lta bas na dge slong gis mi smra ba'i yid dam bcas na nyes pa sbom po'o //
analyzed: 'di lta ste mi smra'o // de lta bas na dge slong gis mi smra ba'i yid dam bcas na nyes pa sbom po'o //
translated: It is like this: he is silent.🔽Therefore, if a monk takes a vow of silence, it is a serious offense.

original: dge slong mi smra ba'i yid dam bca' bar byed na nyes pa sngom por 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: dge slong mi smra ba'i yid dam bca' bar byed na nyes pa sngom por 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa yin no //
translated: If a monk takes a vow of silence, it becomes a serious offense.”

original: dbyar gnas pa'i dge 'dun la mthong ba dang thos pa dang dogs pa dag gis dgag dbye bya'o zhes bya ba ni ji ltar yang rung bas dbyar @103b ral ba yang rung dbyar ma ral ba yang rung ste dbyar gyi dus rdzogs par bya'o //🔽gang gi phyir dbyar ral ba la dgag dbye mi bya ba ma yin no //
analyzed: dbyar gnas pa'i dge 'dun la mthong ba dang thos pa dang dogs pa dag gis dgag dbye bya'o zhes bya ba ni ji ltar yang rung bas dbyar @103b ral ba yang rung dbyar ma ral ba yang rung ste dbyar gyi dus rdzogs par bya'o // gang gi phyir dbyar ral ba la dgag dbye mi bya ba ma yin no //
translated: This means that whether the rainy season retreat has been properly completed or not, the rainy season retreat should be completed.🔽Because it is not the case that the observance of the end of the rainy season retreat should not be done if the rainy season retreat has not been properly completed.

original: dus gang gi tshe na de'i phyir dbyar rnams kyi tha ma'i nyi ma la'o //
analyzed: dus gang gi tshe na de'i phyir dbyar rnams kyi tha ma'i nyi ma la'o //
translated: At what time?

original: spyod yul du brjod par bya'o zhes bya ba smos so //
analyzed: spyod yul du brjod par bya'o zhes bya ba smos so //
translated: Therefore it is said, “from when the cleaning of the monastery is done.”

original: gang gi dus nas she na /
analyzed: gang gi dus nas she na /
translated: From what time?

original: de'i phyir gang tshun chad nas byi dor byed pa nas so zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: de'i phyir gang tshun chad nas byi dor byed pa nas so zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: Therefore it is said, “from when the cleaning of the monastery is done.”

original: sngar dbyar gyi gzhi'i skabs su zhag bcu'am zla ba phyed kyis 'byung bar 'gyur ba nyid na gtsug lag khang bye dor bya'o //
analyzed: sngar dbyar gyi gzhi'i skabs su zhag bcu'am zla ba phyed kyis 'byung bar 'gyur ba nyid na gtsug lag khang bye dor bya'o //
translated: In the section on the basis of the rainy season retreat, it is said that the monastery should be cleaned ten days or half a month before the rainy season retreat.

original: kha cig las ni bdun nam brgyad na zhe'o zhes smos pas byi dor byed par rtsom pa'i dus gang yin pa de'i tshe zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: kha cig las ni bdun nam brgyad na zhe'o zhes smos pas byi dor byed par rtsom pa'i dus gang yin pa de'i tshe zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is: “At whatever time one begins to clean the monastery.”

original: ji skad brjod par bya zhe na /
analyzed: ji skad brjod par bya zhe na /
translated: What should one say?

original: de'i phyir deng phyin chad zhag 'di tsam na dgag dbye mdzad par 'gyur ba khyed cag la brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir deng phyin chad zhag 'di tsam na dgag dbye mdzad par 'gyur ba khyed cag la brjod pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, I inform you that the end of the retreat will be made after so many days.

original: gtsug lag khang brgyan par bya'o zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: gtsug lag khang brgyan par bya'o zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: The monastery should be decorated.

original: gang tshun chad nas byi dor bya ba bstan pa ste /
analyzed: gang tshun chad nas byi dor bya ba bstan pa ste /
translated: This shows the time for cleaning the monastery.

original: dbang du byas pas shes par bya'o //🔽khang pa brtsegs pa dag brtsig go //🔽gtsang khang byur bu dag kyang ri mo bri'o //
analyzed: dbang du byas pas shes par bya'o // khang pa brtsegs pa dag brtsig go // gtsang khang byur bu dag kyang ri mo bri'o //
translated: One should understand this based on the authority.🔽One should build multi-storied buildings.🔽One should paint the solid-colored shrine room.

original: mchod rten dag gso ba dang byi byad bya'o //
analyzed: mchod rten dag gso ba dang byi byad bya'o //
translated: One should repair and clean the stupas.

original: seng ge'i khri brgyan bar bya'o //
analyzed: seng ge'i khri brgyan bar bya'o //
translated: One should decorate the lion throne.

original: do mod mtshan thog thag chos mnyan pa 'byung bar 'gyur gyi /
analyzed: do mod mtshan thog thag chos mnyan pa 'byung bar 'gyur gyi /
translated: Tonight, the whole night, the Dharma will be heard.

original: der tshe dang ldan pa dag gi tshogs pa sbyin bar bya'o zhes spyod yul du brjod nas mdo sde dang / 'dul ba dang ma mo 'dzin pa la gsol ba btab pa dag gis tshes bcu bzhi'i mtshan thog thag tu chos mnyam pa sbyin par bya'o zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: der tshe dang ldan pa dag gi tshogs pa sbyin bar bya'o zhes spyod yul du brjod nas mdo sde dang / 'dul ba dang ma mo 'dzin pa la gsol ba btab pa dag gis tshes bcu bzhi'i mtshan thog thag tu chos mnyam pa sbyin par bya'o zhes bya ba la /
translated: There, the assembly of the elders should give the gift. Having announced the domain, they should request the reciters of Sutra, Vinaya, and Mata. The gift of Dharma should be given throughout the night of the fourteenth.

original: tshes bcu bzhi zhes bya ba ni gzhan zhes bya ba 'og ma'i cho ga brjod pa las shes par bya'o //
analyzed: tshes bcu bzhi zhes bya ba ni gzhan zhes bya ba 'og ma'i cho ga brjod pa las shes par bya'o //
translated: The fourteenth is to be understood from the statement of the ritual for the other night.

original: gzhan la ni de dag gis las kyi mdun rol tshun chad du chos dang ldan pa'i gtam rnam par gtan la dbab pas mtshan mo 'da' bar bya'o zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: gzhan la ni de dag gis las kyi mdun rol tshun chad du chos dang ldan pa'i gtam rnam par gtan la dbab pas mtshan mo 'da' bar bya'o zhes bya ba la /
translated: For the other, they should spend the night with a Dharma-related discussion that determines the meaning, up to the end of the ritual.

original: gzhan la zhes bya ba ni tshes bco lnga la'o //
analyzed: gzhan la zhes bya ba ni tshes bco lnga la'o //
translated: The other is the fifteenth night.

original: de dag gis zhes bya ba ni mdo sde dang 'dul ba dang ma mo 'dzin pa dag gis so //
analyzed: de dag gis zhes bya ba ni mdo sde dang 'dul ba dang ma mo 'dzin pa dag gis so //
translated: They refers to the reciters of Sutra, Vinaya, and Mata.

original: mdun rol du zhes bya ba ni dgag dbye las so ;
analyzed: mdun rol du zhes bya ba ni dgag dbye las so ;
translated: Up to the end is from the end of the invitation.

original: / tshun chad du zhes bya ba ni chos dang ldan pa'i gtam rnam par gtan la dbab pas ji srid dgag dbye'i las rtsom pa la thug pa de tshun chad du mtshan mo 'da' bar bya'o //
analyzed: / tshun chad du zhes bya ba ni chos dang ldan pa'i gtam rnam par gtan la dbab pas ji srid dgag dbye'i las rtsom pa la thug pa de tshun chad du mtshan mo 'da' bar bya'o //
translated: The phrase up to that time means that the night should be spent in a Dharma discussion that is a definitive formulation, up to the point of beginning the ceremony of the invitation.

original: de la yang gang gi zhe na /
analyzed: de la yang gang gi zhe na /
translated: What is that?🔽 Therefore, it says,

original: de'i phyir dgag dbye'i las ni skya rengs 'char ba'i mdun du'o zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: de'i phyir dgag dbye'i las ni skya rengs 'char ba'i mdun du'o zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: the ceremony of the invitation is in front of the rising of the dawn.

original: de ltar @104a * //
analyzed: de ltar @104a * //
translated: In that way,

original: dgag dbye'i las bya'o //
analyzed: dgag dbye'i las bya'o //
translated: the ceremony of the invitation should be performed.

original: ji ltar skya rengs dang po ma shar bar las thams cad zin pa de ltar dgag dbye'i las bya'o //
analyzed: ji ltar skya rengs dang po ma shar bar las thams cad zin pa de ltar dgag dbye'i las bya'o //
translated: Just as all the work is finished before the first dawn, so should the ceremony of the invitation be performed.

original: mthar thug pa'i cha dang ldan pa'i skya rengs kyi las la mi bya ba nyid ces bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: mthar thug pa'i cha dang ldan pa'i skya rengs kyi las la mi bya ba nyid ces bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that it should not be done at the end of the dawn.

original: dge slong dgag dbye'i byed pa bsko bar bya'o //
analyzed: dge slong dgag dbye'i byed pa bsko bar bya'o //
translated: The monk who performs the invitation ceremony should be appointed.

original: mi nus na du ma'o zhes bya ba ni dge 'dun mang ba nyid kyi phyir dgag dbye'i byed pa gcig gis mi nus na dgag dbye byed pa du ma yang shes par bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: mi nus na du ma'o zhes bya ba ni dge 'dun mang ba nyid kyi phyir dgag dbye'i byed pa gcig gis mi nus na dgag dbye byed pa du ma yang shes par bya ba'i don to //
translated: If not, then many. This means that if one who performs the invitation ceremony is not able to do so because of the large number of monks, then many who perform the invitation ceremony should be understood.

original: dgag dbye bya ba'i phyir gzhan gyi dge 'dun la gsol bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni gsol ba'i las bya ba'o //
analyzed: dgag dbye bya ba'i phyir gzhan gyi dge 'dun la gsol bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni gsol ba'i las bya ba'o //
translated: One should request the other Saṃgha to perform the invitation ceremony. This means that the motion should be performed.

original: 'di la gral gyi cha las byar rung ngo zhes bya ba mi gral gyi tshar gcig la dgag dbye byed pa du ma dag gis las byed par rigs so zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: 'di la gral gyi cha las byar rung ngo zhes bya ba mi gral gyi tshar gcig la dgag dbye byed pa du ma dag gis las byed par rigs so zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Here, it is suitable to be included in the row. This means that it is appropriate for many who perform the invitation ceremony in one row of the Saṃgha to perform the action.

original: rtsva d'ur ba brim pa dang mdun du 'dug pa yang 'di'i yul yin no //
analyzed: rtsva d'ur ba brim pa dang mdun du 'dug pa yang 'di'i yul yin no //
translated: The distribution of kuśa grass and sitting in front are also its domain.

original: tshe dang ldan pa 'ga' zhig la gang zag 'jog par byed cing gzhi mi 'jog pa dang / tshul khrims rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir zhes bya ba ni tshig dang po'o //

analyzed: yang na gzhag ste bdag gis 'di ma bzhag gi gzhan gzhag go zhes bsnyon na /

original: de la snga ma 'am 'di'i rnam pa de lta bu cung zad kyang med do zhes zer na brdzun nyid do zhes bya ba ni gzhag pa snga ma la de ltar brjod pa la gzhag pa 'di la yang brdzun nyid du shes par mi bya'o //

translated: This means that, in the same way that the former setting aside is said to be a lie, this setting aside should also be understood to be a lie.

analyzed: de lta bu'i chas smos pa de ni brdzun du smra ba nyid ces bya ba 'am /

analyzed: brdzun du smra ba'i rab tu dbye ba the tshom bzlog par bya ba'i don te /

original: de 'di zhes bya bar yul bstan pa'o //
analyzed: de 'di zhes bya bar yul bstan pa'o //

original: sngar bstan ma thag pa'i bsnyon pa de la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: sngar bstan ma thag pa'i bsnyon pa de la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'o //
translated: “ To engage in” means to engage in the previously mentioned setting aside.

original: gal te gnas par khas blangs pa dag gis dge slong 'thab krol byed pa dag 'ong bar thos par gyur na gal te gso sbyong gnyis sam gsum thal bar gyur na dgag dbye bya'o zhes bya ba ni gal te de'i tshe khas blangs pa'i tshe /

translated: If those who have accepted to remain in the rainy season retreat hear that quarrelsome monks are coming, if two or three poṣadhas have passed, then the rainy season retreat should be concluded.

original: gal te gso sbyong gnyis sam gsum thal bar gyur pa nyid du shes na /
analyzed: gal te gso sbyong gnyis sam gsum thal bar gyur pa nyid du shes na /
translated: If they know that two or three poṣadhas have passed,

original: dbyar gyi nang du dgag dbye bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: dbyar gyi nang du dgag dbye bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: then the rainy season retreat should be concluded within the rainy season.

original: thams cad la yang phyed byas pa ni byas pa nyid yin no zhes 'jig rten pa'i grags pa yin la /
analyzed: thams cad la yang phyed byas pa ni byas pa nyid yin no zhes 'jig rten pa'i grags pa yin la /
translated: It is well known in the world that if half of the rainy season retreat has been completed, then it is completed.🔽It is well known that if the majority of the rainy season retreat has been completed, then it is completed.

original: gang zhig phal cher byas pa ni byas pa nyid yin no zhes grags pa'i grags pa yin pas 'dir yang 'di 'am gzhan du ltung ba la'o //
analyzed: gang zhig phal cher byas pa ni byas pa nyid yin no zhes grags pa'i grags pa yin pas 'dir yang 'di 'am gzhan du ltung ba la'o //
translated: Here, it is a downfall if it is not completed, or if it is completed, but it is not well known.

original: de med pa la sngar gyi nyid la brten par rig par bya ba 'dis grags pa'i don du rnam par rtog pa'o //
analyzed: de med pa la sngar gyi nyid la brten par rig par bya ba 'dis grags pa'i don du rnam par rtog pa'o //
translated: This is a conception of the meaning of well known.

original: 'di la tshes bco lnga smos pa la gnyis pa dang gsum pa 'da' bar byed pa la ltos pa nyid de /
analyzed: 'di la tshes bco lnga smos pa la gnyis pa dang gsum pa 'da' bar byed pa la ltos pa nyid de /
translated: Here, the fifteenth day is mentioned in relation to the second and third days.

original: de'i tshe dgag dbye bya ba nyid kyi phyir de lta bas na de nyid 'da' bar byed pa nyid du shes par bya'o //
analyzed: de'i tshe dgag dbye bya ba nyid kyi phyir de lta bas na de nyid 'da' bar byed pa nyid du shes par bya'o //
translated: Since the invitation ceremony is performed on that day, it should be understood that it is the invitation ceremony itself.🔽If it is not accomplished, it should be done in agreement with five or six people.

original: ma grub na dkyil 'khor pa lnga 'am drug tu blo mthun bar ro zhes bya ba ni 'da' bar ma gyur tam bar chad kyi rkyen gzhan gyi dbang gis ma grub na 'dir dgag dbye dkyil 'khor ba lnga 'am /
analyzed: ma grub na dkyil 'khor pa lnga 'am drug tu blo mthun bar ro zhes bya ba ni 'da' bar ma gyur tam bar chad kyi rkyen gzhan gyi dbang gis ma grub na 'dir dgag dbye dkyil 'khor ba lnga 'am /
translated: If the invitation ceremony is not accomplished because it has not been done or because of other conditions that are obstacles, it should be done in agreement with five or six people.

original: drug tu blo mthun pas yang dag par shes par bya'o //
analyzed: drug tu blo mthun pas yang dag par shes par bya'o //
translated: It should be done with the understanding that it is the invitation ceremony.

original: ngag gis bshes pa'i tshig gis bsu nas lhung bzed dang chos gos blang ba dang / gnas khang dang khyams dang khang pa @108a * //
analyzed: ngag gis bshes pa'i tshig gis bsu nas lhung bzed dang chos gos blang ba dang / gnas khang dang khyams dang khang pa @108a * //
translated: Having welcomed them with words of friendliness, one should receive their alms bowl and robes, and their dwelling place, courtyard, and house.

original: brtsegs pa bsko ba dang / khrus dang snum bag gi rnyed pa bstabs pa dang / chos mnyan ba sbyin pa dang / de lta bu mgu bar bya ba dag bya'o zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: brtsegs pa bsko ba dang / khrus dang snum bag gi rnyed pa bstabs pa dang / chos mnyan ba sbyin pa dang / de lta bu mgu bar bya ba dag bya'o zhes bya ba ni /
translated: One should give them a place to stay, a room, a courtyard, or a multi-storied building. One should give them bathing and oil massage, and give them the gift of listening to the Dharma. One should do such things that please them.

original: skabs der 'thab krol byed pa dag 'ongs na /
analyzed: skabs der 'thab krol byed pa dag 'ongs na /
translated: If those who quarrel come to that place,

original: de dag la ngag gis bshes pa'i tshig gis bsu nas lhung bzed dang / chos gos blang bar bya /
analyzed: de dag la ngag gis bshes pa'i tshig gis bsu nas lhung bzed dang / chos gos blang bar bya /
translated: one should greet them with words of friendship and give them a begging bowl and Dharma robes.

original: gnas khang skyong bas gnas khang dang khyams dang khang pa brtsegs pa bsko bar bya /🔽khrus dang snum bag gi rnyed pa bstabs par bya //
analyzed: gnas khang skyong bas gnas khang dang khyams dang khang pa brtsegs pa bsko bar bya / khrus dang snum bag gi rnyed pa bstabs par bya //
translated: The caretaker of the monastery should give them a place to stay, a room, a courtyard, or a multi-storied building.🔽One should give them bathing and oil massage, and give them the gift of listening to the Dharma. If one is able to do so, one should also do other things that please them, such as cleaning the monastery.

original: chos mnyan ba sbyin bar bya zhing gal te de srid du nus na de lta bu la sogs pa'i bcom gsag mgu bar 'gyur ba'i sbyor ba gzhan dag kyang de lta bu'i mkhas pas zhes bya ba de lta bu'i 'don ba la kun nas brten nas 'dir mdor
analyzed: chos mnyan ba sbyin bar bya zhing gal te de srid du nus na de lta bu la sogs pa'i bcom gsag mgu bar 'gyur ba'i sbyor ba gzhan dag kyang de lta bu'i mkhas pas zhes bya ba de lta bu'i 'don ba la kun nas brten nas 'dir mdor
translated: One should do such things as these.

original: byas so // 'dir khrus 'di la 'don pa gzhan las sbyar ba las jug pa nyid la kun nas brten no //
analyzed: byas so // 'dir khrus 'di la 'don pa gzhan las sbyar ba las jug pa nyid la kun nas brten no //
translated: Here, in this bathing rite, the recitation is applied to the rite of entering, which is based on the rite of consecration.

original: bdag nyid kyi dngos por ma grub na dkyil 'khor ba dag tu gso sbyong bya'o //
analyzed: bdag nyid kyi dngos por ma grub na dkyil 'khor ba dag tu gso sbyong bya'o //
translated: If one's own person is not established, one should perform the purification and restoration in the mandala.

original: 'o na deng khyed kyis dgag dbye ma yin nam zhes zer ba dag la tshe dang ldan ba dag sdod cig /
analyzed: 'o na deng khyed kyis dgag dbye ma yin nam zhes zer ba dag la tshe dang ldan ba dag sdod cig /
translated: If someone says, But today is not the invitation for you, one should reply, Venerable ones, wait!

original: khyed cag glo bur du lhags pa yin gyi /
analyzed: khyed cag glo bur du lhags pa yin gyi /
translated: You are the guests,

original: don 'di gnyug mar gnas pa dag gi yin no zhes lan gdab bar bya'o //
analyzed: don 'di gnyug mar gnas pa dag gi yin no zhes lan gdab bar bya'o //
translated: while this matter belongs to the residents.

original: dong ba dag na dgag dbye bya'o zhes bya ba ni bya'o zhes bya ba'i khyad par ro //
analyzed: dong ba dag na dgag dbye bya'o zhes bya ba ni bya'o zhes bya ba'i khyad par ro //
translated: The invitation should be done by those who have gone out means that it should be done.

original: gso sbyong gi nyi ma kho na la 'di nyid bya'o //
analyzed: gso sbyong gi nyi ma kho na la 'di nyid bya'o //
translated: This should be done on the very day of the purification and restoration.

original: tha dad pa yod kyang las 'di la gso sbyong rigs mthun pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: tha dad pa yod kyang las 'di la gso sbyong rigs mthun pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Even if there are differences, this rite is of the same type as the purification and restoration.

original: dgag dbye'i gzhi'o /
analyzed: dgag dbye'i gzhi'o /
translated: This is the basis for the invitation.

original: // / nang dang bcas pas bzod par ma byas par dgag dbye mi bya'o zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: // / nang dang bcas pas bzod par ma byas par dgag dbye mi bya'o zhes bya ba la /
translated: The invitation should not be done without the consent of those who are present.🔽Those who are present means those who are in the same monastery.

original: 'dis ni bzod par ma byas pa zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: 'dis ni bzod par ma byas pa zhes bya ba ste /
translated: This is called “not being patient”

original: bzod pa ma byas pa'o //
analyzed: bzod pa ma byas pa'o //
translated: because patience is not exercised.

original: nang dang bcas pa zhes bya ba ni thams cad kyis ni ma yin no //
analyzed: nang dang bcas pa zhes bya ba ni thams cad kyis ni ma yin no //
translated: “Along with” means not all.

original: zhag bcu 'am zla ba phyed kyis de 'byung bar 'gyur ba nyid ni de'i dus yin no zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: zhag bcu 'am zla ba phyed kyis de 'byung bar 'gyur ba nyid ni de'i dus yin no zhes bya ba la /
translated: “That time” means the time when that is completed in ten days or a half-month.

original: de zhes bya ba ni dgag dbye de'o //
analyzed: de zhes bya ba ni dgag dbye de'o //
translated: “That” refers to the lifting of restrictions.

original: de'i dus zhes bya ba ni de la smos pa'i bzod par bya ba de'i dus yin no //
analyzed: de'i dus zhes bya ba ni de la smos pa'i bzod par bya ba de'i dus yin no //
translated: “That time” means the time for being patient with that which is mentioned in that.

original: kha cig las ni bdun nam brgyad na zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: kha cig las ni bdun nam brgyad na zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Some say: “In seven or eight days.”

original: nyi ma bdun nam brgyad kyis de 'byung bar 'gyur ba nyid kyi dus na dgag dbye de la bzod par bya ba de'i dus yin no zhes kha cig las 'byung ngo //
analyzed: nyi ma bdun nam brgyad kyis de 'byung bar 'gyur ba nyid kyi dus na dgag dbye de la bzod par bya ba de'i dus yin no zhes kha cig las 'byung ngo //
translated: Some say: “That time for the lifting of restrictions is the time for being patient with that.”

original: 'dus pa la ni ma yin no zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: 'dus pa la ni ma yin no zhes bya ba ni /
translated: “Not in an assembly” means

original: de'i tshe 'dus zhes bya bar sbyar te /
analyzed: de'i tshe 'dus zhes bya bar sbyar te /
translated: that at that time, it is not in an assembly.

original: 'dir dgag dbye'i don du 'don pa yin mod kyi @108b 'dus pa gzhan la yang de bzhin du 'di rigs pa ma yin no //
analyzed: 'dir dgag dbye'i don du 'don pa yin mod kyi @108b 'dus pa gzhan la yang de bzhin du 'di rigs pa ma yin no //
translated: Although this is recited for the purpose of the poṣadha ceremony, it is not proper to recite it in the same way for other assemblies.

original: de'i phyir 'dir bye brag tu ma byas so //
analyzed: de'i phyir 'dir bye brag tu ma byas so //
translated: Therefore, it is not specified here.

original: des bzod par ma byas par mi bya'o zhes bya ba ni nang dang bcas pa des bzod par ma byas par dgag dbye mi bya'o //
analyzed: des bzod par ma byas par mi bya'o zhes bya ba ni nang dang bcas pa des bzod par ma byas par dgag dbye mi bya'o //
translated: “One should not perform the poṣadha ceremony without his consent” means that one should not perform the poṣadha ceremony without the consent of the one who has a complaint.

original: de'i tshe 'dus pa thams cad kyis phan tshun kun dga' bar ma byas par mi bya'o zhes bya ba ni phyag la sogs pas phan tshun kun dga' bar ma byas par gang gis de phan tshun kun dga' bar ma byas par mi bya'o //
analyzed: de'i tshe 'dus pa thams cad kyis phan tshun kun dga' bar ma byas par mi bya'o zhes bya ba ni phyag la sogs pas phan tshun kun dga' bar ma byas par gang gis de phan tshun kun dga' bar ma byas par mi bya'o //
translated: “At that time, the entire assembly should not perform the poṣadha ceremony without mutual consent” means that the entire assembly should not perform the poṣadha ceremony without mutual consent through bowing down to each other, etc.

original: gang gi rnams kyis she na /
analyzed: gang gi rnams kyis she na /
translated: By whom should it not be performed?

original: de'i phyir de'i tshe gnas kyi gzhi der 'dus pa thams cad kyis zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: de'i phyir de'i tshe gnas kyi gzhi der 'dus pa thams cad kyis zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: Therefore, it says, “at that time, by the entire assembly in that place.”

original: ci gang zhig nang dang bcas par 'gyur ba gang la yang de 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba de nyid yin nam zhe na /
analyzed: ci gang zhig nang dang bcas par 'gyur ba gang la yang de 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba de nyid yin nam zhe na /
translated: Is it the case that the one who has a complaint does not arise in any of them?

original: de'i phyir thams cad kyis zhes bya ba smos so //
analyzed: de'i phyir thams cad kyis zhes bya ba smos so //
translated: Therefore, he says, “all of them.”

original: ci zhag bcu 'am /
analyzed: ci zhag bcu 'am /
translated: Is it only for ten days?

original: zla ba phyed na 'byung bar 'gyur ba nyid na phan tshun kun dga' bar ma byas par mi bya ba'am zhe na /
analyzed: zla ba phyed na 'byung bar 'gyur ba nyid na phan tshun kun dga' bar ma byas par mi bya ba'am zhe na /
translated: Or is it for a fortnight?

original: dgag dbye'i dus so //
analyzed: dgag dbye'i dus so //
translated: The time of the invitation ceremony.

original: de'i tshe gshe ba la bzod par mi gsol bar mi bya'o zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: de'i tshe gshe ba la bzod par mi gsol bar mi bya'o zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: At that time, one should not fail to ask forgiveness for scolding.

original: dgag dbye'i dus 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi dus gzhan gyi tshe yang ngo //
analyzed: dgag dbye'i dus 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi dus gzhan gyi tshe yang ngo //
translated: Not only at the time of the invitation ceremony, but also at other times.

original: sil bu dag las mi 'dod pa las ni ma yin no zhes bya ba la sogs pa dang / ji srid du bzod pa ma yin zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni phran tshegs lhag ma rnams las so //
analyzed: sil bu dag las mi 'dod pa las ni ma yin no zhes bya ba la sogs pa dang / ji srid du bzod pa ma yin zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni phran tshegs lhag ma rnams las so //
translated: From the Ksudraka Collection: “One should not accept the invitation of those who are not related, etc.,” and “As long as there is no forgiveness, etc.”

original: dge slong mas dge slong la gnas kyi phyi rol du bzod par gsol bar mi bya'o //
analyzed: dge slong mas dge slong la gnas kyi phyi rol du bzod par gsol bar mi bya'o //
translated: A nun should not ask forgiveness from a monk outside the monastery.

original: rkang pa gnyis la phyag byas te mi bya'o zhes bya ba ni dge slong mas dge slong la bzod par gsol bar mi bya'o zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: rkang pa gnyis la phyag byas te mi bya'o zhes bya ba ni dge slong mas dge slong la bzod par gsol bar mi bya'o zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: “One should not bow down at the feet of a fully ordained monk” means that a fully ordained nun should not request forgiveness from a fully ordained monk.

original: bzod na phyag bya ste 'gro bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni dge slong gis bzod na dge slong mas dge slong gi rkang pa gnyis la phyag bya ste 'gro bar bya'o //🔽bzod pa gsol bar byed pa de la dge slong gis ma gus par bya ste 'gro bar mi bya'o //🔽'da' bar mi bya'o zhes bya ba ni dge slong ma bzod par gsol bar byed pa de las /
analyzed: bzod na phyag bya ste 'gro bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni dge slong gis bzod na dge slong mas dge slong gi rkang pa gnyis la phyag bya ste 'gro bar bya'o // bzod pa gsol bar byed pa de la dge slong gis ma gus par bya ste 'gro bar mi bya'o // 'da' bar mi bya'o zhes bya ba ni dge slong ma bzod par gsol bar byed pa de las /
translated: “If he forgives her, she should bow down and leave” means that if a fully ordained monk forgives a fully ordained nun, she should bow down at his feet and leave.🔽“A fully ordained monk should not disrespectfully leave while a fully ordained nun is requesting forgiveness” means that a fully ordained monk should not disrespectfully leave while a fully ordained nun is requesting forgiveness from him.

original: dge slong gis 'da' bar mi bya ste bzod pa dang du blang bar bya'o //
analyzed: dge slong gis 'da' bar mi bya ste bzod pa dang du blang bar bya'o //
translated: “He should not transgress her” means that a fully ordained monk should not transgress a fully ordained nun who is requesting forgiveness from him; he should accept her forgiveness.

original: bzod par bya ba la sngar shes pa shad kyis spyang du gzhug par bya'o //🔽mi 'dod na thabs btsal ba la mi 'bad par mi bya'o zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: bzod par bya ba la sngar shes pa shad kyis spyang du gzhug par bya'o // mi 'dod na thabs btsal ba la mi 'bad par mi bya'o zhes bya ba la /
translated: “He should be the first to know about the forgiveness” means that he should be the first to know about the forgiveness.

original: mi 'bad par mi bya'o zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: mi 'bad par mi bya'o zhes bya ba ni /
translated: “If she does not want to, he should not make an effort to find a means” means that if she does not want to forgive him, he should not make an effort to find a means to make her forgive him.🔽“He should not make an effort” means that he should not make an effort to find a means to make her forgive him.

original: bzod pa gsol bar bya ba de bzod par mi 'dod na /
analyzed: bzod pa gsol bar bya ba de bzod par mi 'dod na /
translated: If he does not wish to forgive,

original: de'i phyir mi bsgyang ngo //🔽kun nas dkris pa @109a * //
analyzed: de'i phyir mi bsgyang ngo // kun nas dkris pa @109a * //
translated: then he should not be forced.

original: dang ma bral gyi bar du mi bsdad par mi bya'o //
analyzed: dang ma bral gyi bar du mi bsdad par mi bya'o //
translated: He should not stay with him until he is freed from the envelopment.

original: bzod pa gsol bar byed pa la mi bzod par mi bya'o zhes bya ba smos so //
analyzed: bzod pa gsol bar byed pa la mi bzod par mi bya'o zhes bya ba smos so //
translated: He should not be impatient with the one who asks for forgiveness.

original: dgag dbye'i gzhi dang 'brel ba phran tshegs la sogs pa'i skabs so //
analyzed: dgag dbye'i gzhi dang 'brel ba phran tshegs la sogs pa'i skabs so //
translated: This concludes the section on the minor points related to the basis of the poṣadha ceremony.

original: dgag dbye'i gzhi rdzogs so /
analyzed: dgag dbye'i gzhi rdzogs so /
translated: The basis of the poṣadha ceremony is complete.

original: // / sra brkyang gding bar bya'o zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: // / sra brkyang gding bar bya'o zhes bya ba la /
translated: The spreading of the floor covering should be done.

original: sra brkyang zhes bya ba ni gtan pa ste /
analyzed: sra brkyang zhes bya ba ni gtan pa ste /
translated: The term “spreading” means to lay out.

original: 'di ltar 'di ni gos gding bar byed cing rkyong bar byed pa mi 'khums par byed pa'i chos can shing la sogs pa las byas pa'i spang leb la gtan pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ltar 'di ni gos gding bar byed cing rkyong bar byed pa mi 'khums par byed pa'i chos can shing la sogs pa las byas pa'i spang leb la gtan pa zhes bya'o //
translated: Thus, it is called “spreading” because it is a cloth that is laid out, spread, and not rolled up, made from wood or other materials.

original: de la gang zhig 'dis tshogs de la dge slong gcig tshogs te ma lus pa la khyed par byed na tshogs ma lus pa nyid kyis rgyas par 'gyur ba de'i tshogs 'brel pa thams cad la rjes su zhugs pa thams cad la ngo bo gcig pa'i gding bar
analyzed: de la gang zhig 'dis tshogs de la dge slong gcig tshogs te ma lus pa la khyed par byed na tshogs ma lus pa nyid kyis rgyas par 'gyur ba de'i tshogs 'brel pa thams cad la rjes su zhugs pa thams cad la ngo bo gcig pa'i gding bar
translated: If a single monk is added to the assembly, the entire assembly is called a saṃghatī, and the entire assembly is spread out.

original: 'gyur ba dge 'dun mtha' dag la khyab par byed pas de'i ming gtan pa zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'gyur ba dge 'dun mtha' dag la khyab par byed pas de'i ming gtan pa zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The entire assembly is called a saṃghatī because it is spread out over all the individual monks, and it is called a saṃghatī because it is spread out over the entire saṃgha.

original: de nyid kyi phyir 'dir 'di bya ba la gding ba nges par de zhes bya bar brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir 'dir 'di bya ba la gding ba nges par de zhes bya bar brjod pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, here the saṃghatī is called that which is spread out over the entire saṃgha.

original: ci'i phyir gos gsum gding bar bya ba bting ba la 'bras bu ci yod ce na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir gos gsum gding bar bya ba bting ba la 'bras bu ci yod ce na /
translated: Why are three robes spread out? What is the purpose of spreading them out?

original: de'i phyir gsum po dag ji lta ba bzhin du sra brkyang bting na yang yang za ba dang 'dus shing za ba dang / ma smras par grong du 'gro ba dang gos slong ba la yang nyes pa med la /
analyzed: de'i phyir gsum po dag ji lta ba bzhin du sra brkyang bting na yang yang za ba dang 'dus shing za ba dang / ma smras par grong du 'gro ba dang gos slong ba la yang nyes pa med la /
translated: Therefore, if the three robes are spread out as though the kaṭhina has been spread, there is no offense in eating again, eating in a group, going to a village without informing anyone, or begging for robes.

original: de lhag ma dag dang rnyed pa thun mong du 'gyur ro zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: de lhag ma dag dang rnyed pa thun mong du 'gyur ro zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: The rest are shared with the other two.

original: re zhig gsum po dag ces bya ba ni 'chang ba dang 'bral ba dang 'jog pa'i bdag nyid ces smos pa kho na ste /
analyzed: re zhig gsum po dag ces bya ba ni 'chang ba dang 'bral ba dang 'jog pa'i bdag nyid ces smos pa kho na ste /
translated: The three are mentioned in the verse: “The one who wears, the one who is separated from, and the one who stores.”

original: ji ltar bzhi po gzhan 'di thun mong gi mthar thug pa lnga po skyon dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: ji ltar bzhi po gzhan 'di thun mong gi mthar thug pa lnga po skyon dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning of the fourth is that the five are free from faults.

original: smad g-yogs dang stod g-yogs su byas pa'i chos gos kyis ljongs rgyu zhing 'gro ba gang yin pa dang / rung bar byas pa'i gos ji tsam 'dod pa 'chang ba zhes bya ba gang yin ba gnyis po 'di bsdus pa ste /
analyzed: smad g-yogs dang stod g-yogs su byas pa'i chos gos kyis ljongs rgyu zhing 'gro ba gang yin pa dang / rung bar byas pa'i gos ji tsam 'dod pa 'chang ba zhes bya ba gang yin ba gnyis po 'di bsdus pa ste /
translated: The two, “one who goes wandering with the robe made of patches and the upper and lower robes” and “one who wears as much cloth as is necessary,” are included in the three mentioned above.

original: gsum po bstan pa nyid kyis bsdu ba byas zin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gsum po bstan pa nyid kyis bsdu ba byas zin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: They are included in the three mentioned above.

original: gal te de la snam sbyar bskur bas dgos pa med pas des ci zhig bya /
analyzed: gal te de la snam sbyar bskur bas dgos pa med pas des ci zhig bya /
translated: If one is not allowed to wear a patched robe, what is the use of it?

original: ji ltar gang gi phyir stod g-yogs smad g-yogs su bcas pa med na ngo tsha ba'i gnas g-yogs par bya ba'i phyir dang / rab tu 'byung ba'i rtags yang dag par bsrung bar bya ba'i phyir yin gyi /
analyzed: ji ltar gang gi phyir stod g-yogs smad g-yogs su bcas pa med na ngo tsha ba'i gnas g-yogs par bya ba'i phyir dang / rab tu 'byung ba'i rtags yang dag par bsrung bar bya ba'i phyir yin gyi /
translated: Just as, if one does not have an upper and lower robe, one is not covered and one does not guard the signs of a renunciate.

original: snam sbyar bskur ba la dgos pa med pa de bzhin du 'di la'o //
analyzed: snam sbyar bskur ba la dgos pa med pa de bzhin du 'di la'o //
translated: But if one has a patched robe, there is no purpose in having an upper robe.🔽If one gives up the upper robe, there is no fault in wearing the patched robe.

original: gal te btang na 'chang ba @109b la nyes pa med de rnam par rtog pas ci zhig bya zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gal te btang na 'chang ba @109b la nyes pa med de rnam par rtog pas ci zhig bya zhes bya ba'o //
translated: What is the use of speculation?

original: 'o na bcom ldan 'das kyis /
analyzed: 'o na bcom ldan 'das kyis /
translated: But the Blessed One said:

original: tshig 'di brjod pa ci zhig brjod ce na /
analyzed: tshig 'di brjod pa ci zhig brjod ce na /
translated: What is the meaning of this statement?

original: stod g-yogs kyi khur las thar par bya ba'i phan yon bstan pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: stod g-yogs kyi khur las thar par bya ba'i phan yon bstan pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is to show the benefit of being free from the burden of an upper robe.

original: rung ba ma byas pa'i gos 'chang ba de ni rnam par rtog pa'i bya bas thar pa dang bag yangs kyi bde ba'i phan yon yang bstan pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rung ba ma byas pa'i gos 'chang ba de ni rnam par rtog pa'i bya bas thar pa dang bag yangs kyi bde ba'i phan yon yang bstan pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is also to show the benefit of liberation and relaxation from the activity of speculation, by wearing a robe that is not made suitable for use.

original: gsum po dag ces bya ba la ltos pa gang yin zhe na /
analyzed: gsum po dag ces bya ba la ltos pa gang yin zhe na /
translated: What is the meaning of the three?

original: de'i phyir gnas par khas ma blangs pa dang / dbyar ral ba dang / dbyar phyi mar gnas par khas blangs pa dag la de mi 'byung ngo zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: de'i phyir gnas par khas ma blangs pa dang / dbyar ral ba dang / dbyar phyi mar gnas par khas blangs pa dag la de mi 'byung ngo zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: Therefore, it is said, “It does not occur for those who do not undertake the rains residence, who break the rains residence, or who undertake the later rains residence.”

original: sa gzhan gnas pa dag la yang ngo zhes bya ba ni dbyar gnas gzhan du khas blangs pa la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: sa gzhan gnas pa dag la yang ngo zhes bya ba ni dbyar gnas gzhan du khas blangs pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: “It also does not occur for those who live in other regions” means those who undertake the rains residence in other regions, and so on.

original: dbyar gnas pa phyi mar gnas par khas blangs pa de dang ro gcig par 'dra ba'o //🔽dbyar gnas par khas ma blangs pa dang / dbyar ral ba dag la dbyar gyi gtan pa mi 'byung ngo //
analyzed: dbyar gnas pa phyi mar gnas par khas blangs pa de dang ro gcig par 'dra ba'o // dbyar gnas par khas ma blangs pa dang / dbyar ral ba dag la dbyar gyi gtan pa mi 'byung ngo //
translated: The later rains residence is similar to the earlier rains residence in that it is the same substance.🔽The rains observance does not occur for those who do not undertake the rains residence or who break the rains residence.

original: dbyar gnas gzhan du gnas par khas blangs pa dag la ni gtan pa gding ba dag mi 'byung ba ste /🔽gtan pa gding ba ni dngos gzhi'i cho ga la brten pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dbyar gnas gzhan du gnas par khas blangs pa dag la ni gtan pa gding ba dag mi 'byung ba ste / gtan pa gding ba ni dngos gzhi'i cho ga la brten pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The rains observance does not occur for those who undertake the rains residence in other regions.🔽Because the rains observance is based on the rite of the actual basis.

original: dngos gzhi'i cho ga zhes bya ba gtan pa bting ba la bya'o //
analyzed: dngos gzhi'i cho ga zhes bya ba gtan pa bting ba la bya'o //
translated: The rite of the actual basis refers to the spreading of the rains mat.

original: dbyar phyi mar khas blangs pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: dbyar phyi mar khas blangs pa ni ma yin no //
translated: The later rains residence is not like that.

original: dge 'dun gyi dus las 'da' bas de brten pa dang ldan pa'i tshogs pa sbyin ba la yang dbyar gnas par khas len pa med pa'o //
analyzed: dge 'dun gyi dus las 'da' bas de brten pa dang ldan pa'i tshogs pa sbyin ba la yang dbyar gnas par khas len pa med pa'o //
translated: The Saṅgha is the basis for the transgression of the Saṅgha’s time, and the Saṅgha is the basis for the acceptance of the rains residence.

original: 'di ni skal ba mi mnyam pa ste /
analyzed: 'di ni skal ba mi mnyam pa ste /
translated: This is not the case for the non-homogeneous.

original: rang bzhin gnas pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: rang bzhin gnas pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Because it is the natural state.

original: gang zhig sa'i nang du gnas pa nyid ni rang bzhin du gnas pa nyid ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: gang zhig sa'i nang du gnas pa nyid ni rang bzhin du gnas pa nyid ma yin pa'o //
translated: That which is the natural state is not the rains residence.

original: de bas na 'di ltar lhan cig tu ro gcig pa 'di la ni rung ba ma yin no //
analyzed: de bas na 'di ltar lhan cig tu ro gcig pa 'di la ni rung ba ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, it is not proper to have a single taste in this way.

original: gal te skye bar ma gyur na rang bzhin du gnas pa nyid nad par gyur na sra brkyang bting ba dang / bting ba chud zos pa mi skyed pa'o //
analyzed: gal te skye bar ma gyur na rang bzhin du gnas pa nyid nad par gyur na sra brkyang bting ba dang / bting ba chud zos pa mi skyed pa'o //
translated: If it were not generated, the natural state would be damaged, and the spreading of the kaṭhina and the wasting of the spreading would not be generated.

original: dge tshul dag la ni 'di ltar 'di mi skyed pa'o zhes 'byung ngo //
analyzed: dge tshul dag la ni 'di ltar 'di mi skyed pa'o zhes 'byung ngo //
translated: For novices, it is stated that it is not generated in this way.

original: de dang de'i las la 'di ma zhugs pa la cho ga gang yin pa de nyid kyi byas pa zhes gsungs pa de'i phyir 'dir bsdus pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de dang de'i las la 'di ma zhugs pa la cho ga gang yin pa de nyid kyi byas pa zhes gsungs pa de'i phyir 'dir bsdus pa ma yin no //
translated: Since it is said that the rite for one who has not entered this or that action is the same as the one who has, it is not included here.

original: de dag nyid thob pa yin na mi 'byung ngo zhes bya ba ni sra brkyang gding ba nyid las gzhan na ngas pa de dag nyid thob pa la ni mi 'byung ba ste /
analyzed: de dag nyid thob pa yin na mi 'byung ngo zhes bya ba ni sra brkyang gding ba nyid las gzhan na ngas pa de dag nyid thob pa la ni mi 'byung ba ste /
translated: Those very vows that are obtained do not arise if they are other than the vows of the poṣadha vow.

original: sra brkyang gding ba mi 'byung zhing sbyar ba ni ma yin no //🔽tha ma ma gtogs pa dag dang sa @110a * //
analyzed: sra brkyang gding ba mi 'byung zhing sbyar ba ni ma yin no // tha ma ma gtogs pa dag dang sa @110a * //
translated: The poṣadha vow does not arise, but it is not discarded.

original: gzhan na gnas pa dag dang dge tshul ni rnyed pa dbang ngo zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: gzhan na gnas pa dag dang dge tshul ni rnyed pa dbang ngo zhes bya ba la /
translated: Except for the last, those abiding on other levels, and novices obtain it.

original: tha ma ma gtogs pa ni tha ma ma gtogs pa ste /
analyzed: tha ma ma gtogs pa ni tha ma ma gtogs pa ste /
translated: Except for the last means except for the last.

original: gnas gzhan du gnas pa dang dbyar phyi mar khas blangs pa dang dbyar gnas par khas ma blangs pa la sogs pa rnams so //
analyzed: gnas gzhan du gnas pa dang dbyar phyi mar khas blangs pa dang dbyar gnas par khas ma blangs pa la sogs pa rnams so //
translated: Those abiding in other abodes, those who accept the latter rainy season, those who do not accept the rainy season and so on.

original: gal te yang gtan pa gding ba la 'di rnams mi 'gyur ba de ltar yang de rgyu mtshan can gyi rnyed pa la de rnams la skal ba dang ldan ba nyid ces bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: gal te yang gtan pa gding ba la 'di rnams mi 'gyur ba de ltar yang de rgyu mtshan can gyi rnyed pa la de rnams la skal ba dang ldan ba nyid ces bya ba'i don to //
translated: Even though these do not arise for those who accept the poṣadha vow, they are called those who obtain it because they possess the fortune of obtaining it in the future.

original: 'di ltar de dag gi dbyar gnas pa dag dang don gcig pa nyid yin bas bzlog par mi bya ste de rnams kyi de skal ba dang ldan ba nyid do //
analyzed: 'di ltar de dag gi dbyar gnas pa dag dang don gcig pa nyid yin bas bzlog par mi bya ste de rnams kyi de skal ba dang ldan ba nyid do //
translated: Since it is the same as the summer rains retreat of those, it is not to be stopped, and it is their share.🔽Since it is said that those who abide in other lands, it would follow that even those who have been expelled would obtain the right to the rainy season retreat.

original: sa gzhan na gnas pa dag ces smos pas spangs pa yang rnyed pa dbang ba nyid du thal bar 'gyur bas de bsal ba'i phyir spangs pa ni mi dbang ngo zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: sa gzhan na gnas pa dag ces smos pas spangs pa yang rnyed pa dbang ba nyid du thal bar 'gyur bas de bsal ba'i phyir spangs pa ni mi dbang ngo zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: To eliminate that possibility, it says: Those who have been expelled do not have the right.

original: spangs pa ni dge 'dun las tha dad du gyur pa nyid yin pas de'i phyir na gtan pa bting ba'i rnyed pa mi dbang ba nyid du rig par bya'o //
analyzed: spangs pa ni dge 'dun las tha dad du gyur pa nyid yin pas de'i phyir na gtan pa bting ba'i rnyed pa mi dbang ba nyid du rig par bya'o //
translated: Since those who have been expelled are separate from the saṅgha, therefore it should be understood that they do not have the right to the rainy season retreat.

original: de las gzhan pa chad pas bcad pa dang sbo ba la sogs pa byed pa ni dge 'dun las tha dad du gyur pa nyid ma yin pas de'i cho ga 'di mi 'jug pa'o //
analyzed: de las gzhan pa chad pas bcad pa dang sbo ba la sogs pa byed pa ni dge 'dun las tha dad du gyur pa nyid ma yin pas de'i cho ga 'di mi 'jug pa'o //
translated: Those who are punished by other means, such as being suspended or demoted, are not separate from the saṅgha, so this procedure does not apply to them.

original: bye ba dag ni chos ma yin pa'i phyogs dang mthun pa dag tu song ba ni de nyid kyis thob pa dang 'dra'o zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: bye ba dag ni chos ma yin pa'i phyogs dang mthun pa dag tu song ba ni de nyid kyis thob pa dang 'dra'o zhes bya ba la /
translated: The ten million who go to the side of non-Dharma are like the acquisition of that very abandonment.

original: de zhes bya ba'i sgras ni spangs pa la snyegs te spang ba'i rnyed pa dang 'dra ste /
analyzed: de zhes bya ba'i sgras ni spangs pa la snyegs te spang ba'i rnyed pa dang 'dra ste /
translated: The word that refers to abandonment, like the acquisition of abandonment.

original: bye ba dag na 'dod pa gzhan la dmigs pas chos ma yin ba'i phyogs dang mthun pa dag tu gnas pa rnams ltung ba'o //
analyzed: bye ba dag na 'dod pa gzhan la dmigs pas chos ma yin ba'i phyogs dang mthun pa dag tu gnas pa rnams ltung ba'o //
translated: The ten million who abide in the side of non-Dharma by observing other objects of desire are the downfall.

original: ji ltar spangs pa la med par 'gyur ba de bzhin du 'di rnams la zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: ji ltar spangs pa la med par 'gyur ba de bzhin du 'di rnams la zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Just as there is no abandonment, so it is for these, is the meaning.

original: gang gi don du sra brkyang gding bar bya zhes bya ba de bsdu ba bstan nas /
analyzed: gang gi don du sra brkyang gding bar bya zhes bya ba de bsdu ba bstan nas /
translated: Having explained the purpose for which the summer retreat is to be entered,

original: da ni 'dir dngos po gang gding bar bya ba la de la gtan pa nyid ces pa brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: da ni 'dir dngos po gang gding bar bya ba la de la gtan pa nyid ces pa brjod par bya ste /
translated: now here, the substance that is to be entered, and the rules for that, should be stated.

original: dngos po gzhi'i dus su dgag dbye'i mthar dbyar gyi rgyu las byung ba'i gding ba'i nyi ma'i mthar grub pa gos kyi rnyed par bgrang ba'i chos gos gsum mo zhes bya ba la 'dir dbyar dang po rnams bzung ba zhes bya ba de ni dbyar phyi ma la
analyzed: dngos po gzhi'i dus su dgag dbye'i mthar dbyar gyi rgyu las byung ba'i gding ba'i nyi ma'i mthar grub pa gos kyi rnyed par bgrang ba'i chos gos gsum mo zhes bya ba la 'dir dbyar dang po rnams bzung ba zhes bya ba de ni dbyar phyi ma la
translated: Here, the statement one who seizes the first summer retreat does not arise in dependence on the latter summer retreat

original: brten pa la mi 'byung ngo zhes gsungs pa'i tshig gis shes par bya ste /
analyzed: brten pa la mi 'byung ngo zhes gsungs pa'i tshig gis shes par bya ste /
translated: is understood from the words of the sutra.

original: ston zla 'bring po'i tshes bcu drug ni gtan pa gding ba'i nyi ma nyid yin par gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ston zla 'bring po'i tshes bcu drug ni gtan pa gding ba'i nyi ma nyid yin par gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because it is said that the sixteenth day of the middle autumn month is the day of the summer retreat.

original: dngos gzhi'i dus de'i dgag dbye'i zhag man chad gzhan nam rgyu las gzhan pa'i @110b rnyed pa byed bzhin ba'i dgag dbye'i tha ma de rnams bsdus pa nas rgyus rnyed pa la mthar thug pa de dag bsdus pa'i rgyu las byung ba yin nam zhe na /
analyzed: dngos gzhi'i dus de'i dgag dbye'i zhag man chad gzhan nam rgyu las gzhan pa'i @110b rnyed pa byed bzhin ba'i dgag dbye'i tha ma de rnams bsdus pa nas rgyus rnyed pa la mthar thug pa de dag bsdus pa'i rgyu las byung ba yin nam zhe na /
translated: If one asks, are those robes that are acquired from the end of the summer retreat until the day of the actual summer retreat, which is the last day of the summer retreat that is not from the cause, included in the robes that arise from the cause?

original: 'di lta ste dbyar gnas pa'i rgyu las byung ba'i rnyed pa gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: 'di lta ste dbyar gnas pa'i rgyu las byung ba'i rnyed pa gang yin pa'o //
translated: For example, it is the acquisition that arises from the cause of the rainy season retreat.

original: yang na so so ba ste /
analyzed: yang na so so ba ste /
translated: Or, it is individual.

original: 'di ltar rgyu las byung ba'i rnyed pa gang la yod pa de ni dngos gzhi'i dus kyi dgag dbye'i mthar dbyar gyi rgu las byung bas te /
analyzed: 'di ltar rgyu las byung ba'i rnyed pa gang la yod pa de ni dngos gzhi'i dus kyi dgag dbye'i mthar dbyar gyi rgu las byung bas te /
translated: Thus, it is the acquisition that arises from the cause of the rainy season retreat at the conclusion of the rainy season retreat at the time of the actual basis.

original: dus gzhan du 'byung ba ni ma yin te /
analyzed: dus gzhan du 'byung ba ni ma yin te /
translated: It does not arise at another time.

original: gding ba'i zhag rnams kyi mtha' can 'di rnams dang 'brel ba'o //
analyzed: gding ba'i zhag rnams kyi mtha' can 'di rnams dang 'brel ba'o //

original: de'i dus las dus gang yang rung ba'i sa las bsgrub pa ste /
analyzed: de'i dus las dus gang yang rung ba'i sa las bsgrub pa ste /
translated: It is established from any time other than that time.

original: dus gzhan gyi rgyu las byung ba'i rnyed pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: dus gzhan gyi rgyu las byung ba'i rnyed pa ni ma yin no //
translated: It is not the acquisition that arises from the cause of another time.

original: lag gi bla dang rgyan 'dogs pa dang ba glang gi dang ma he dang mal stan dang der gtogs pa'i dgag dbye la sogs pa'i bye brag gi don du sbyin ba ma yin te /
analyzed: lag gi bla dang rgyan 'dogs pa dang ba glang gi dang ma he dang mal stan dang der gtogs pa'i dgag dbye la sogs pa'i bye brag gi don du sbyin ba ma yin te /
translated: It is not given for the purpose of the distinctions of the hand span, ornaments, cows, buffaloes, beds, bedding, the conclusion of the rainy season retreat, and so forth.

original: de'i grangs dang ldan pa chos gos gsum zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de'i grangs dang ldan pa chos gos gsum zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning of the three robes is that they are possessed by that number.

original: gtsug lag khang na gos kyi rnyed par nges pa gang yin pa de yang 'dir bsdus pa shes par bya ste /
analyzed: gtsug lag khang na gos kyi rnyed par nges pa gang yin pa de yang 'dir bsdus pa shes par bya ste /
translated: One should understand that the robes that are definitely obtained in the temple are included here.

original: de lta bas na gos kyi don du rnyed pa'i rin dag gis rnyed pa bzung ngo //
analyzed: de lta bas na gos kyi don du rnyed pa'i rin dag gis rnyed pa bzung ngo //

original: de lta bas na chos gos gsum du shes par bya ba ma yin te /
analyzed: de lta bas na chos gos gsum du shes par bya ba ma yin te /

analyzed: gos gsum la sra brkyang nyid gding bar bya'o zhes bya ba 'dir dngos su sgrub byed cung zad kyang ma mthong ngo //

original: rtags ni yod de /

original: de gang las shes she na /
analyzed: de gang las shes she na /

analyzed: gang gi phyir gcig pu zhig gding bar bya ba nyid yin na ni de'i tshe rang gi zhes bya ba gcig gi tshig 'thob pa'o //

analyzed: gcig cig byin gyis brlabs pa la gsum char gyis dbyung ba yang mi rigs pa'i phyir ro //
