analyzed: btsems par ma yin pa de'o //
translated: and not sewn together.

original: lhan rings can ma yin ba zhes bya ba ni gang du lhan pa ring por glan pa ste /🔽de lta bus ma glan pa ni lhan rings can ma yin ba'o //
analyzed: lhan rings can ma yin ba zhes bya ba ni gang du lhan pa ring por glan pa ste / de lta bus ma glan pa ni lhan rings can ma yin ba'o //
translated: Not patched means not patched with long strips.🔽Not patched means not patched with other patches.

original: lhan pa can zhes bya ba ni gang la chu bur gyi rnam pa ltar rlob lhan pa gzhan glan pa can ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: lhan pa can zhes bya ba ni gang la chu bur gyi rnam pa ltar rlob lhan pa gzhan glan pa can ma yin pa'o //
translated: Patchy means like a blister, not patched with other patches.

original: de ni kha cig gis lhan pa zhes bya bar brjod pa yin te /
analyzed: de ni kha cig gis lhan pa zhes bya bar brjod pa yin te /
translated: Some say it is a patch.

original: 'di la de las don tha dad par shes par bya ba ma yin no //
analyzed: 'di la de las don tha dad par shes par bya ba ma yin no //
translated: It should be understood that it is not different from that.

original: g-ya' bar byed pa zhes bya bar dbyar dang byi ba'i rnam pa gsad pa ni 'dir g-ya' bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: g-ya' bar byed pa zhes bya bar dbyar dang byi ba'i rnam pa gsad pa ni 'dir g-ya' bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Itching means itching in summer and the form of a mouse. Here the meaning of itching is itching.

original: cha ga can zhes bya ba ni chos gos dag gi mtha' thog thag tu cha ga tsam btab pa ste /
analyzed: cha ga can zhes bya ba ni chos gos dag gi mtha' thog thag tu cha ga tsam btab pa ste /
translated: Having fringes means having fringes the size of a finger joint on the edges of the robes.

original: gang du de rnams med pa de ni cha ga med pa'o //
analyzed: gang du de rnams med pa de ni cha ga med pa'o //
translated: Where those do not exist, it is without fringes.

original: tha ma zegs pa dag la zungs can byad pa de gang du med pa de ni zungs can ma yin ba'o //
analyzed: tha ma zegs pa dag la zungs can byad pa de gang du med pa de ni zungs can ma yin ba'o //
translated: Having a border means having a border on the edges of the robes. Where that does not exist, it is without a border.

original: mtha' zegs pa rnams la zungs can ma byas pa nyid la yang mi mos pa nyid gtan pa ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir rig par bya'o //
analyzed: mtha' zegs pa rnams la zungs can ma byas pa nyid la yang mi mos pa nyid gtan pa ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir rig par bya'o //
translated: It should be understood that the reason is not that they are not called “the one with the girdle” because they are not girdled.

original: spangs pa dang rgyu ma btags pa dang bral phrad ma yin ba'o zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: spangs pa dang rgyu ma btags pa dang bral phrad ma yin ba'o zhes bya ba ni /
translated: “ Abandonment, non-ascertainment of a reason, and neither separation nor conjunction”

original: 'dir yang ma yin ba zhes bya ba'i sgra so sor sbyor te /
analyzed: 'dir yang ma yin ba zhes bya ba'i sgra so sor sbyor te /
translated: Here the word “not” is to be applied to each of the three.

original: nye bar gnas pa dang mi rung ba bkag pa dag la 'dir spangs pa ma yin ba dang bral phrad ma yin pa zhes bya ba grangs ji lta ba bzhin du bsdu ba'o //
analyzed: nye bar gnas pa dang mi rung ba bkag pa dag la 'dir spangs pa ma yin ba dang bral phrad ma yin pa zhes bya ba grangs ji lta ba bzhin du bsdu ba'o //
translated: Abandonment, non-ascertainment of a reason, and neither separation nor conjunction are included here in the same order as they are in the root text.

original: 'dir gzhung ni /
analyzed: 'dir gzhung ni /
translated: Here is the root text:

original: bram ze'i bu mos zhus pa las /
analyzed: bram ze'i bu mos zhus pa las /
translated: The Sūtra Requested by the Daughter of a Brahmin

original: rgyu ma btags pa zhes bya ba ni rung ba ma yin ba'o zhes gsungs pa yin te /
analyzed: rgyu ma btags pa zhes bya ba ni rung ba ma yin ba'o zhes gsungs pa yin te /
translated: says, “Non-ascertainment of a reason” means “not suitable.”

original: spangs pa nye bar gzhag pa zhes bya ba ni 'dir zhu ba las kyang gsungs so //
analyzed: spangs pa nye bar gzhag pa zhes bya ba ni 'dir zhu ba las kyang gsungs so //
translated: “ Abandonment” is also mentioned in the Questions of Paramārthasamudgata.

original: chos gos gzhag pa gang yin zhe na /
analyzed: chos gos gzhag pa gang yin zhe na /
translated: What is the placement of the Dharma robe?

original: 'dir zhu ba las chos gos gang zhag bcu 'das pa 'am zhag gcig bral ba'o zhes gsungs te /
analyzed: 'dir zhu ba las chos gos gang zhag bcu 'das pa 'am zhag gcig bral ba'o zhes gsungs te /
translated: Here it is said that a Dharma robe is one that is kept more than ten days or that is separated from the monk for one day.

original: 'di dag gi 'jug pa tsam ni 'di rgyu mtshan du byas te /
analyzed: 'di dag gi 'jug pa tsam ni 'di rgyu mtshan du byas te /
translated: The mere usage of these terms is based on these reasons.

original: gang zhig sngar spangs par gyur pa dang de ltar ni mi rung ba de yin te /
analyzed: gang zhig sngar spangs par gyur pa dang de ltar ni mi rung ba de yin te /
translated: It is not suitable to say that a robe is separated from the monk if it was previously discarded.

original: zhag lon par brjod par nges pa'i phyir ro ;
analyzed: zhag lon par brjod par nges pa'i phyir ro ;
translated: This is because it is certain that it is separated from the monk for one day.

original: / bral phrad ces bya ba 'dis phyag dar khyod kyang bkag pa'o //
analyzed: / bral phrad ces bya ba 'dis phyag dar khyod kyang bkag pa'o //
translated: The term separated from the monk also prohibits the practice of the refuse rag wearer.

original: 'dir bral phrad kyi sgras ni thams cad phyag dar khrod kyi don can te /
analyzed: 'dir bral phrad kyi sgras ni thams cad phyag dar khrod kyi don can te /
translated: Here the term separated from the monk refers to all refuse rag wearers.

original: sngar bor ba'i tshe na bdag po dang bral ba yin la phyis blangs pa'i tshe na bdag po gzhan dang phrad pa de tsam zhig nye bar blangs pa'o //
analyzed: sngar bor ba'i tshe na bdag po dang bral ba yin la phyis blangs pa'i tshe na bdag po gzhan dang phrad pa de tsam zhig nye bar blangs pa'o //
translated: When they discard their robes, they are separated from their owners. When they later take them up, they are separated from their owners.

original: gang zhig phyir 'di ltar @112b bram ze'i bu mos zhus pa las /
analyzed: gang zhig phyir 'di ltar @112b bram ze'i bu mos zhus pa las /
translated: The sūtra of the questions of the daughter of the Brahmin asks:

original: chos gos bral phrad gang zhe na /
analyzed: chos gos bral phrad gang zhe na /
translated: What is a robe that is separated from the monk?

original: chos gos gang lam ka nas byung ste /
analyzed: chos gos gang lam ka nas byung ste /
translated: A robe that is found on the road.

original: lam du bor ba las rnyed pa gang yin ba'o zhes gsungs pa de'i don mthong ba yin no //
analyzed: lam du bor ba las rnyed pa gang yin ba'o zhes gsungs pa de'i don mthong ba yin no //
translated: The meaning of the statement “that which is found on the road” is that which is seen.

original: dras shing drubs pa'o zhes bya ba ni byin gyis brlab tu mi rung ba ni ma yin no //
analyzed: dras shing drubs pa'o zhes bya ba ni byin gyis brlab tu mi rung ba ni ma yin no //
translated: “Sewn and woven” means that it is not unfit to be consecrated.

original: de'i phyir sbyar ma nyid kyang gang gi tshe byin gyis brlab par gsungs pa gang yin ba de yang 'dis bsdus pa yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir sbyar ma nyid kyang gang gi tshe byin gyis brlab par gsungs pa gang yin ba de yang 'dis bsdus pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, even a patchwork is consecrated when it is said to be consecrated.

original: zin pa'o // lnga pa'o //
analyzed: zin pa'o // lnga pa'o //
translated: It is five cubits in size.

original: lhag ma yang ngo zhes bya ba ni khru lnga po dag la 'di la dge 'dun gyis khyab pa yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: lhag ma yang ngo zhes bya ba ni khru lnga po dag la 'di la dge 'dun gyis khyab pa yin pa'i phyir /
translated: “The rest” means that the saṅgha is covered by the five cubits.

original: lus 'ba' zhig la ni ma yin te /
analyzed: lus 'ba' zhig la ni ma yin te /
translated: It is not just the body.

original: de'i phyir lhag ma la nyes pa med do //
analyzed: de'i phyir lhag ma la nyes pa med do //
translated: Therefore, there is no fault in the rest.

original: gding ba zhes bya ba'i tshad ji snyed pa de tsam gyi rkyen gyi nang du 'dus pa las lhag ma ni ma yin zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: gding ba zhes bya ba'i tshad ji snyed pa de tsam gyi rkyen gyi nang du 'dus pa las lhag ma ni ma yin zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that the size of the mat is included in the five cubits, and there is no excess.

original: yo byad rnams la der 'byung ba'i phyir bsgrub pa ni dge 'dun gyi gnas su rnyed pa'i phyir 'byung ba'i zhing re re la sra brkyang gding ba bskyed pa'o //
analyzed: yo byad rnams la der 'byung ba'i phyir bsgrub pa ni dge 'dun gyi gnas su rnyed pa'i phyir 'byung ba'i zhing re re la sra brkyang gding ba bskyed pa'o //
translated: The bedding is spread on the site of the acquisition of the requisite, because the requisite arises there.

original: 'dir thams cad du dman pa ni dge 'dun gyis rnam par gzhag pa rigs pa yin no //
analyzed: 'dir thams cad du dman pa ni dge 'dun gyis rnam par gzhag pa rigs pa yin no //
translated: The inferior is always established by the Saṅgha.

original: de lta bas ni 'dir gzhi'i tshad kyi 'byor pa ji snyed pa de'i khungs su bsdus pa de las lhag pa ma yin pa zhes bya ba 'grub ba'o //
analyzed: de lta bas ni 'dir gzhi'i tshad kyi 'byor pa ji snyed pa de'i khungs su bsdus pa de las lhag pa ma yin pa zhes bya ba 'grub ba'o //
translated: Therefore, the measure of the site is established as the amount of requisite that can be contained within it.

original: kha cig na re /
analyzed: kha cig na re /
translated: Some say:🔽The bedding is spread on more than three robes, because the requisite arises there.

original: chos gos sum phrugs bzhi bas lhag par bting ba la yang don der 'byung ba nyid kyi phyir yo byad rnams lhag par 'byor ba mi brlag pa rnams kyis brten par bya ste /
analyzed: chos gos sum phrugs bzhi bas lhag par bting ba la yang don der 'byung ba nyid kyi phyir yo byad rnams lhag par 'byor ba mi brlag pa rnams kyis brten par bya ste /
translated: The bedding is not lost by those who have the requisite.

original: bye brag med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bye brag med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because there is no distinction.

original: yang bde bar gshegs pa'i chos gos shin tu chen po la yang 'phags pa nyid du rig par bya'o //
analyzed: yang bde bar gshegs pa'i chos gos shin tu chen po la yang 'phags pa nyid du rig par bya'o //
translated: Also, the very large robe of the Sugata should be known as the noble one.

original: sngar ma bting ba'o zhes bya ba ni gang zhig lo gzhan la gtan pa nyid du sngar ma bting ba ni zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: sngar ma bting ba'o zhes bya ba ni gang zhig lo gzhan la gtan pa nyid du sngar ma bting ba ni zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: “Not previously spread” means that which has not been spread out before, for the entire year.

original: bting ba'o zhes bya ba ni sprog ma'i nang du bting ba ste bsdus te gzhag pa ni ma yin to //
analyzed: bting ba'o zhes bya ba ni sprog ma'i nang du bting ba ste bsdus te gzhag pa ni ma yin to //
translated: “Spread out” means that which is spread out inside a bag, but not that which is stored away.

original: du ma yang ngo zhes bya ba ni chos gos sum phrugs zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: du ma yang ngo zhes bya ba ni chos gos sum phrugs zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: “Many” means a triple robe.

original: dge 'dun gyi tshogs du ma yong pa'i phyir chos gos sum phrugs du ma yang 'dir mthun pa yin no //
analyzed: dge 'dun gyi tshogs du ma yong pa'i phyir chos gos sum phrugs du ma yang 'dir mthun pa yin no //
translated: Since there are many assemblies of the Saṅgha, many triple robes are suitable here.

original: de ji snyed pa'i 'ding bar byed pa'o zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: de ji snyed pa'i 'ding bar byed pa'o zhes bya ba la /
translated: “As many as there are of those, he should appoint as spreaders.”

original: de'i sgras ni chos gos sum phrugs la bzung ngo //
analyzed: de'i sgras ni chos gos sum phrugs la bzung ngo //
translated: The word “those” refers to the triple robes.

original: chos gos sum phrugs de ji snyed pa de snyed kyi gding bar byed pa'i dge slong bsko bar bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: chos gos sum phrugs de ji snyed pa de snyed kyi gding bar byed pa'i dge slong bsko bar bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that a monk should be appointed as a spreader for as many triple robes as there are.

original: de ni chos gos gzhan byin gyis brlab pa yin pas de'i phyir byin gyis brlabs pa dag phyung nas so zhes @113a * //
analyzed: de ni chos gos gzhan byin gyis brlab pa yin pas de'i phyir byin gyis brlabs pa dag phyung nas so zhes @113a * //
translated: This is the consecration of another robe, so it is said that the consecrated robes are excluded.

original: bya ba ni tshogs pa la mi brten pas brjod par bya'o zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: bya ba ni tshogs pa la mi brten pas brjod par bya'o zhes bya ba ni /
translated: It is said that it is not dependent on the saṅgha.

original: rang gi rdzas ni don du nges par sbyar ba 'di yin te /
analyzed: rang gi rdzas ni don du nges par sbyar ba 'di yin te /
translated: This is the definite application to the meaning of one's own substance.

original: gang gis ni mthun pa'o //
analyzed: gang gis ni mthun pa'o //
translated: By what is it concordant?

original: bdag pos mi 'dor ba'i rdzas don la nges par sbyor ba ma yin te /
analyzed: bdag pos mi 'dor ba'i rdzas don la nges par sbyor ba ma yin te /
translated: The substance that is not discarded by the owner is not definitely applied to the meaning.

original: de lta bas na bdag po rnams kyis 'dir 'dod pas blang bar bya'o //
analyzed: de lta bas na bdag po rnams kyis 'dir 'dod pas blang bar bya'o //
translated: Therefore, it should be accepted here by the owners as they wish.

original: ci tshogs pa rjes su bgrang bar yin nam zhe na /
analyzed: ci tshogs pa rjes su bgrang bar yin nam zhe na /
translated: Is it counted as the saṅgha?

original: de'i phyir zhag ma lon par tshogs pas mos par bya'o zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: de'i phyir zhag ma lon par tshogs pas mos par bya'o zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: Therefore, it is said that the saṅgha should consent to it before the day is over.

original: tshogs pa khas len pa la rtsom pa 'di'o //🔽mngon sum du phyogs pa'i dbang gis tshogs pa 'byor pa'o //
analyzed: tshogs pa khas len pa la rtsom pa 'di'o // mngon sum du phyogs pa'i dbang gis tshogs pa 'byor pa'o //
translated: This is the beginning of accepting the saṅgha.🔽The saṅgha is prosperous by the power of being present.

original: tshogs pa la tshogs pas mngon du phyogs pa nyid ni shin tu stobs dang ldan ba ste /
analyzed: tshogs pa la tshogs pas mngon du phyogs pa nyid ni shin tu stobs dang ldan ba ste /
translated: The saṅgha's presence in the saṅgha is very powerful.

original: de lta bas na cho ga 'di gang gi tshe zhe na /
analyzed: de lta bas na cho ga 'di gang gi tshe zhe na /
translated: Thus, when is this procedure performed?

original: de'i phyir zhag ma lon par zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: de'i phyir zhag ma lon par zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: Therefore, it says, “when the day has not yet passed.”

original: zhag ma lon pa ni nyi ma gang la chos gos de 'byor ba'i nyi ma de nyid la bdag po rnams kyis tshogs pa de la 'dod par bya zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: zhag ma lon pa ni nyi ma gang la chos gos de 'byor ba'i nyi ma de nyid la bdag po rnams kyis tshogs pa de la 'dod par bya zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The day has not yet passed means that on the very day that the robe is obtained, the owners should desire it in the assembly.

original: 'dir gzhung ni /
analyzed: 'dir gzhung ni /
translated: The text states:

original: je dang po kho nar tshogs pas chos gos 'di ni dbyar gnas pa'i dge 'dun gyi chos gos kyi rnyed pa grub pa lags te /
analyzed: je dang po kho nar tshogs pas chos gos 'di ni dbyar gnas pa'i dge 'dun gyi chos gos kyi rnyed pa grub pa lags te /
translated: First, the assembly should be inspired with this thought: “This robe is the robe-cloth offering for the saṅgha that stays in the rainy season.

original: gal te dge 'dun bzhed na chos gos 'dis dge 'dun gyi sra brkyang 'ding par 'gyur ro zhes mos par bya'o //
analyzed: gal te dge 'dun bzhed na chos gos 'dis dge 'dun gyi sra brkyang 'ding par 'gyur ro zhes mos par bya'o //
translated: If the saṅgha agrees, this robe will be used to make the saṅgha’s rainy-season robe.”

original: de'i 'og tu nyi ma gzhan la gnas mal bsham par bya'o zhes gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: de'i 'og tu nyi ma gzhan la gnas mal bsham par bya'o zhes gsungs pa yin no //
translated: After that, the bedding should be arranged on another day.

original: nyi ma gzhan la mos par bya ba'i nyi ma de nyid dam /
analyzed: nyi ma gzhan la mos par bya ba'i nyi ma de nyid dam /
translated: The day on which the inspiration is performed is the very day or

original: nyi ma gnyis pa la blo mthun bar bya ba'i dge slong kho nar nges pa med de /
analyzed: nyi ma gnyis pa la blo mthun bar bya ba'i dge slong kho nar nges pa med de /
translated: the second day. There is no certainty that the inspiration must be performed by a monk.

original: de'i phyir don 'di la gding ba'i nyi ma gang nyid la brjod pa de nyid la mthun ba'i blo zhes bya ba 'di ltar rtse gcig pa nyid du de ltar gnas pa yin gyi /
analyzed: de'i phyir don 'di la gding ba'i nyi ma gang nyid la brjod pa de nyid la mthun ba'i blo zhes bya ba 'di ltar rtse gcig pa nyid du de ltar gnas pa yin gyi /
translated: Therefore, on the very day that one intends to spread the mat, one should be of the same mind, i.e., one should be of the same mind as those who intend to spread the mat on that very day.

original: gnyis pa nyid la ni ma yin te 'dir dgos pa med pa'i phyir ro //🔽mtshams kyi nang du blo mthun bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni bzhed na chos gos sra brkyang nyid bya ba'o //🔽gding ba yang ngo zhes bya ba ni mtshams kyi nang du blo mthun par bya'o zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: gnyis pa nyid la ni ma yin te 'dir dgos pa med pa'i phyir ro // mtshams kyi nang du blo mthun bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni bzhed na chos gos sra brkyang nyid bya ba'o // gding ba yang ngo zhes bya ba ni mtshams kyi nang du blo mthun par bya'o zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: One should not be of the same mind as those who intend to spread the mat on another day, because there is no need for that.🔽One should be of the same mind within the boundary means that if one wishes, one should spread the robe on the very day.🔽One should also spread the mat means that one should be of the same mind within the boundary.

original: dbyar gnas pa la ni mtshams sbyar ba ni gang zhig gding ba yang ngo zhes bya ba'o ;
analyzed: dbyar gnas pa la ni mtshams sbyar ba ni gang zhig gding ba yang ngo zhes bya ba'o ;
translated: As for the rainy season retreat, one should spread the mat and enter the boundary on the very day.

original: / dbyar gnas pa'i zhing las gzhan pa blo mthun pa 'di mi dge ba bskyed pa'o //
analyzed: / dbyar gnas pa'i zhing las gzhan pa blo mthun pa 'di mi dge ba bskyed pa'o //
translated: This being of the same mind, which is different from the rainy season retreat, generates nonvirtue.

original: gang gi phyir gding ba byas pa la 'di la mtshams sbyar ba ni ma yin no //
analyzed: gang gi phyir gding ba byas pa la 'di la mtshams sbyar ba ni ma yin no //
translated: Because one does not enter the boundary on the very day one spreads the mat.

original: de thams cad ni gding ba la byed pa nyid de /
analyzed: de thams cad ni gding ba la byed pa nyid de /
translated: All of this refers to the act of spreading the mat.

original: de'i phyir brjod pa la yang mtshams kyi nang du bya ba nyid ces bya bar rig par bya'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir brjod pa la yang mtshams kyi nang du bya ba nyid ces bya bar rig par bya'o //
translated: Therefore, it should be understood that the term “within the boundary” also applies to the statement.

original: gang la @113b de 'byung ba'o zhes bya ba ni rnam pa gang gis gding ba mi 'byung ba sde /
analyzed: gang la @113b de 'byung ba'o zhes bya ba ni rnam pa gang gis gding ba mi 'byung ba sde /
translated: “The one who is to make it” refers to the one who is to make the sitting mat.

original: sngar dbyar gnas par khas blangs pa de dag las gzhan gding ba por blo mthun par mi bya zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: sngar dbyar gnas par khas blangs pa de dag las gzhan gding ba por blo mthun par mi bya zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that one should not agree to make a sitting mat with someone other than the one who previously agreed to stay in the rainy season.

original: de la gtad par bya'o zhes bya ba ni gtan pa gding bar blo mthun par byas ba de nyid la'o //
analyzed: de la gtad par bya'o zhes bya ba ni gtan pa gding bar blo mthun par byas ba de nyid la'o //
translated: “It should be given to him” means that it should be given to the one with whom one has agreed to make the sitting mat.

original: ji ltar gtad par bya zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar gtad par bya zhe na /
translated: How should it be given?

original: de'i phyir gsol bar byas te zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: de'i phyir gsol bar byas te zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: Therefore, it says, “after requesting.”

original: gsol ba 'ba' zhig gi las bya ste /
analyzed: gsol ba 'ba' zhig gi las bya ste /
translated: The action of requesting alone should be done.

original: gtad par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: gtad par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that it should be given.

original: gang gi che chos gos mthun par byas pa'i nyi ma de nyid la yang 'ding ba po la gtad par bya'o zhes bya ba de shugs kyis rtogs par bya'o //
analyzed: gang gi che chos gos mthun par byas pa'i nyi ma de nyid la yang 'ding ba po la gtad par bya'o zhes bya ba de shugs kyis rtogs par bya'o //
translated: It should be understood by implication that it should be given to the one who is to make the sitting mat on the very day that the robes are made.

original: gang gi phyir chos gos blo mthun par byas ba nyi ma gzhan du gzhag par rigs pa ma yin ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gang gi phyir chos gos blo mthun par byas ba nyi ma gzhan du gzhag par rigs pa ma yin ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is not proper to set aside the other day for the robe, having made an agreement about the robe.

original: bkru ba dang drubs pa dang / ba bsgyur ba dag la des sngon du 'gro bar bya'o zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: bkru ba dang drubs pa dang / ba bsgyur ba dag la des sngon du 'gro bar bya'o zhes bya ba la /
translated: One should go first to the washing, sewing, and dying.

original: des zhes bya ba ni gtan pa 'ding bar byed pa'o //
analyzed: des zhes bya ba ni gtan pa 'ding bar byed pa'o //
translated: By him means by the one who is setting the time limit.

original: ji ltar sngon du 'gro bar bya zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar sngon du 'gro bar bya zhe na /
translated: How should one go first?

original: de'i phyir gnyis sam gsum rjes su bsgrub pas so zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: de'i phyir gnyis sam gsum rjes su bsgrub pas so zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: Therefore it says, By accomplishing two or three tasks.

original: bya ba gnyis sam gsum gyi las rjes su bsgrub pas so //
analyzed: bya ba gnyis sam gsum gyi las rjes su bsgrub pas so //
translated: By accomplishing two or three tasks.

original: zin pa zhig grub na rang gis khab srubs gnyis sam gsum drub par bya'o zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: zin pa zhig grub na rang gis khab srubs gnyis sam gsum drub par bya'o zhes bya ba ni /
translated: If it is finished, he should sew two or three stitches himself.

original: gal te chos gos de byas zin pa zhig grub na de'i tshe sra brkyang 'ding ba pos de rang gis bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: gal te chos gos de byas zin pa zhig grub na de'i tshe sra brkyang 'ding ba pos de rang gis bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: If that robe is finished, then at that time the one setting the time limit should do it himself. This is the meaning.

original: 'dir gzhung ni /
analyzed: 'dir gzhung ni /
translated: Here is the text:

original: dge slong gtan pa 'ding bas gtan pa 'ding ba'i chos gos bkru bar bya ba dang drub par bya ba dang / kha bsgyur bar bya ba la sngon du 'gro bar bya'o //
analyzed: dge slong gtan pa 'ding bas gtan pa 'ding ba'i chos gos bkru bar bya ba dang drub par bya ba dang / kha bsgyur bar bya ba la sngon du 'gro bar bya'o //
translated: The monk who is to spread the mat should first wash, sew, and dye the mat-spreading cloth.

original: gal te zin pa zhig rnyad na de'i 'og tu tha na khab srubs gnyis sam gsum drub par bya'o zhes bya ba gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: gal te zin pa zhig rnyad na de'i 'og tu tha na khab srubs gnyis sam gsum drub par bya'o zhes bya ba gsungs pa yin no //
translated: If he finds a finished one, he should sew two or three stitches.

original: mnos pa dang rang byed pa dang / de'i mjug dag tu go rims bzhin du 'ding bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mnos pa dang rang byed pa dang / de'i mjug dag tu go rims bzhin du 'ding bar 'gyur ro //
translated: The mat is spread in the order of taking it up, making it oneself, and its conclusion.

original: gding ngo // bting ngo snyam du sems bskyed par bya'o zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: gding ngo // bting ngo snyam du sems bskyed par bya'o zhes bya ba la /
translated: One should generate the thought “I spread it” or “I have spread it.”

original: mnos pa zhes bya ba ni dang po dge 'dun las gtan pa gding ba'i chos gos mnos pa'i tshe'o //
analyzed: mnos pa zhes bya ba ni dang po dge 'dun las gtan pa gding ba'i chos gos mnos pa'i tshe'o //
translated: “Taking it up” is when one first takes up the mat-spreading cloth from the Saṅgha.

original: gang zhig der 'di rang gis sgrub par byed pa na sngon du 'gro bar 'gyur ba zin pa zhig grub na de'i rang gi byas pa dang byed pa dang / de'i mjug dag tu go rims bzhin du 'ding bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i sems gsum po rnams bskyed par bya'o //
analyzed: gang zhig der 'di rang gis sgrub par byed pa na sngon du 'gro bar 'gyur ba zin pa zhig grub na de'i rang gi byas pa dang byed pa dang / de'i mjug dag tu go rims bzhin du 'ding bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i sems gsum po rnams bskyed par bya'o //
translated: When one is going to accomplish that by oneself, if one has already completed the preliminary steps, one should generate the three thoughts: “I will spread out the mat,” “I will do it myself,” and “I will do it at the end.”

original: dang po nyams na mi 'byung ba ma yin @114a * //
analyzed: dang po nyams na mi 'byung ba ma yin @114a * //
translated: If the first is damaged, the others do not arise.

original: no zhes bya ba ni mnos pa'i tshe na 'ding bar 'gyur ro snyams du 'di nyams pa la gzhan 'og ma gnyis rjes su bsgrub pas gding bar byed pa po mi 'byung ba ma yin te 'byung ngo //
analyzed: no zhes bya ba ni mnos pa'i tshe na 'ding bar 'gyur ro snyams du 'di nyams pa la gzhan 'og ma gnyis rjes su bsgrub pas gding bar byed pa po mi 'byung ba ma yin te 'byung ngo //
translated: If one vows to spread it out, thinking “I will spread it out,” the other two lower ones are accomplished in sequence. The one who spreads it out does not not arise, but arises.

original: tshe dang ldan pa dag bdag sang gtan pa 'dir bar 'gyur gyis khyed cag gis rang rang gi chos gos rnams dbyung bar bya'o zhes tshogs pa la brjod par bya'o zhes bya ba ni de nyid kyi tshig gis shes par bya ste /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa dag bdag sang gtan pa 'dir bar 'gyur gyis khyed cag gis rang rang gi chos gos rnams dbyung bar bya'o zhes tshogs pa la brjod par bya'o zhes bya ba ni de nyid kyi tshig gis shes par bya ste /
translated: Venerable ones, tomorrow I will be in such and such a place. You should take out your own Dharma robes. This should be announced to the assembly. This should be understood by the words themselves.

original: sang 'ding bar 'gyur ba nyid la 'di brjod pa'o //
analyzed: sang 'ding bar 'gyur ba nyid la 'di brjod pa'o //
translated: This is said for the sake of those who will do it tomorrow.

original: 'o na chos gos gzhan byin gyis brlab pa zhes bya ba de 'don pa la 'jug pa grub pa de bas na brjod pa 'di don med do zhe na brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: 'o na chos gos gzhan byin gyis brlab pa zhes bya ba de 'don pa la 'jug pa grub pa de bas na brjod pa 'di don med do zhe na brjod par bya ste /
translated: If the rite of accepting another robe is accomplished by reciting the text, then this explanation is pointless.

original: kha cig mi mkhas pa dang mkhas pa dag dran pa brjed ngas pa 'byung ste de'i don du 'di bya'o //
analyzed: kha cig mi mkhas pa dang mkhas pa dag dran pa brjed ngas pa 'byung ste de'i don du 'di bya'o //
translated: This is for the sake of those who are forgetful, both the wise and the unwise.

original: 'du ba'i skabs rjes su bsgrub par bya'o zhes bya ba ni gding ba'i don du dge 'dun gang 'du ba gang yin pa de'i skabs 'di ni gnas mal bsham pa dang / gand'i brdung ba dang dris pa'i tshig gis yang dag par bsgo ba rnams la ste 'ding bar byed pa pos bsgrub cing 'ding bar byed pa yang dag par bsko ba dang /
analyzed: 'du ba'i skabs rjes su bsgrub par bya'o zhes bya ba ni gding ba'i don du dge 'dun gang 'du ba gang yin pa de'i skabs 'di ni gnas mal bsham pa dang / gand'i brdung ba dang dris pa'i tshig gis yang dag par bsgo ba rnams la ste 'ding bar byed pa pos bsgrub cing 'ding bar byed pa yang dag par bsko ba dang /
translated: The context of the assembly should be accomplished means that the context of the assembly of monks for the sake of spreading out the mat is the arrangement of bedding, the striking of the gandi, and the announcement with the question. The one who spreads out the mat should accomplish and spread it.

original: de ma thag pa'i blo gding ba gding ba'i don du gang zhig ces bya ba der rtogs pa'o //
analyzed: de ma thag pa'i blo gding ba gding ba'i don du gang zhig ces bya ba der rtogs pa'o //
translated: The one who spreads out the mat should be appointed and the immediate mind should be spread out for the sake of spreading out the mat.

original: dri dang me tog gis mchod cing bdug spos dri zhim pos bdug pa du ma gzeb kyi sprog mar lhan cig gzhag pa thogs te /
analyzed: dri dang me tog gis mchod cing bdug spos dri zhim pos bdug pa du ma gzeb kyi sprog mar lhan cig gzhag pa thogs te /
translated: He should carry many fragrant flowers, incense, and so forth, and place them in the bag.🔽He should carry the bag, and sit in the order of seniority, and say, I will make the sitting mat.

original: rgan rims su 'dug pas gding ba bsgrub par bya'o zhes bya ba ni kha cig du ma zhes bya ba ni chos gos gsum mo //
analyzed: rgan rims su 'dug pas gding ba bsgrub par bya'o zhes bya ba ni kha cig du ma zhes bya ba ni chos gos gsum mo //
translated: The word many refers to the three robes.

original: gcig tu zhes bya ba ni gzeb kyi sprog mar gnas pa thogs te'o //
analyzed: gcig tu zhes bya ba ni gzeb kyi sprog mar gnas pa thogs te'o //
translated: The word one refers to the bag.

original: du ma ni chos gos phrugs gsum ste gzhan du ni ma yin no //
analyzed: du ma ni chos gos phrugs gsum ste gzhan du ni ma yin no //
translated: The word many refers to the three robes, not to anything else.

original: dus gang gi tshe zhe na /
analyzed: dus gang gi tshe zhe na /
translated: At what time?

original: de'i phyir chos bcu drug la'o zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: de'i phyir chos bcu drug la'o zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: Therefore it is said, In the sixteen days.

original: tshes bcu drug gi nang bar ro //
analyzed: tshes bcu drug gi nang bar ro //
translated: In the middle of the sixteen days.

original: zla ba gang gi tshe na zhe na /
analyzed: zla ba gang gi tshe na zhe na /
translated: In what month?

original: de'i phyir ston zla 'bring po'i 'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir ston zla 'bring po'i 'o //
translated: Therefore it is said, In the middle autumn month.

original: lan gsum bzlas pas so zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: lan gsum bzlas pas so zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: It is said, By the three recitations.

original: ci zhag lan gsum du bzlas pas she na /
analyzed: ci zhag lan gsum du bzlas pas she na /
translated: Is it recited three times a day?

original: de'i phyir gding ngo zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: de'i phyir gding ngo zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: Therefore it is said, I will make the sitting mat.

original: bting ngo zhes bya ba'i sngags 'di mtshon pa tsam mo //
analyzed: bting ngo zhes bya ba'i sngags 'di mtshon pa tsam mo //
translated: The phrase he should say, 'It is spread' is merely an illustration.

original: dge slong re re'i mdun du 'dug ste bting ngo zhes go bar bya ba ni dge slong dge slong gi mdun du 'dug ste bting ngo zhes bya bar rig par bya'o zhes bya ba 'di yang sngags kyi mtshon pa tsam yin no //
analyzed: dge slong re re'i mdun du 'dug ste bting ngo zhes go bar bya ba ni dge slong dge slong gi mdun du 'dug ste bting ngo zhes bya bar rig par bya'o zhes bya ba 'di yang sngags kyi mtshon pa tsam yin no //
translated: The phrase he should sit in front of each monk and say, 'It is spread,' is merely an illustration of the formula.

original: ci'i phyir yang de gding ba ltar lhan cig nyid kyis dge 'dun la @114b zhu bar mi bya zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir yang de gding ba ltar lhan cig nyid kyis dge 'dun la @114b zhu bar mi bya zhe na /
translated: Why is it that he should not request the Saṅgha to spread the robes together with him?

original: bye brag tu cher 'byung ba nyid grub pa yod mod ces bya ba mthong ba yin no //
analyzed: bye brag tu cher 'byung ba nyid grub pa yod mod ces bya ba mthong ba yin no //
translated: It is seen that the phrase even though there is a reason for a special distribution is established.

original: gzhan gyis ni legs par bting ngo //
analyzed: gzhan gyis ni legs par bting ngo //
translated: Others say, It is well spread.

original: shin tu bting ngo //
analyzed: shin tu bting ngo //
translated: It is very well spread.🔽Whatever gain and honor there is in this belongs to me.

original: 'di la rnyed pa dang phan yon gang yod pa'i bdag gi yin no zhes so zhes bya ba ni gang gi mdun du gnas pa'i gding ba pos bting ngo zhes bya ba zhus pa de ni 'dir gzhan no //
analyzed: 'di la rnyed pa dang phan yon gang yod pa'i bdag gi yin no zhes so zhes bya ba ni gang gi mdun du gnas pa'i gding ba pos bting ngo zhes bya ba zhus pa de ni 'dir gzhan no //
translated: The one in front of whom the one who spreads the robes says, It is spread, is the other one here.

original: 'di la rjes su yi rang ba ni nyams su myong ba dang 'dra'o zhes bya ba ni ji ltar so sor nyams su myong ba de ni bting ba'i byed pa 'di bskyed pa nyid de /
analyzed: 'di la rjes su yi rang ba ni nyams su myong ba dang 'dra'o zhes bya ba ni ji ltar so sor nyams su myong ba de ni bting ba'i byed pa 'di bskyed pa nyid de /
translated: Here, rejoicing is like experience.🔽Just as one experiences individually, this is the generation of the function of the foundation.

original: de bzhin du so sor nyams su myong bar ma byas pa nyid 'thob ste /
analyzed: de bzhin du so sor nyams su myong bar ma byas pa nyid 'thob ste /
translated: Here, rejoicing is like experiencing. Just as one experiences what is spread out, so too one obtains what is not experienced individually.

original: 'di la rjes su yi rang ba zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: 'di la rjes su yi rang ba zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: This is the meaning of rejoicing here.

original: 'dir gzhung ni ma mo las /🔽de thos nas legs par bting ngo //
analyzed: 'dir gzhung ni ma mo las / de thos nas legs par bting ngo //
translated: Here, the text of the Mother Scripture says:🔽Having heard that, they rejoice, saying, “Well spread!

original: shin tu bting ngo zhes rjes su yi rang bar byed pa de dag gis kyang gtan pa bting bar brjod par byas so zhes gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: shin tu bting ngo zhes rjes su yi rang bar byed pa de dag gis kyang gtan pa bting bar brjod par byas so zhes gsungs pa yin no //
translated: Very well spread!” By that rejoicing, they are said to have spread the sacrificial surface.

original: gang gis de'i rjes su yi rang bar byed pa de ni las nyams su myong ba dang 'dra bar 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: gang gis de'i rjes su yi rang bar byed pa de ni las nyams su myong ba dang 'dra bar 'gyur zhe na /
translated: How is it that one who rejoices in that experiences the karma as if it were done by oneself?

original: de'i phyir mngon sum du gyur pas so zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: de'i phyir mngon sum du gyur pas so zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: Therefore, it is said: because it becomes manifest.

original: de bting ba'i phyir tshogs pa byin pas so zhes don gyis shes pa'o //
analyzed: de bting ba'i phyir tshogs pa byin pas so zhes don gyis shes pa'o //
translated: By giving the collection, it is understood by implication that it is spread out.

original: gding ba po'i phyir bting ba'i chos gos de ji ltar yongs su brkyang ba'i cho ga bshad par bya ste /
analyzed: gding ba po'i phyir bting ba'i chos gos de ji ltar yongs su brkyang ba'i cho ga bshad par bya ste /
translated: The procedure for spreading the robe on the ground where one is staying is explained.

original: de'i phyir dus dus su bsang bar bya bsrang bar bya sprug par bya'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir dus dus su bsang bar bya bsrang bar bya sprug par bya'o //
translated: Therefore, from time to time, one should air it, beat it, and shake it.

original: khyim du ba can dang rdul can du gzhag par mi bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: khyim du ba can dang rdul can du gzhag par mi bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: One should not keep it in a dusty or smoky place.

original: rgyal po'i pho brang du gzhag par mi bya'o zhes bya ba ni gzhag par mi bya'o zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: rgyal po'i pho brang du gzhag par mi bya'o zhes bya ba ni gzhag par mi bya'o zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: One should not keep it in a royal palace.

original: de dang bral bar mi bya'o zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: de dang bral bar mi bya'o zhes bya ba la /
translated: One should not go elsewhere with it.

original: de dang zhes bya ba ni chos gos sra brkyang ngo //
analyzed: de dang zhes bya ba ni chos gos sra brkyang ngo //
translated: “It” refers to the robe and the rainy season.

original: khyer te gzhan du 'gro bar mi bya'o //
analyzed: khyer te gzhan du 'gro bar mi bya'o //
translated: One should not go elsewhere with it.

original: mi gtsang ba'i skyabs su 'jug par mi bya'o ;
analyzed: mi gtsang ba'i skyabs su 'jug par mi bya'o ;
translated: One should not enter a place that is unclean.🔽One should not stay in the open air.

original: / bla gab med par 'dug par mi bya'o zhes bya ba ni de dag gnyis ka la yang khyer te zhes bya bar sbyar ba'i tshig go //
analyzed: / bla gab med par 'dug par mi bya'o zhes bya ba ni de dag gnyis ka la yang khyer te zhes bya bar sbyar ba'i tshig go //
translated: “In the open air” means without a roof.

original: gang du de khyer te 'gro ba dang gnas pa bkag pa der de las bzhag pa yang bkag par shes par bya'o //
analyzed: gang du de khyer te 'gro ba dang gnas pa bkag pa der de las bzhag pa yang bkag par shes par bya'o //
translated: Where it is prohibited to carry it and to stay, it should be understood that it is prohibited to leave it there.

original: 'ding bar byed pa po las gzhan gyis gzhag pa dang / 'chang ba dang khyer bar mi bya'o zhes bya ba de yang 'dis byas pa rig par bya'o //
analyzed: 'ding bar byed pa po las gzhan gyis gzhag pa dang / 'chang ba dang khyer bar mi bya'o zhes bya ba de yang 'dis byas pa rig par bya'o //
translated: It should be understood that it is done by another who is not the one who spreads it, who leaves it, who carries it, and who keeps it.

original: gding ba de ji ltar brkyang ba bshad zin to //
analyzed: gding ba de ji ltar brkyang ba bshad zin to //
translated: The spreading of the mat has been explained.

original: da ni dbyung ba bshad par bya ste /
analyzed: da ni dbyung ba bshad par bya ste /
translated: Now the taking out should be explained.

original: de'i phyir dbyung ba ni rnam pa gnyis te /
analyzed: de'i phyir dbyung ba ni rnam pa gnyis te /
translated: Therefore it is said: “The taking out is of two kinds:

original: rang 'jug pa dang bral ba dang bcos ma'o zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: rang 'jug pa dang bral ba dang bcos ma'o zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: the natural engagement and the artificial.”

original: gang zhig dbyung bar gyur pa na rang 'jug pa @115a * //
analyzed: gang zhig dbyung bar gyur pa na rang 'jug pa @115a * //
translated: When it is taken out, it is the natural engagement.

original: ste ; gtan pa dbyung ba 'grub par 'gyur ba de rang nyid kyis byed rgyu med par 'jug par nye bar 'gro bzhin pa'o //
analyzed: ste ; gtan pa dbyung ba 'grub par 'gyur ba de rang nyid kyis byed rgyu med par 'jug par nye bar 'gro bzhin pa'o //
translated: When the rule is taken out, it is accomplished. That is naturally engaged by itself, without a cause.

original: 'jug pa ji ltar 'grub par 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: 'jug pa ji ltar 'grub par 'gyur zhe na /
translated: How is the engagement accomplished?

original: de'i phyir rang 'jug pa dang 'bral ba ni gtan pas mtshams gzhan du phyin pa dang / byin gyis rlob par byed pa med par mtshams kyi nang du skya rengs 'char ba dang / de'i dkyil 'khor kyi khongs su gtogs pa 'chang pa'o zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: de'i phyir rang 'jug pa dang 'bral ba ni gtan pas mtshams gzhan du phyin pa dang / byin gyis rlob par byed pa med par mtshams kyi nang du skya rengs 'char ba dang / de'i dkyil 'khor kyi khongs su gtogs pa 'chang pa'o zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: Therefore, it is said, “when one is separated from one’s own entry, when the boundary is moved to another place, when the dawn breaks within the boundary without the consecration, and when one is included within the mandala of that.”

original: gnas skabs gsum po 'di dag la 'byung ste /
analyzed: gnas skabs gsum po 'di dag la 'byung ste /
translated: These three situations occur:

original: gtan pa mtshams kyi gnas gzhan du phyin pa dang / mtshams gang du de bting ba'i mtshams der byin gyis rlob par byed ba'i dge slong thams cad ma lus pa med pa der skya rengs shar ba dang / byin gyis rlob par byed pa'i dge 'dun kyi mtshams kyi dkyil 'khor gyi khongs su gtogs pa de dag gang la rgyun chad ba'i gnas skabs na'o //
analyzed: gtan pa mtshams kyi gnas gzhan du phyin pa dang / mtshams gang du de bting ba'i mtshams der byin gyis rlob par byed ba'i dge slong thams cad ma lus pa med pa der skya rengs shar ba dang / byin gyis rlob par byed pa'i dge 'dun kyi mtshams kyi dkyil 'khor gyi khongs su gtogs pa de dag gang la rgyun chad ba'i gnas skabs na'o //
translated: when the boundary is moved to another place, when the dawn breaks within the boundary where the boundary was spread, without all the fully ordained monks who consecrate it remaining there, and when one is included within the mandala of the boundary of the Saṅgha who consecrates it, in the situation where the continuity is broken.

original: dbyar gyi gnas kyi rjes su 'jug par gyur pa'i gtan pa gding ba gang yin ba'o ;
analyzed: dbyar gyi gnas kyi rjes su 'jug par gyur pa'i gtan pa gding ba gang yin ba'o ;
translated: This is the boundary that is spread following the rainy season retreat.

original: / gang gi phyir ji ltar de'i zhing las gzhan pa'i gnas su mi 'byung ba de bzhin du dbyung ba yang zhing gzhan du gnas pa nyid na 'jig par 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: / gang gi phyir ji ltar de'i zhing las gzhan pa'i gnas su mi 'byung ba de bzhin du dbyung ba yang zhing gzhan du gnas pa nyid na 'jig par 'gyur ba'o //
translated: And because it is not destroyed in the field of that which is to be abandoned by the path of cultivation, therefore, it is not destroyed in the field of that which is to be abandoned by the path of seeing.🔽And because it is not destroyed in the field of that which is to be abandoned by the path of cultivation, therefore, it is not destroyed in the field of that which is to be abandoned by the path of seeing.🔽And because it is not destroyed in the field of that which is to be abandoned by the path of cultivation, therefore, it is not destroyed in the field of that which is to be abandoned by the path of seeing.

original: de las thams cad la bag yangs su gnas pa gang yin pa de nyid dang / de'i phyir byin gyis rlob par byed pa med par 'di la rgyun gcod par byed pa de la 'bral ba'i spang ba nyid der zhing ma yin ba nyid kyi phyir ji ltar mi 'byung ba de bzhin du 'jig pa'o //🔽de rnams la 'di'i rgyas pa nyid gang yin pa de la yang de rnams la 'di 'jig pa ste /
analyzed: de las thams cad la bag yangs su gnas pa gang yin pa de nyid dang / de'i phyir byin gyis rlob par byed pa med par 'di la rgyun gcod par byed pa de la 'bral ba'i spang ba nyid der zhing ma yin ba nyid kyi phyir ji ltar mi 'byung ba de bzhin du 'jig pa'o // de rnams la 'di'i rgyas pa nyid gang yin pa de la yang de rnams la 'di 'jig pa ste /

original: de'i phyir las las gzhan pa'i bya ba rjes su bsgrub par mi bya'o zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: de'i phyir las las gzhan pa'i bya ba rjes su bsgrub par mi bya'o zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: Therefore, it is said, “The action should not be performed as something other than the karma.”🔽What is the purpose of this reversal of the other aspect?

original: ci slar rnam pa gzhan 'di zlog pa sgrub par byed pa gang gi phyir gzhan byed pa rnams la gzhan smos te /
analyzed: ci slar rnam pa gzhan 'di zlog pa sgrub par byed pa gang gi phyir gzhan byed pa rnams la gzhan smos te /
translated: It is said, “Because the other is mentioned in regard to the other agent.”

original: las la rnam pa gzhan gyis 'di bskyed pa ma yin zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: las la rnam pa gzhan gyis 'di bskyed pa ma yin zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The action is not generated by the other aspect.

original: 'di ltar sems bskyed pa brtan pos kyang 'grub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'di ltar sems bskyed pa brtan pos kyang 'grub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is accomplished by the firm generation of the mind.

original: slar gang zhig dbyung ba'i las 'di la dus nam yin zhe na /
analyzed: slar gang zhig dbyung ba'i las 'di la dus nam yin zhe na /
translated: Again, when is the time for the performance of this action?

original: de'i phyir de'i dus ni dpyid zla ra ba'i nya la'o zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: de'i phyir de'i dus ni dpyid zla ra ba'i nya la'o zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: Therefore, it is said, “The time for that is the full moon of the first month of spring.”

original: dge slong ma'i rnam par 'byed pa las /
analyzed: dge slong ma'i rnam par 'byed pa las /
translated: In the Bhikṣuṇīvibhṅga,

original: dus ma yin bar gtan ba dbyung bar mi bya'o zhes gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: dus ma yin bar gtan ba dbyung bar mi bya'o zhes gsungs pa yin no //
translated: it is said, “The going forth should not be given at the wrong time.”

original: gtan pa dbyung ba'i dus ma yin pa gang zhe na ston zla 'bring po'i nya nas dpyid zla ra ba'i nya'i bar du gtan pa dbyung bar chos gos gtan pa gding ba'i dus ma yin pa 'di'o //
analyzed: gtan pa dbyung ba'i dus ma yin pa gang zhe na ston zla 'bring po'i nya nas dpyid zla ra ba'i nya'i bar du gtan pa dbyung bar chos gos gtan pa gding ba'i dus ma yin pa 'di'o //
translated: This is not the proper time for spreading out the mat.

original: de man chad ni dus te /
analyzed: de man chad ni dus te /
translated: After that, it is the proper time.

original: dus su gtan pa dbyung bar bya ba smos na sra brkyang dbyung ba'i dus gang zhe na /
analyzed: dus su gtan pa dbyung bar bya ba smos na sra brkyang dbyung ba'i dus gang zhe na /
translated: If it is said that the mat should be spread out at the proper time, what is the proper time for spreading out the rainy season robe?

original: de'i phyir dpyid zla ra ba'i nya la'o zhes bya ba mngon bar brten pa'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir dpyid zla ra ba'i nya la'o zhes bya ba mngon bar brten pa'o //
translated: Therefore, it is said: “on the full moon of the first winter month.”

original: de'i rjes la snga ma'i tshes bcu bzhi'i mtha' can dpyid zla ra ba'i mtha' can nyid kyis so //
analyzed: de'i rjes la snga ma'i tshes bcu bzhi'i mtha' can dpyid zla ra ba'i mtha' can nyid kyis so //
translated: After that, it is the last day of the fourteenth of the previous month, which is the last day of the first winter month.

original: mod la'o zhes bya ba ni lo gnyis pa la sogs pa dang 'brel ba'i dpyid zla ra ba'i nya thal bar gyur pa @117a * //
analyzed: mod la'o zhes bya ba ni lo gnyis pa la sogs pa dang 'brel ba'i dpyid zla ra ba'i nya thal bar gyur pa @117a * //
translated: “Immediately” is connected with the second year, etc., and the full moon of the first winter month that has passed.

original: bsal ba'i phyir tshig 'di smos te /
analyzed: bsal ba'i phyir tshig 'di smos te /
translated: This statement is made to exclude that.

original: dbyar de nyid kyis bar du mchod pa'i mod la ste /
analyzed: dbyar de nyid kyis bar du mchod pa'i mod la ste /
translated: “Immediately” means in the middle of that very rainy season.

original: dbyar gzhan ni yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: dbyar gzhan ni yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: It means that another rainy season is not.

original: 'dir sngags ni ming de las dus thams cad pa dus kyi gzhung 'dir dge 'dun gyis gsan pa mdzod cig /'di ltar gnas 'dir dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis gtan pa bting ba las de'i rjes su 'jug pa'i dus tshes bco lnga lags te /
analyzed: 'dir sngags ni ming de las dus thams cad pa dus kyi gzhung 'dir dge 'dun gyis gsan pa mdzod cig /'di ltar gnas 'dir dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis gtan pa bting ba las de'i rjes su 'jug pa'i dus tshes bco lnga lags te /
translated: Here, the mantra is that name. At all times, in this text on time, the Saṅgha should listen. In this way, in this place, the Saṅgha of monks has laid out the permanent. After that, the time is the fifteenth day.

original: gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / gang gi phyir dge 'dun gyis gtan pa 'byin par mdzad do //
analyzed: gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / gang gi phyir dge 'dun gyis gtan pa 'byin par mdzad do //
translated: If it is the right time for the Saṅgha and it is acceptable, then the Saṅgha should agree to this, because the Saṅgha will lift the permanent.

original: 'di ni gsol ba'o //
analyzed: 'di ni gsol ba'o //
translated: This is the motion.

original: dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol /
analyzed: dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol /
translated: Venerable members of the Saṅgha, please listen!

original: ji srid gnas 'di dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis gtan pa bting ba las de'i rjes su 'jug pa'i dus tshes bco lnga lags te /
analyzed: ji srid gnas 'di dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis gtan pa bting ba las de'i rjes su 'jug pa'i dus tshes bco lnga lags te /
translated: For as long as the Saṅgha of monks has laid out the permanent in this place, after that, the time is the fifteenth day.

original: de'i bslad du dge slong gis gtan pa 'byin no //
analyzed: de'i bslad du dge slong gis gtan pa 'byin no //
translated: After that, the monk will lift the permanent.

original: gtan pa 'byin par tshe dang ldan pa gang dag bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung shig gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig ces lan gsum bzlas pas dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas dge 'dun gyis gtan pa phyung lags te /
analyzed: gtan pa 'byin par tshe dang ldan pa gang dag bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung shig gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig ces lan gsum bzlas pas dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas dge 'dun gyis gtan pa phyung lags te /
translated: If the saṅgha accepts the motion to lift the suspension, they should remain silent. If they do not accept it, they should speak up.

original: 'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to zhes gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: 'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to zhes gsungs pa yin no //
translated: Since the saṅgha has accepted the motion to lift the suspension and has remained silent, I will hold this as the saṅgha’s acceptance.

original: bcom ba'i don nyid du ni sngar yang ngo zhes bya ba na /🔽de dus yin no zhes bya bar sbyar te /🔽nyi ma de nyid la zhes bya ba'i tshig gis gso spyong gi nyi ma'i bdag nyid can ni sngar gyi dus kyi de yin te /
analyzed: bcom ba'i don nyid du ni sngar yang ngo zhes bya ba na / de dus yin no zhes bya bar sbyar te / nyi ma de nyid la zhes bya ba'i tshig gis gso spyong gi nyi ma'i bdag nyid can ni sngar gyi dus kyi de yin te /
translated: The meaning of the above is that the saṅgha should lift the suspension of the preceptor.🔽The phrase “on that very day” refers to the day of the poṣadha ceremony.

original: sngar ni sngon du bya ba'o //
analyzed: sngar ni sngon du bya ba'o //
translated: The phrase “on the previous day” refers to the day before the poṣadha ceremony.

original: der nyams su ma myong ba dang ldan pa la ni ma thos kyi bar du phan yon rjes su 'jug go zhes bya ba la ma thos kyi bar du zhes bya ba ni mtshams kyi nang ngam phyi rol du 'dug pas so //
analyzed: der nyams su ma myong ba dang ldan pa la ni ma thos kyi bar du phan yon rjes su 'jug go zhes bya ba la ma thos kyi bar du zhes bya ba ni mtshams kyi nang ngam phyi rol du 'dug pas so //
translated: The benefit is not engaged for one who has not experienced it until he hears about it. Until he hears about it means that he is either inside or outside the boundary.

original: de ni 'dir gtan pa dbyung ba thos pa'i mtha' las byung ba sngar kyi dus so //
analyzed: de ni 'dir gtan pa dbyung ba thos pa'i mtha' las byung ba sngar kyi dus so //
translated: This is the rule that is stated here.

original: gtsug lag las /
analyzed: gtsug lag las /
translated: The Abhidharma states:

original: gang gis de nyams su myong bar ma gyur pa de srid du 'di ma thos kyi bar du 'jug gi thos na ni ldog go //
analyzed: gang gis de nyams su myong bar ma gyur pa de srid du 'di ma thos kyi bar du 'jug gi thos na ni ldog go //
translated: As long as one has not experienced it, the benefit is engaged for him until he hears about it, but when he hears about it, it is stopped.

original: ci gnas skabs thams cad du ma thos kyi bar du phan yon de rjes su 'jug gam zhe na /
analyzed: ci gnas skabs thams cad du ma thos kyi bar du phan yon de rjes su 'jug gam zhe na /
translated: Does this benefit engage until he hears about it in all circumstances?

original: de'i phyir rjes su 'brel ba med na'o zhes bya ba smos so //
analyzed: de'i phyir rjes su 'brel ba med na'o zhes bya ba smos so //
translated: Therefore it is said: if there is no connection.

original: gzhan du ji srid phan yon rjes su 'jug ce na /🔽de'i phyir yod na ma chad kyi bar du zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: gzhan du ji srid phan yon rjes su 'jug ce na / de'i phyir yod na ma chad kyi bar du zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: How long does the benefit engage if it is not like this?🔽Therefore it is said: as long as it exists, if it is not cut off.

original: rjes su 'brel ba yod pa nyid ma chad kyi bar zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: rjes su 'brel ba yod pa nyid ma chad kyi bar zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is: as long as the existence of the connection is not cut off.

original: 'dir gzhung ni zhu ba las @117b gtan pa dbyung ba thos pa'i mtha' las byung ba gang zhe na /
analyzed: 'dir gzhung ni zhu ba las @117b gtan pa dbyung ba thos pa'i mtha' las byung ba gang zhe na /
translated: Here, the treatise is the definitive conclusion drawn from the question: What is meant by one who has completed the study of the boundary?

original: gang zhig mtshams kyi phyi rol du shan med pa'i rgyud kyi thos pa dang / gos la re ba chad pa dang / shan yod pas gos zin par gyur ba dang / gal te gos la re ba yod pa dang / gos kyang rung ste brtsams pa ni shan gyi rgyun yongs su yang dag pas brjod par bya ba ste /
analyzed: gang zhig mtshams kyi phyi rol du shan med pa'i rgyud kyi thos pa dang / gos la re ba chad pa dang / shan yod pas gos zin par gyur ba dang / gal te gos la re ba yod pa dang / gos kyang rung ste brtsams pa ni shan gyi rgyun yongs su yang dag pas brjod par bya ba ste /
translated: It is said that one who has studied the Vinaya outside the boundary, who has cut off hope for robes, who has obtained robes due to a boundary, who has hope for robes, and who has begun to obtain robes, should speak of the continuity of the boundary.

original: de bzhin du de 'jug go zhes gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: de bzhin du de 'jug go zhes gsungs pa yin no //
translated: Thus, he enters.

original: dngos po bsdus ba ni brda bshad kyis chog ste zhes bya ba de'i rnyed pa 'byung ba mthong ba yod kyang rnyed pa brtsams pa nyid la yang gos gnang bzhin pa nyid la 'di ni mthar thug ba'o //
analyzed: dngos po bsdus ba ni brda bshad kyis chog ste zhes bya ba de'i rnyed pa 'byung ba mthong ba yod kyang rnyed pa brtsams pa nyid la yang gos gnang bzhin pa nyid la 'di ni mthar thug ba'o //
translated: The summary of the topic is sufficient with the explanation of the signs. Even if one sees the arising of gain, when the gain has begun, the robe is still being made, and this is the conclusion.

original: de gnyis ni mthar thug pa'i mtha' las byung ba dang / re ba chad pa'i mtha' las byung ba 'dis rnam pa gzhan gnyis yin no //🔽zhig par 'gyur ba mtha' las byung ba'i rnam pa gzhan yang 'dir 'byung bar rig par bya'o //🔽ma byung na thams cad kyis de'i dus kyi rnyed pa bgo bar mi bya'o zhes bya ba gtan pa'i chos gos de ma byung na ste ;
analyzed: de gnyis ni mthar thug pa'i mtha' las byung ba dang / re ba chad pa'i mtha' las byung ba 'dis rnam pa gzhan gnyis yin no // zhig par 'gyur ba mtha' las byung ba'i rnam pa gzhan yang 'dir 'byung bar rig par bya'o // ma byung na thams cad kyis de'i dus kyi rnyed pa bgo bar mi bya'o zhes bya ba gtan pa'i chos gos de ma byung na ste ;
translated: The other two are the extremes of destruction and of non-arising.

original: dngos po zhugs pa la ni ma yin no //
analyzed: dngos po zhugs pa la ni ma yin no //
translated: If the robe-material does not arise, i.e., if the robe-material does not come about, then the robe-material should not be shared out by all the monks at that time.🔽This is the rule.

original: chos gos de ni gzhan dag gi la gter gyi gnas lta bu yin pas /
analyzed: chos gos de ni gzhan dag gi la gter gyi gnas lta bu yin pas /
translated: The robe-material is like a treasure for others.

original: gang gi tshe 'ding bar byed pa thams cad kyis de phyung bar 'gyur ba de'i tshe na gtan pa bting ba'i dus las byung ba'i rnyed par bgo bar bya'i //
analyzed: gang gi tshe 'ding bar byed pa thams cad kyis de phyung bar 'gyur ba de'i tshe na gtan pa bting ba'i dus las byung ba'i rnyed par bgo bar bya'i //
translated: When it is spread out, i.e., when it is taken out by all the monks, then the robe-material should be shared out at the time of spreading out the robe-material.

original: de ma phyung ba'i sngon rol du ni ma yin no zhes bya ba 'dir ston to //
analyzed: de ma phyung ba'i sngon rol du ni ma yin no zhes bya ba 'dir ston to //
translated: But not before it is taken out. This is what is taught here.

original: gzhir gtogs pa'i sra brkyang gi gzhi'o //
analyzed: gzhir gtogs pa'i sra brkyang gi gzhi'o //
translated: The basis is the basis of the robe-season.

original: ston zla 'bring po'i zhes smos pas ston zla 'bring po'i chos bcu drug la gtan pa bting ba'i dus yin na shol gyi zla ba ni rgyal po'i rjes su 'brang bar bya'o zhes smos pas de'i rjes su 'brang ba la mngon par brten par thal ba'i brjod par
analyzed: ston zla 'bring po'i zhes smos pas ston zla 'bring po'i chos bcu drug la gtan pa bting ba'i dus yin na shol gyi zla ba ni rgyal po'i rjes su 'brang bar bya'o zhes smos pas de'i rjes su 'brang ba la mngon par brten par thal ba'i brjod par
translated: Therefore, it is said that it should be based on following that.

original: bya ste / de'i phyir dgag dbye ba ji lta ba bzhin du gding ngo zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: bya ste / de'i phyir dgag dbye ba ji lta ba bzhin du gding ngo zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: Therefore, it says, “The laying out should be done just like the invitation ceremony.”

original: 'dir dgag dbye'i sgras ni dus nye bar mtshon par byed par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: 'dir dgag dbye'i sgras ni dus nye bar mtshon par byed par rig par bya'o //
translated: Here, the term “invitation ceremony” should be understood to indicate the time.

original: ji ltar dgag dbye'i dus su zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: ji ltar dgag dbye'i dus su zhes bya ba'o //
translated: It is like saying “at the time of the invitation ceremony.”

original: de lta bas na rtsod par byed pa'i dbang gis sngon du dgag dbye byed pa la de'i 'og tu gtan pa bting ba 'dis bya ba nyid du ston pa'o //
analyzed: de lta bas na rtsod par byed pa'i dbang gis sngon du dgag dbye byed pa la de'i 'og tu gtan pa bting ba 'dis bya ba nyid du ston pa'o //
translated: Therefore, this shows that the laying out of the rainy season retreat should be done after the invitation ceremony, which is done first, due to the dispute.

original: de yang 'dir de'i tshe ston zla 'bring po'i chas bcu drug la zhes bya ba'i tshig gis so //
analyzed: de yang 'dir de'i tshe ston zla 'bring po'i chas bcu drug la zhes bya ba'i tshig gis so //
translated: And that is shown here by the words “at that time, in the middle autumn month’s sixteen day period.”

original: gang gi phyir gzhan du dus de la nges par mi 'grub pa'o //🔽gso sbyong gi mtha' ma yin ba la mi bya'o zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: gang gi phyir gzhan du dus de la nges par mi 'grub pa'o // gso sbyong gi mtha' ma yin ba la mi bya'o zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Because it is not definitely accomplished at that time elsewhere.🔽One should not do it at the end of the poṣadha.

original: gtan pa gding ba ni zhes bya bar sbyar te /
analyzed: gtan pa gding ba ni zhes bya bar sbyar te /
translated: The term “should not do” is applied to “the proclamation of the rule.”

original: @118a * // gso sbyong dang nye bar gyur ba'i dus su 'dir ni tha ma'i sgra'o //🔽gso sbyong gi mdun rol du gtan pa dbyung bar mi bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: @118a * // gso sbyong dang nye bar gyur ba'i dus su 'dir ni tha ma'i sgra'o // gso sbyong gi mdun rol du gtan pa dbyung bar mi bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Here, the term “end” refers to the time that is near to the poṣadha.🔽The meaning is that one should not proclaim the rule prior to the poṣadha.

original: dbyung ba yang ngo zhes bya ba ni gso sbyong tha ma yin ba la mi bya ste /
analyzed: dbyung ba yang ngo zhes bya ba ni gso sbyong tha ma yin ba la mi bya ste /
translated: “One should also proclaim” means that one should not do it at the end of the poṣadha.

original: gtan pa dbyung ba yang gso sbyong nyid byas nas rjes su bsgrub par bya'o zhes bya ba la 'dir de byed pa'o //
analyzed: gtan pa dbyung ba yang gso sbyong nyid byas nas rjes su bsgrub par bya'o zhes bya ba la 'dir de byed pa'o //
translated: The proclamation of the rule should also be done after performing the poṣadha itself. Here, that is done.

original: tshes bcu drug la yang 'dir nye ba nyid du shes na ni bcu drug gi de'am /
analyzed: tshes bcu drug la yang 'dir nye ba nyid du shes na ni bcu drug gi de'am /
translated: If one knows that it is near here on the sixteenth day, then it is the sixteenth day of that,

original: tshes bco lnga gtan pa dbyung bar thal bar 'gyur ba bsal ba'i phyir /
analyzed: tshes bco lnga gtan pa dbyung bar thal bar 'gyur ba bsal ba'i phyir /
translated: or the fifteenth day. In order to eliminate the consequence of proclaiming the rule on the fifteenth day,

original: 'di ni nyi ma de nyid kyi'o zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: 'di ni nyi ma de nyid kyi'o zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: it is said, “This is on that very day.”

original: gtan pha dbyung ba 'di ni gso sbyong gi nyi ma tshes bco lnga la dbyung ba yin gyi ;
analyzed: gtan pha dbyung ba 'di ni gso sbyong gi nyi ma tshes bco lnga la dbyung ba yin gyi ;
translated: This is the final announcement of the poṣadha, which is made on the fifteenth day of the poṣadha.🔽

original: tshes bcu drug la dbyung ba ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to /
analyzed: tshes bcu drug la dbyung ba ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to /
translated: This is the procedure for extending the summer retreat on the fifteenth day of the retreat, not on the sixteenth day.

original: brtsams pa 'di ni dus ma yin bar dbyung bar ched du byas pa yin par rig par bya ste /
analyzed: brtsams pa 'di ni dus ma yin bar dbyung bar ched du byas pa yin par rig par bya ste /
translated: This is done intentionally to extend the retreat at an inappropriate time.

original: gzhan la ni nges pa yod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gzhan la ni nges pa yod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because the retreat must be extended on the fifteenth day of the retreat, not on the sixteenth day.

original: gso sbyong ma byas par gtan pa gding ba mi 'byung ngo zhes bya ba shes bzhin du gso sbyong gi mtha' ma yin pa la zhes bya ba 'di las gso sbyong bya ste gtan pa gding bar bya zhing yang dge slong gzhan byung na yang gso sbyong byed
analyzed: gso sbyong ma byas par gtan pa gding ba mi 'byung ngo zhes bya ba shes bzhin du gso sbyong gi mtha' ma yin pa la zhes bya ba 'di las gso sbyong bya ste gtan pa gding bar bya zhing yang dge slong gzhan byung na yang gso sbyong byed
translated: If a monk knows that it is inappropriate to extend the retreat without performing the poṣadha purification ceremony, then he should perform the poṣadha ceremony and extend the retreat.

original: pa la ji ltar bsgrub par bya zhe na /
analyzed: pa la ji ltar bsgrub par bya zhe na /
translated: If other monks arrive, how should they proceed?

original: de'i phyir yang gso sbyong byas na phyung ba nyid yin no zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: de'i phyir yang gso sbyong byas na phyung ba nyid yin no zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: Therefore it is said, “If they perform the poṣadha ceremony, the retreat is extended.”

original: 'dis kyang rnam pa gzhan gyis dbyung ba rang 'jug pa zhes bya bar rig par bya'o //🔽bting nas bye ba dag la ni de tha dad par 'grub po zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: 'dis kyang rnam pa gzhan gyis dbyung ba rang 'jug pa zhes bya bar rig par bya'o // bting nas bye ba dag la ni de tha dad par 'grub po zhes bya ba ni /
translated: This should be understood as the other way of stating “self-application.”🔽When it is spread out, it is established as different in a billion-world universe.

original: gtan pa bting ba nas bye ba dag la ni de dag tha dad par dbyung ba 'di la 'grub po //
analyzed: gtan pa bting ba nas bye ba dag la ni de dag tha dad par dbyung ba 'di la 'grub po //
translated: When it is spread out, it is established as different in a billion-world universe.🔽Here, because it is a single spread-out cloth, when one part is removed, the other part is not also removed.

original: 'di la gding ba gcig yin ba'i phyir phyogs gcig gis phyung na phyogs cig shos kyis kyang phyung ba nyid ma yin no //🔽gang gis gang tshe de la phyung ba'i las byas par 'gyur ba de'i tshe 'di la 'di zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: 'di la gding ba gcig yin ba'i phyir phyogs gcig gis phyung na phyogs cig shos kyis kyang phyung ba nyid ma yin no // gang gis gang tshe de la phyung ba'i las byas par 'gyur ba de'i tshe 'di la 'di zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: When one part is removed, the other part is not also removed.🔽When the cloth is spread out, the cloth is established as different in a billion-world universe.🔽The meaning is that when one part is removed, the other part is not also removed.

original: chos smra ba dag yod pas de gding ngo zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: chos smra ba dag yod pas de gding ngo zhes bya ba la /
translated: The cloth is spread out because the Dharma teachers exist.

original: de zhes bya ba'i sgras ni chos smra ba po bsdus pa ste /🔽gnas gang na de yod pa'o //
analyzed: de zhes bya ba'i sgras ni chos smra ba po bsdus pa ste /🔽gnas gang na de yod pa'o //
translated: The word “that” includes the Dharma teacher.🔽The meaning is that the cloth is spread out in the place where the Dharma teacher is.

original: chos smra ba dang bcas pa'i gnas la chos smra ba po rnams la rang byung ba gding ba zhes bya ba 'dir don to //
analyzed: chos smra ba dang bcas pa'i gnas la chos smra ba po rnams la rang byung ba gding ba zhes bya ba 'dir don to //
translated: The meaning here is that the one who is the Dharma teacher should spread out the mat in the place where the Dharma is taught, for the Dharma teachers.

original: chos smra ba po des ni dbang byed pa nyid yin pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: chos smra ba po des ni dbang byed pa nyid yin pa'i phyir te /
translated: Because that Dharma teacher is the one who has control over it.

original: de rnams kyi gnas kyi rgyu las de'i don gyi phyir bstan pa'o //
analyzed: de rnams kyi gnas kyi rgyu las de'i don gyi phyir bstan pa'o //
translated: It is taught for the purpose of that, because it is the cause of the place for them.

original: de lta bas na ma chog pa dang shin tu ma chog pa rnams la mi skyed pa lam byas pa nyid du'o //
analyzed: de lta bas na ma chog pa dang shin tu ma chog pa rnams la mi skyed pa lam byas pa nyid du'o //
translated: Therefore, it is not proper for those who are not satisfied or who are very dissatisfied to make it their livelihood.

original: de ltar na yang byas pa nyid kyang gzhan rnams kyi zhes bya ba'i @118b tshig gis so //
analyzed: de ltar na yang byas pa nyid kyang gzhan rnams kyi zhes bya ba'i @118b tshig gis so //
translated: Even so, it is said that it is for others, by the phrase it is for others.

original: 'dir gzhung yang de bzhin du ste /
analyzed: 'dir gzhung yang de bzhin du ste /
translated: Here, the text is also like that.

original: dbyar gnas pa'i dge 'dun bye na gang gis gtan pa gding bar bgyi /
analyzed: dbyar gnas pa'i dge 'dun bye na gang gis gtan pa gding bar bgyi /
translated: If the Saṅgha of the rainy season retreat splits, by whom should the mat be spread?

original: gang dag chos smra ba dag gis so zhes gsungs pa dang / lam nas drangs pa rnams la rang bzhin du gnas pa'i gnas kyi gtan pa gding bar byed pa de /
analyzed: gang dag chos smra ba dag gis so zhes gsungs pa dang / lam nas drangs pa rnams la rang bzhin du gnas pa'i gnas kyi gtan pa gding bar byed pa de /
translated: It is said that by the Dharma teachers, and it is taught that the one who spreads the mat in the natural dwelling place for those who are led along the path,

original: spangs pa rnams sra brkyang ma bting ba zhes brjod par bya'o zhes gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: spangs pa rnams sra brkyang ma bting ba zhes brjod par bya'o zhes gsungs pa yin no //
translated: The abandonment of the robe-making ceremony is called the laying out of the long robe.

original: dge slong bram ze'i bu mos zhus pa las kyang /
analyzed: dge slong bram ze'i bu mos zhus pa las kyang /
translated: And in the Sutra Requested by the Monk Vṛjiputra:

original: dge 'dun bye na sus gtan pa bting bar bgyi bka' stsal pa /🔽chos smra ba dag gis te /
analyzed: dge 'dun bye na sus gtan pa bting bar bgyi bka' stsal pa / chos smra ba dag gis te /
translated: “If the Saṅgha splits, who should lay out the long robe?”🔽“Those who expound the Dharma.

original: chos smra ba des ni dbang byed pa nyid yin ba'i phyir te /
analyzed: chos smra ba des ni dbang byed pa nyid yin ba'i phyir te /
translated: Because those who expound the Dharma have control.

original: thams cad la yang gding ba 'byung bar ni 'gyur te zhes gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: thams cad la yang gding ba 'byung bar ni 'gyur te zhes gsungs pa yin no //
translated: And it is said that the long robe will appear for all.

original: 'di nyid ni dbang du byed pa la dgongs nas de bya ba nyid du gsungs so //
analyzed: 'di nyid ni dbang du byed pa la dgongs nas de bya ba nyid du gsungs so //
translated: This is said to be the action of those who have control, intending that they have control.

original: ma chog pa'i gnas pa la ni ma yin no zhes bya ba brtsams pa de las bsgrub par bya'o //
analyzed: ma chog pa'i gnas pa la ni ma yin no zhes bya ba brtsams pa de las bsgrub par bya'o //
translated: It is not said that they have control over the place.

original: der gzhan dag gis byas kyang gnas kyi rnyed pa ni de dag las 'os pa nyid yin no zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: der gzhan dag gis byas kyang gnas kyi rnyed pa ni de dag las 'os pa nyid yin no zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The acquisition of the place belongs to those who have control over it, even if others make it.

original: dus 'dir gnas pa la 'di sbyin bar bya'o //
analyzed: dus 'dir gnas pa la 'di sbyin bar bya'o //
translated: The acquisition of the place is given to those who live there.

original: gnas der gnas pa'i dge 'dun la rnyed pa 'di'o //
analyzed: gnas der gnas pa'i dge 'dun la rnyed pa 'di'o //
translated: The acquisition of the place belongs to the Saṅgha that lives there.

original: de ltar gnas yongs su dag pa ltar rnyed pa de ni gnas kyi rnyed pa'o //
analyzed: de ltar gnas yongs su dag pa ltar rnyed pa de ni gnas kyi rnyed pa'o //
translated: The acquisition of a place in accordance with the purity of the place is the acquisition of a place.

original: chos ma yin ba smra ba gzhan dag gis gtan pa gding ba byas kyang chos smra ba de dag la gnas kyi rnyed pa 'os pa nyid yin te /
analyzed: chos ma yin ba smra ba gzhan dag gis gtan pa gding ba byas kyang chos smra ba de dag la gnas kyi rnyed pa 'os pa nyid yin te /
translated: Even if others who speak non-Dharma make a rule, it is proper for those who speak Dharma to acquire a place.

original: chos ma yin pa smra ba dag la ni ma yin zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: chos ma yin pa smra ba dag la ni ma yin zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that it is not for those who speak non-Dharma.

original: rang bzhin du gnas pa'i gnas su de spangs pa rnams la mi 'byung ngo zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: rang bzhin du gnas pa'i gnas su de spangs pa rnams la mi 'byung ngo zhes bya ba ni /
translated: In a naturally-occurring place, it does not arise for those who have abandoned it.

original: rang bzhin du gnas pa'i gnas su gtan pa gding bar byed pa de byed bzhin pa las spangs pa rnams la mi 'byung ngo zhes bya ba'i don to /🔽bsam pa gnas pa ni bting ba yin no zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: rang bzhin du gnas pa'i gnas su gtan pa gding bar byed pa de byed bzhin pa las spangs pa rnams la mi 'byung ngo zhes bya ba'i don to / bsam pa gnas pa ni bting ba yin no zhes bya ba la /
translated: The meaning is that in a naturally-occurring place, while making a rule, it does not arise for those who have abandoned it.🔽The intention is the rule.

original: bsam pa ni bsam ba'o //
analyzed: bsam pa ni bsam ba'o //
translated: Intention is thought.

original: lhan cig tu bya ba la 'dun pa phul ba'i dbang gis lhag ma rnams kyis byas na byas pa nyid yin no zhes bya ba ni bsam pa gnas pa ni bting ba yin la de dang bral ba ni phyung ba yin bas de'i phyir 'dun pa phul ba'i
analyzed: lhan cig tu bya ba la 'dun pa phul ba'i dbang gis lhag ma rnams kyis byas na byas pa nyid yin no zhes bya ba ni bsam pa gnas pa ni bting ba yin la de dang bral ba ni phyung ba yin bas de'i phyir 'dun pa phul ba'i
translated: If the others do the action by the power of offering their consent to the action done together, then it is done.

original: dbang gis na 'bul zhes bya ba smos pa la /
analyzed: dbang gis na 'bul zhes bya ba smos pa la /
translated: The thought is settled when the mat is spread, and it is removed when the mat is rolled up. Therefore, it is said that by the power of offering consent, it is offered.

original: 'di dag mi 'byung ba zhes bya bar thal ba'o //
analyzed: 'di dag mi 'byung ba zhes bya bar thal ba'o //
translated: If one says that the action is not done by the one who offers consent, then it follows that the action would not arise.

original: de la lan ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: de la lan ni 'di yin te /
translated: The answer to that is as follows.

original: gzhan dag lhan cig bya ba gang yin ba'i bya bar 'gyur ba da gzhan dag gis byas pa la 'dun pa phul bar byed pas kyang de dag byas pa nyid do //🔽de 'dun pa rjes su @119a * //
analyzed: gzhan dag lhan cig bya ba gang yin ba'i bya bar 'gyur ba da gzhan dag gis byas pa la 'dun pa phul bar byed pas kyang de dag byas pa nyid do // de 'dun pa rjes su @119a * //
translated: If others do the action that is to be done together, then by the power of offering consent to the action done by others, it is done by them.

original: phul bas lam la gnas par 'gyur zhes bya ba byas so //
analyzed: phul bas lam la gnas par 'gyur zhes bya ba byas so //
translated: By offering consent, one remains in the path.

original: de bas na thal ba 'di yod pa ma yin no zhes bya ba 'di gleng gzhi dag las drangs pa'o //
analyzed: de bas na thal ba 'di yod pa ma yin no zhes bya ba 'di gleng gzhi dag las drangs pa'o //
translated: Therefore, this consequence does not exist. This is drawn from the nidana.

original: da dang bral ba ni phyung ba yin no zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: da dang bral ba ni phyung ba yin no zhes bya ba la /
translated: The thought is removed when the mat is rolled up.

original: 'di'i sgras ni bsam pa gnas pa deng gzung ba'o //
analyzed: 'di'i sgras ni bsam pa gnas pa deng gzung ba'o //
translated: The term “that” refers to the stability of the thought of informing.

original: de'i phyir 'dun pa ma phul ba la ni 'dug tu zin kyang gnyid log gam snyoms par zhugs na ma thos kyi bar du bting ba dang phyung ba mi 'byung ngo zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: de'i phyir 'dun pa ma phul ba la ni 'dug tu zin kyang gnyid log gam snyoms par zhugs na ma thos kyi bar du bting ba dang phyung ba mi 'byung ngo zhes bya ba la /
translated: Therefore, even if one is present, if one does not offer one’s assent, then, whether one is asleep or in meditative equipoise, the laying out or removal of the robe is not accomplished until one hears about it.

original: 'dug tu zin kyang zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: 'dug tu zin kyang zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Even if one is present means

original: dge 'dun gyi nang du'o //
analyzed: dge 'dun gyi nang du'o //

analyzed: ma thos kyi bar du'o zhes bya ba ni / ji srid du gtan pa bting ba'am /
translated: Until one hears about it means

original: phyung ba ma thos kyi bar du'o //
analyzed: phyung ba ma thos kyi bar du'o //
translated: until one hears about the laying out or removal of the robe.

original: gang gi phyir bsam pa gnas pa ni bting ba yin la /
analyzed: gang gi phyir bsam pa gnas pa ni bting ba yin la /
translated: Because the stability of the thought of informing is the laying out,

original: 'dug tu zin kyang de gnyis yod pa yin te /
analyzed: 'dug tu zin kyang de gnyis yod pa yin te /
